quote: It takes half your life before you discover life is a do-it-yourself project.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Opportunity dances with those already on the dance floor.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: What do we live for, if not to make life less difficult for each other?
author: George Eliot

quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: Death is a sniper. It strikes people you love, people you like, people you know - it's everywhere. You could be next. But then you turn out not to be. But then again, you could be.
author: Nora Ephron

quote: My coming to faith did not start with a leap but rather a series of staggers from what seemed like one safe place to another. Like lily pads, round and green, these places summoned and then held me up while I grew. Each prepared me for the next leaf on which I would land, and in this way I moved across the swamp of doubt and fear.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: Affliction comes to us, not to make us sad but sober; not to make us sorry but wise.
author: H. G. Wells

quote: Most of the people who will walk after me will be children, so make the beat keep time with short steps.
author: Hans Christian Andersen

quote: The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Only the weak are cruel. Gentleness can only be expected from the strong.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: A state of war only serves as an excuse for domestic tyranny.
author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quote: Love is space and time measured by the heart.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: A crust eaten in peace is better than a banquet partaken in anxiety.
author: Aesop

quote: Mergers are like marriages. They are the bringing together of two individuals. If you wouldn't marry someone for the 'operational efficiencies' they offer in the running of a household, then why would you combine two companies with unique cultures and identities for that reason?
author: Simon Sinek

quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
author: Walt Disney

quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
author: Elon Musk

quote: You can't connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backwards. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future. You have to trust in something - your gut, destiny, life, karma, whatever. This approach has never let me down, and it has made all the difference in my life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.
author: Bill Gates

quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
author: Henry Ford

quote: If you want to be a Millionaire, start with a billion dollars and launch a new airline.
author: Richard Branson

quote: The biggest risk is not taking any risk... In a world that is changing really quickly, the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks.
author: Mark Zuckerberg

quote: Never give up. Today is hard, tomorrow will be worse, but the day after tomorrow will be sunshine.
author: Jack Ma

quote: Software is like sex: it's better when it's free.
author: Linus Torvalds

quote: A man always has two reasons for doing anything: a good reason and the real reason.
author: J. P. Morgan

quote: Everything happens kind of the way it's supposed to happen, and we just watch it unfold. And you can't control it. Looking back, you can't say, 'I should've... ' You didn't, and had you, the outcome would have been different.
author: Rick Rubin

quote: Let your joy be in your journey - not in some distant goal.
author: Tim Cook

quote: He who lives by the crystal ball will eat shattered glass.
author: Ray Dalio

quote: Before you are a leader, success is all about growing yourself. When you become a leader, success is all about growing others.
author: Jack Welch

quote: Cooking with kids is not just about ingredients, recipes, and cooking. It's about harnessing imagination, empowerment, and creativity.
author: Guy Fieri

quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: The real key to making money in stocks is not to get scared out of them.
author: Peter Lynch

quote: I've been fortunate to be around good people.
author: Phil Knight

quote: It is nice to be important, but it's more important to be nice.
author: John Templeton

quote: When you're surrounded by people who share a passionate commitment around a common purpose, anything is possible.
author: Howard Schultz

quote: If you owe the bank $100 that's your problem. If you owe the bank $100 million, that's the bank's problem.
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: Talent without effort is wasted talent. And while effort is the one thing you can control in your life, applying that effort intelligently is next on the list.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: It's remarkable how much long-term advantage people like us have gotten by trying to be consistently not stupid, instead of trying to be very intelligent.
author: Charlie Munger

quote: Heck, nobody gets along perfectly. But what we have is respect for one another. We have a system where one guy can veto anything.
author: Bruce Nordstrom

quote: An expert knows all the answers - if you ask the right questions.
author: Levi Strauss

quote: When you wake up every day, you have two choices. You can either be positive or negative; an optimist or a pessimist. I choose to be an optimist. It's all a matter of perspective.
author: Harvey Mackay

quote: Think little goals and expect little achievements. Think big goals and win big success.
author: David Joseph Schwartz

quote: 'Minecraft' is to a large degree about having unique experiences that nobody else has had. The levels are randomly generated, and you can build anything you want to build yourself.
author: Markus Persson

quote: Often any decision, even the wrong decision, is better than no decision.
author: Ben Horowitz

quote: If each of us hires people who are smaller than we are, we shall become a company of dwarfs. But if each of us hires people who are bigger than we are, we shall become a company of giants.
author: David Ogilvy

quote: Space is an inspirational concept that allows you to dream big.
author: Peter Diamandis

quote: I was now resolved to do everything in my power to defeat the system.
author: Oskar Schindler

quote: Business is war. I go out there, I want to kill the competitors. I want to make their lives miserable. I want to steal their market share. I want them to fear me and I want everyone on my team thinking we're going to win.
author: Kevin O'Leary

quote: Hackers are breaking the systems for profit. Before, it was about intellectual curiosity and pursuit of knowledge and thrill, and now hacking is big business.
author: Kevin Mitnick

quote: Leaders don't create followers, they create more leaders.
author: Tom Peters

quote: Your employees come first. And if you treat your employees right, guess what? Your customers come back, and that makes your shareholders happy. Start with employees and the rest follows from that.
author: Herb Kelleher

quote: The greatest gift of leadership is a boss who wants you to be successful.
author: Jon Taffer

quote: Sometimes we make the process more complicated than we need to. We will never make a journey of a thousand miles by fretting about how long it will take or how hard it will be. We make the journey by taking each day step by step and then repeating it again and again until we reach our destination.
author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: Body language and tone of voice - not words - are our most powerful assessment tools.
author: Christopher Voss

quote: Every man has his price, or a guy like me couldn't exist.
author: Howard Hughes

quote: Donald Trump is proud of the fact that he's never written an e-mail.
author: John McAfee

quote: Bitcoin is a swarm of cyber hornets serving the goddess of wisdom, feeding on the fire of truth, exponentially growing ever smarter, faster, and stronger behind a wall of encrypted energy.
author: Michael J. Saylor

quote: You have to accept your fate; do it without bitterness and stay humble.
author: Anthony Scaramucci

quote: A car for every purse and purpose.
author: Alfred P. Sloan

quote: A dream becomes a goal when action is taken toward its achievement.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: Vision without action is merely a dream. Action without vision just passes the time. Vision with action can change the world.
author: Joel A. Barker

quote: Life is a series of waves to be embraced and overcome.
author: Danny Meyer

quote: When I work fourteen hours a day, seven days a week, I get lucky.
author: Armand Hammer

quote: For society to progress, we should not only move forward but also clean up after ourselves.
author: Boyan Slat

quote: The growth and development of people is the highest calling of leadership.
author: Harvey S. Firestone

quote: This union has been divided in like a civil war - brother against brother - sister against sister. And I'm pulling it together. We've already seen evidence of that in New York, in Pennsylvania, in California. The first thing is we have to get on the same page. We have to be united in one cause.
author: James P. Hoffa

quote: Build something 100 people love, not something 1 million people kind of like.
author: Brian Chesky

quote: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
author: Conrad Hilton

quote: The Church is not an automobile showroom - a place to put ourselves on display so that others can admire our spirituality, capacity, or prosperity. It is more like a service center, where vehicles in need of repair come for maintenance and rehabilitation.
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: You speak things into existence, but there's a gift and a curse with that. You got to be careful what you say.
author: Damon Dash

quote: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
author: Nido Qubein

quote: Soros has taught me that when you have tremendous conviction on a trade, you have to go for the jugular. It takes courage to be a pig. It takes courage to ride a profit with huge leverage.
author: Stanley Druckenmiller

quote: In short, software is eating the world.
author: Marc Andreessen

quote: Growth is painful. Change is painful. But, nothing is as painful as staying stuck where you do not belong.
author: N. R. Narayana Murthy

quote: An organization, no matter how well designed, is only as good as the people who live and work in it.
author: Dee Hock

quote: The role of leadership is to transform the complex situation into small pieces and prioritize them.
author: Carlos Ghosn

quote: The number one benefit of information technology is that it empowers people to do what they want to do. It lets people be creative. It lets people be productive. It lets people learn things they didn't think they could learn before, and so in a sense it is all about potential.
author: Steve Ballmer

quote: Experience is making mistakes and learning from them.
author: Bill Ackman

quote: Privacy is not for sale, and human rights should not be compromised out of fear or greed.
author: Pavel Durov

quote: We want transportation as reliable as running water.
author: Travis Kalanick

quote: I think the harder you work, the more luck you have.
author: Dave Thomas

quote: Personality is to a man what perfume is to a flower.
author: Charles M. Schwab

quote: Everyone who's ever taken a shower has an idea. It's the person who gets out of the shower, dries off and does something about it who makes a difference.
author: Nolan Bushnell

quote: You don't have to be a genius or a visionary or even a college graduate to be successful. You just need a framework and a dream.
author: Michael Dell

quote: Whereas most technologies tend to automate workers on the periphery doing menial tasks, blockchains automate away the center. Instead of putting the taxi driver out of a job, blockchain puts Uber out of a job and lets the taxi drivers work with the customer directly.
author: Vitalik Buterin

quote: Everyone says Toyota is the best company in the world, but the customer doesn't care about the world. They care if we are the best in town, or not. That's what I want to be.
author: Akio Toyoda

quote: You can't stop people printing what they want to print.
author: Alan Sugar

quote: The best way to conduct research on a larger scale is to make sure everyone knows what everyone else is doing... The sooner the better - start talking to other people about what you're doing. Because that's what will stimulate things the fastest.
author: James Harris Simons

quote: Hacking involves a different way of looking at problems that no one's thought of.
author: Walter O'Brien

quote: You must always be able to predict what's next and then have the flexibility to evolve.
author: Marc Benioff

quote: Passion provides purpose, but data drives decisions.
author: Andy Dunn

quote: Empathy, humanity and support for each other is more important than revenue, than growth.
author: Eric Yuan

quote: A founder can carry an institution only so far, and then others have to step in, even the alumni. That's how an institution becomes one.
author: Shiv Nadar

quote: It takes a lot of courage to release the familiar and seemingly secure, to embrace the new. But there is no real security in what is no longer meaningful. There is more security in the adventurous and exciting, for in movement there is life, and in change there is power.
author: Alan Cohen

quote: You can say the right thing about a product and nobody will listen. You've got to say it in such a way that people will feel it in their gut. Because if they don't feel it, nothing will happen.
author: William Bernbach

quote: The most dangerous thing for a branded product is low interest.
author: Dietrich Mateschitz

quote: We've created these little tiny tubes, which we call the 'nanotainers,' which are designed to replace the big, traditional tubes that come from your arm, and instead allow for all the testing to be done from a tiny drop from a finger.
author: Elizabeth Holmes

quote: I don't really like the word 'fair' because life isn't fair. But if you are committed to what you want to do and you feel like you belong, then the next best thing for you to do is to execute.
author: Rich Paul

quote: There are two types of companies: those that have been hacked, and those who don't know they have been hacked.
author: John T. Chambers

quote: Do what you love, and do it well - that's much more meaningful than any metric.
author: Kevin Systrom

quote: We are drowning in information but starved for knowledge.
author: John Naisbitt

quote: A good idea is about ten percent and implementation and hard work, and luck is 90 percent.
author: Guy Kawasaki

quote: When you're a snake charmer, you're gonna get bit.
author: LaVar Ball

quote: Nationalism can be a destructive force when it promotes intolerance and division. But it can also be a force for good, when it seeks to defend local autonomy against the homogenizing forces of larger entities.
author: Maxime Bernier

quote: Fear of failure must never be a reason not to try something.
author: Frederick W. Smith

quote: Brands are all about trust. That trust is built in drops and lost in buckets.
author: Kevin Plank

quote: Use the energy that fear creates to focus the mind more intently on the present moment - where fear doesn't exist.
author: John Mackey

quote: When you reach for the stars you may not quite get one, but you won't come up with a handful of mud either.
author: Leo Burnett

quote: Details matter. They create depth, and depth creates authenticity.
author: Neil Blumenthal

quote: Sustainability is no longer about doing less harm. It's about doing more good.
author: Jochen Zeitz

quote: It's very refreshing to go away and take a break, to clear your head, and just get into something else.
author: Francois Nars

quote: When employees are happy, they are your very best ambassadors.
author: James Sinegal

quote: Capri on the Amalfi Coast in Italy is my ultimate holiday destination.
author: Vidal Sassoon

quote: Leadership is having a compelling vision, a comprehensive plan, relentless implementation, and talented people working together.
author: Alan Mulally

quote: A smart man makes a mistake, learns from it, and never makes that mistake again. But a wise man finds a smart man and learns from him how to avoid the mistake altogether.
author: Roy H. Williams

quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Only when the tide goes out do you discover who's been swimming naked.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: I would rather earn 1% off a 100 people's efforts than 100% of my own efforts.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: There is nothing so useless as doing efficiently that which should not be done at all.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: You don't learn to walk by following rules. You learn by doing, and by falling over.
author: Richard Branson

quote: Swim upstream. Go the other way. Ignore the conventional wisdom.

quote: My father always used to say that when you die, if you've got five real friends, then you've had a great life.

quote: Most good programmers do programming not because they expect to get paid or get adulation by the public, but because it is fun to program.

quote: Go as far as you can see; when you get there, you'll be able to see farther.
author: J. P. Morgan

quote: Usually when I start a new project there's a fear of the unknown; maybe it's a band I've never been in the studio with before. People are so different. It's almost like you need to go through the process, discover and unlock what it is that makes that band that band. And a lot of times they don't know it.

quote: Life is a painting, and you are the artist. You have on your palette all the colors in the spectrum - the same ones available to Michaelangelo and DaVinci.

quote: Over the long run, the price of gold approximates the total amount of money in circulation divided by the size of the gold stock. If the market price of gold moves a long way from this level, it may indicate a buying or selling opportunity.

quote: Face reality as it is, not as it was or as you wish it to be.

quote: Cooking is all about people. Food is maybe the only universal thing that really has the power to bring everyone together. No matter what culture, everywhere around the world, people get together to eat.

quote: Thinking will not overcome fear but action will.

quote: The person that turns over the most rocks wins the game. And that's always been my philosophy.
author: Peter Lynch

quote: At first, we couldn't be establishment, because we didn't have any money. We were guerrilla marketers, and we still are, a little bit. But, as we became No. 1 in our industry, we've had to modify our culture and become a bit more planned.

quote: Don't quack like a duck, soar like an eagle.
author: Ken Blanchard

quote: Leaders don't look backwards to condemn what has already been done; they look forward to create a better future.

quote: I made my money by selling too soon.
author: Bernard Baruch

quote: I'm a little bit of an eternal optimist. People always say to me, 'If you go do this and it fails, what are you going to do?' I don't care. I'm going to give it my best shot. That's what I'm going to do. If it doesn't work, it doesn't work. And I'll try again.

quote: Gifts make slaves.

quote: When you have a dream that you can't let go of, trust your instincts and pursue it. But remember: Real dreams take work, They take patience, and sometimes they require you to dig down very deep. Be sure you're willing to do that.

quote: Video games are meant to be just one thing: Fun! Fun for everyone.

quote: It's easy to blame technology for what we perceive to be a vast disconnect between people. We're so wrapped up in social media, texting, online dating - in many ways, we're addicted to our devices.

quote: Every time you make the hard, correct decision you become a bit more courageous, and every time you make the easy, wrong decision you become a bit more cowardly. If you are CEO, these choices will lead to a courageous or cowardly company.

quote: I may be wrong, but I am never in doubt! And anyone who has been around me for even a minute understands that my self-confidence and self-esteem is sometimes overwhelming!

quote: Your mindset matters. It affects everything - from the business and investment decisions you make, to the way you raise your children, to your stress levels and overall well-being.

quote: People are chasing cash, not happiness. When you chase money, you're going to lose. You're just going to. Even if you get the money, you're not going to be happy.

quote: Infrastructure sector is all about building assets for the country. It is part of nation building.

quote: Power should be reserved for weightlifting and boats, and leadership really involves responsibility.
author: Herb Kelleher

quote: AI is neither good nor evil. It's a tool. It's a technology for us to use.

quote: Observe, orient, decide, act. It's fighter pilot terminology. If you have the faster OODA loop in a dogfight, you live. The other person dies. In Silicon Valley, the OODA loop of your decision-making is effectively what differentiates your ability to succeed.

quote: If I only had a little humility, I'd be perfect.
author: Ted Turner

quote: We live in a world in which courage is in less supply than genius.

quote: Once you consent to some concession, you can never cancel it and put things back the way they are.

quote: A lot of hacking is playing with other people, you know, getting them to do strange things.

quote: Bitcoin is a bank in cyberspace, run by incorruptible software, offereing a global, affordable, simple an dsecure savings account to billions of people that don't have the option or desire to run their own hedge fund.

quote: Don't wait for the perfect time to start making changes to your life; the time is now.

quote: You have to have a dream, whether big or small. Then plan well, focus, work hard, and be very determined to achieve your goals.

quote: Eagles don't flock, you have to find them one at a time.

quote: When you drop any new idea in the pond of the world, you get a ripple effect. You have to be aware that you will be creating a cascade of change.

quote: Hospitality is almost impossible to teach. It's all about hiring the right people.
author: Danny Meyer

quote: Regrets and recriminations only hurt your soul.

quote: The North Sea can be a pretty violent place.

quote: It doesn't matter how hard you work, there are forces that kind of prevent you from being the best you can be.

quote: Time is your friend; impulse is your enemy.

quote: The best teamwork comes from men who are working independently toward one goal in unison.

quote: Belonging has always been a fundamental driver of humankind.

quote: Everybody has equal opportunity, and I think that is true for everything.

quote: Some of the wealthiest people in the world became wealthy by saving money.

quote: There is a beauty and clarity that comes from simplicity that we sometimes do not appreciate in our thirst for intricate solutions.

quote: How can another man call another man boss? That's like calling another man 'Daddy.'

quote: To be successful, you have to have your heart in your business and your business in your heart.

quote: I like putting all my eggs in one basket and then watching the basket very carefully.

quote: The spread of computers and the Internet will put jobs in two categories. People who tell computers what to do, and people who are told by computers what to do.

quote: Nobody is bothered about an institution more than its alumni.

quote: If you look to lead, invest at least 40% of your time managing yourself - your ethics, character, principles, purpose, motivation, and conduct. Invest at least 30% managing those with authority over you, and 15% managing your peers.

quote: Money cannot buy peace of mind. It cannot heal ruptured relationships, or build meaning into a life that has none.

quote: Those who rule data will rule the entire world.

quote: As the world becomes a more digital place, we cannot forget about the human connection.

quote: Making money is my third or fourth most favorite thing in the world.

quote: Sustainability has to be a way of life to be a way of business.

quote: I own a home in Kyoto, Japan actually on the temple on grounds in Nanzenji that is going to become a Japanese art museum.

quote: System-wide changes rely on a critical mass of interested parties, all willing to enter into deep partnerships and collaborations, founded on new levels of trust and a commitment to action, not debate.

quote: It is in Toyota's DNA that mistakes made once will not be repeated.

quote: The Chinese were good to us. The war years for us Russians in China were very good years.

quote: We all have a responsibility to try and make this world better, whether it's through our work, the causes we champion, the way that we treat people, or the values we impart to the next generation.

quote: America in 2016 is on the path to becoming what Germany was in 1867.

quote: I am excited to join the Workday Board at an exciting time in the company's growth and look forward to leveraging my past experience as a technologist and entrepreneur to provide advice as they continue to look at new areas of growth.

quote: Education is and will be the most powerful tool for individual and social change, and we must do all that it takes to facilitate it.

quote: Excellence endures and sustains. It goes beyond motivation into the realms of inspiration.

quote: As long as a house is like yours, and as long as you work together with your brothers, not a house in the world will be able to compete with you, to cause you harm or to take advantage of you, for together you can undertake and perform more than any house in the world.

quote: I always say the dents in a man's armor show he's battle-tested.

quote: I take a lot of personal pride and motivation to be able to make a difference in areas that may fall through the cracks in R&D across the industry.

quote: Clarity affords focus.

quote: What's in your closet, John Podesta?

quote: I do not listen to criticism or flattery, one weakens you and the other angers you.

quote: Obviously everyone wants to be successful, but I want to be looked back on as being very innovative, very trusted and ethical and ultimately making a big difference in the world.

quote: If we bring together the right people, communities can flourish and wildlife can survive alongside them.

quote: Always plenty to do. Cannot well be idle and believe will rather wear out than rust out.

quote: A working woman could save a few shillings a week, and then every five weeks she'd come in and we'd cut her hair. She could shampoo it under the shower, swing it and dry it off or just let it dry by itself. It changed the lives of many young girls who'd never had the opportunity to be styled like that before.
author: Vidal Sassoon

quote: Self-awareness is a trait - or maybe 'practice' is the more accurate way to put it - that everyone can always improve at. It is part emotional intelligence, part perceptiveness, part critical thinking. It means knowing your weaknesses, of course, but it also means knowing your strengths and what motivates you.

quote: True icons are larger than life, unforgettable with an elegance that's mesmerizingly timeless.

quote: You need to have a can-do attitude. There is always a way.

quote: Some people don't like change, but you need to embrace change if the alternative is disaster.

quote: It takes 20 years to build a reputation and five minutes to ruin it. If you think about that, you'll do things differently.

quote: The way to make money is to buy when blood is running in the streets.

quote: Management is doing things right; leadership is doing the right things.

quote: Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.

quote: Outstanding leaders go out of their way to boost the self-esteem of their personnel. If people believe in themselves, it's amazing what they can accomplish.

quote: If Microsoft ever does applications for Linux it means I've won.

quote: The quality of a leader is reflected in the standards they set for themselves.

quote: Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of a commitment to excellence, intelligent planning, and focused effort.

quote: Information technology is at the core of how you do your business and how your business model itself evolves.

quote: Can we all please - I don't want anybody buying cryptocurrencies, okay? Stop it. Enough already. Or buy Bitcoin, don't buy Ethereum.

quote: I believe all religions are becoming obsolete, clinging to ancient concepts.

quote: The meek shall inherit the Earth, but not its mineral rights.

quote: There's more honor in investment management than in investment banking.

quote: It is important for us to understand where we came from and how we got here because it would be very foolish of us to get off that horse we rode in on.

quote: To some people I'll always be the bad guy.

quote: I don't like politics. I am not aligned to any political party. I have friends in all political parties.

quote: To say that AI will start doing what it wants for its own purposes is like saying a calculator will start making its own calculations.

quote: The United States has got some of the dumbest people in the world. I want you to know that we know that.

quote: I suspect Obama did not know he was recording Angela Merkel's cell phones.

quote: Nearly every moment of every day, we have the opportunity to give something to someone else - our time, our love, our resources.

quote: When you're doing something you're truly passionate about, there is no plan B.

quote: If you fail, do not be discouraged.

quote: There's two or three managers I can't stand. I detest them and they know that.

quote: In investing, you get what you don't pay for. Costs matter. So intelligent investors will use low-cost index funds to build a diversified portfolio of stocks and bonds, and they will stay the course. And they won't be foolish enough to think that they can consistently outsmart the market.

quote: Luck is always the last refuge of laziness and incompetence.

quote: I generally think that I should only speak by action and not by words.

quote: The practice of charity will bind us - will bind all men in one great brotherhood.

quote: I come to work, and I have a good time. I have no reason to change anything that I do.

quote: Google is working on self-driving cars, and they seem to work. People are so bad at driving cars that computers don't have to be that good to be much better.

quote: It's easy to play it safe, but the reality is that if you want to keep changing the world for customers, which we all want to do, you have to make bets and you have to be willing to fail.

quote: Time is the most precious resource there is - you have to protect it.

quote: Life... It tends to respond to our outlook, to shape itself to meet our expectations.

quote: There's no chance that the iPhone is going to get any significant market share.

quote: To be truly free, you should be ready to risk everything for freedom.

quote: You can't control who you fall in love with.

quote: In the beginning there was nothing and God said 'Let there be light', and there was still nothing but everybody could see it.

quote: Our business is about technology, yes. But it's also about operations and customer relationships.

quote: We think a modern cloud lets you decide when you want to upgrade. We don't decide for you.

quote: I've always thought legal addictions are a great way to create a business. Starbucks is a wonderful example.

quote: Bitcoin is great as a form of digital money, but its scripting language is too weak for any kind of serious advanced applications to be built on top.

quote: We don't need flashy cars, impressive titles, uniforms, or other status symbols. We rely on our strength and our will!

quote: Repeat anything often enough and it will start to become you.
author: Tom Hopkins

quote: When you're nice, you're not bullying people. But when you're kind, you stand up against the bully.
author: Daniel Lubetzky

quote: It's common in rural Ireland to pick up a nickname that relates to an animal, bird, or a spider. Mine became 'scorpion' because I fought back, and scorpions are docile creatures until pushed too far.
author: Walter O'Brien

quote: Nothing is more important, certainly during these times of artificial intelligence, than our public education. And as it continues to grow and evolve, I think you and I know this is going to be critical that we are constantly training and retraining and creating these next-generation jobs.

quote: What separates humans from other animals is our empathy. With the possible exception of bonobos, we are the most empathetic animal on the planet.
author: Andy Dunn

quote: You are in integrity when the life you are living on the outside matches who you are on the inside.
author: Alan Cohen

quote: Advertising is fundamentally persuasion and persuasion happens to be not a science, but an art.
author: William Bernbach

quote: When launching a product called an Energy Drink and named Red Bull, a product that stimulates body and mind, it is a short step to the roots where Red Bull came from. We have been doing this for 20 years - now it's called adventure sports, extreme sports, and outdoor sports.

quote: We are like the mechanism of a watch: each part is essential.
author: Nathan Meyer Rothschild

quote: The worst possible thing in the world is to have someone who doesn't believe in you.
author: Elizabeth Holmes

quote: All things come down to your personal relationships.
author: Rex Tillerson

quote: Never ask your employees to do something you wouldn't be willing to do yourself.
author: John T. Chambers

quote: Leadership involves finding a parade and getting in front of it.
author: John Naisbitt

quote: No wife can endure a gambling husband; unless he is a steady winner.
author: Thomas Dewar

quote: The Democratic Media Complex, in its pursuit of Orwellian hate-crime legislation, reparations, and sundry non-ameliorative resolutions to America's troubled racial past, pursues its victims with blood lust.
author: Andrew Breitbart

quote: It's nice to have dreams, but when you use borrowed money to achieve them and act as if money grows on trees, you may have a brutal awakening.
author: Maxime Bernier

quote: Don't worry about what I'm doing. I take care of mine.

quote: There's a truth about public service that is often unspoken and rarely understood - that the role of our elected officials is about much more than balancing budgets and ensuring the delivery of essential services.
author: J. B. Pritzker

quote: Information about the package is as important as the package itself.
author: Frederick W. Smith

quote: Psychology is important but motivation is something that if you don't have it inside then you can't provide it.
author: Diego Simeone

quote: I got my first computer when I was 6, and I was part of that early generation of children who grew up with computers always being around. I fell in love with them early on.

quote: Good advertising does not just circulate information. It penetrates the public mind with desires and belief.
author: Leo Burnett

quote: I tried to get us what I thought was the equivalent of a Romo with Quincy Carter in the third round.
author: Jerry Jones

quote: You must always do what you feel is right.
author: Vidal Sassoon

quote: Looking at flowers, simple things in life. I don't need to look at gold and a castle; sometimes its very simple things that are very beautiful. I am keeping my eyes fresh to find beauty in many places, and in gold, too, sometimes!
author: Francois Nars

quote: Every generation trash-talks younger generations. Baby boomers labeled Generation X a group of tattooed slackers and materialists; Generation Xers have branded millennials as iPhone-addicted brats.
author: Neil Blumenthal

quote: Heart power is stronger than horsepower.
author: Henry J. Heinz

quote: If you hire good people, give them good jobs, and pay them good wages, generally something good is going to happen.
author: James Sinegal

quote: I'd rather be optimistic and wrong than pessimistic and right.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Chains of habit are too light to be felt until they are too heavy to be broken.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: We always overestimate the change that will occur in the next two years and underestimate the change that will occur in the next ten. Don't let yourself be lulled into inaction.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Exercise is bunk. If you are healthy, you don't need it: if you are sick you should not take it.
author: Henry Ford

quote: There is little success where there is little laughter.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: Move fast with stable infrastructure.
author: Mark Zuckerberg

quote: Help young people. Help small guys. Because small guys will be big. Young people will have the seeds you bury in their minds, and when they grow up, they will change the world.
author: Jack Ma

quote: Life's too short to hang out with people who aren't resourceful.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: Well, I don't know as I want a lawyer to tell me what I cannot do. I hire him to tell how to do what I want to do.
author: J. P. Morgan

quote: Everything I do, whether it's producing or signing an artist, always starts with the songs. When I'm listening, I'm looking for a balance that you could see in anything. Whether it's a great painting or a building or a sunset.

quote: You want to be the pebble in the pond that creates the ripple for change.
author: Tim Cook

quote: I definitely fall into the camp of thinking of AI as augmenting human capability and capacity.
author: Satya Nadella

quote: An organization's ability to learn, and translate that learning into action rapidly, is the ultimate competitive advantage.
author: Jack Welch

quote: I'm not a religious person by any means.
author: Guy Fieri

quote: Have the courage to say no. Have the courage to face the truth. Do the right thing because it is right. These are the magic keys to living your life with integrity.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: You know what it's like to wake up in the middle of the night with a vivid dream? And you know that if you don't have a pencil and pad by the bed, it will be completely gone by the next morning. Sometimes it's important to wake up and stop dreaming. When a really great dream shows up, grab it.
author: Larry Page

quote: Sports is like rock 'n' roll. Both are dominant cultural forces, both speak an international language, and both are all about emotions.
author: Phil Knight

quote: It's self-centered to think that human beings, as limited as we are, can describe divinity.
author: John Templeton

quote: I was taken by the power that savoring a simple cup of coffee can have to connect people and create community.

quote: If you can actually count your money, then you're not a rich man.

quote: I have survivor's remorse.

quote: I believe Costco does more for civilization than the Rockefeller Foundation. I think it's a better place. You get a bunch of very intelligent people sitting around trying to do good, I immediately get kind of suspicious and squirm in my seat.

quote: When we go out to the university, the professors always say, 'Tell these students about your five-year plan and your 10-year plan,' and I say, 'Gee, we're lucky if we have a year plan.'

quote: If I had learned education I would not have had time to learn anything else.
author: Cornelius Vanderbilt

quote: Every morning brings new potential, but if you dwell on the misfortunes of the day before, you tend to overlook tremendous opportunities.

quote: Nintendo's mission is to try to make people happy, to try to make people smile.

quote: Just make games for yourself and try to have a critical eye to what you do. If you genuinely like the game, there will be other people who like it as well.
author: Markus Persson

quote: In life, everybody faces choices between doing what's popular, easy, and wrong vs. doing what's lonely, difficult, and right. These decisions intensify when you run a company, because the consequences get magnified 1,000 fold. As in life, the excuses for CEOs making the wrong choice are always plentiful.

quote: If you don't embrace a workload others would consider crazy, then your goal doesn't mean that much to you.
author: Dan Pena

quote: At its core, bitcoin is a smart currency designed by very forward-thinking engineers. It eliminates the need for banks, gets rid of credit card fees, currency exchange fees, money transfer fees, and reduces the need for lawyers in transitions... all good things.

quote: My dad is like a cactus - introverted and tough. I'm a people person, like my mom, but I got my competitiveness from my dad. He came to this country from Belarus with nothing and built a real business. He's my hero for giving me that need to run a business and for having enormous confidence in me.

quote: Companies spend millions of dollars on firewalls, encryption, and secure access devices and it's money wasted because none of these measures address the weakest link in the security chain: the people who use, administer, operate and account for computer systems that contain protected information.

quote: I'm a school dropout. So, at the age of 16, I moved to Mumbai to try my luck on some business.
author: Gautam Adani

quote: Management is about arranging and telling. Leadership is about nurturing and enhancing.

quote: Southwest isn't a 'This is my job, that's your job' kind of company. Being successful is our job, and we're willing to do whatever it takes to achieve that.

quote: Human interaction is something that I believe, as humans, we crave for. And that is where bars and social environments come into play.

quote: Sports is like a war without the killing.
author: Ted Turner

quote: You can find peace amidst the storms that threaten you.
author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: There are no patents in finance.
author: Stephen A. Schwarzman

quote: Wherever smart people work, doors are unlocked.
author: Steve Wozniak

quote: Whenever teenage girls and corporate CEOs covet the same new technology, something extraordinary is happening.

quote: Let me tell you something about myself. I am a straight shooter.

quote: If we are all in agreement on the decision - then I propose we postpone further discussion of this matter until our next meeting to give ourselves time to develop disagreement and perhaps gain some understanding of what the decision is all about.

quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.

quote: Usually the first problems you solve with the new paradigm are the ones that were unsolvable with the old paradigm.
author: Joel A. Barker

quote: Hospitality is present when something happens for you. It is absent when something happens to you. Those two simple prepositions - for and to - express it all.

quote: It's in my nature that when people say something is impossible I like to prove them wrong.

quote: You get the best out of others when you get the best out of yourself.

quote: Enjoy the magic of compounding returns. Even modest investments made in one's early 20s are likely to grow to staggering amounts over the course of an investment lifetime.

quote: As a rule, we find what we look for; we achieve what we get ready for.

quote: Mobile internet will be the single-most defining technology of this century for human development.

quote: Sometimes, you can learn more from criticism than you can from flattery.

quote: There's certain lines you just don't cross. You know the one thing that will get a man out of pocket is when you mess with his children.

quote: Follow the path of the unsafe, independent thinker. Expose your ideas to the danger of controversy. Speak your mind and fear less the label of 'crackpot' than the stigma of conformity.

quote: The reason Netflix chose to use AWS is because they knew they'd be treated as every bit as important a customer as Amazon the retailer is.

quote: Everything ends; you just have to figure out a way to push to the finish line.

quote: If England became a world power, it was because of the industrial revolution.

quote: It turns out that all Netflix streaming peak on Saturday night can fit inside a single fiber optic, which is the size of one human hair.

quote: Any job very well done that has been carried out by a person who is fully dedicated is always a source of inspiration.

quote: Apple is a failure because they missed social? Nobody would say that, because they are having great success.

quote: Italian food is simple and healthy, and it's easier for a vegetarian to choose something from the menu.

quote: At Uber, we say, 'Always be hustling.' Even if you are an introvert and you haven't got hustle in you, you better get a co-founder who does. And if you haven't got enough hustle to find a co-founder who's got hustle, it's going to be tough. You've got to have a little hustle in you.

quote: We talk nonstop about what needs to be changed, and everyone has excuses for why the changes can't happen. I believe we must change our educational system first to get the changes moving forward. I'm happy to be a voice and get in front of an audience who can help by making education a priority.

quote: When you set the right targets, aspirations, and you work efficiently and diligently, the numbers happen.

quote: Sustainability makes good business sense, and we're all on the same team at the end of the day. That's the truth about the human condition.

quote: There's no limit possible to the expansion of each one of us.

quote: Trouble results when the speed of growth exceeds the speed of nurturing human resources. To use the analogy of growth rings in a tree, when unusually rapid growth caused the rings to grow abnormally thick, the tree trunk weakens and is easily broken.

quote: A developer who is not optimistic shouldn't be a developer.

quote: It will take a brave person to cull the benefits system and analyse who deserves and who doesn't.

quote: I am not judged by the number of times I fail, but by the number of times I succeed; and the number of times I succeed is in direct proportion to the number of times I can fail and keep on trying.

quote: I am the American Dream.

quote: Most of all, I discovered that in order to succeed with a product you must truly get to know your customers and build something for them.

quote: Failure holds the seeds for greatness - so long as you water those seeds with introspection, they can be the root of your success.

quote: You have got the right strategy, the right geography; you have got the right customers. You need to prioritise them better; we need to grow them better, mind them better. We need to give more value to them, and we need to execute a lot of areas in the organisation where we are not executing.

quote: There are almost no sports within which mortal accidents are not a reality.

quote: In the business world, we can point to instances when a lack of integrity has bankrupted entire companies - in sectors as different as finance, telecommunications, manufacturing, and energy.

quote: I definitely am afraid of needles. It's the only thing that actually scares me.

quote: The most powerful element in advertising is the truth.
author: William Bernbach

quote: Does anyone really believe a four-year degree is what separates an ethical person from a con artist?

quote: There are two equalizers in life: the Internet and education.

quote: I always tried to live my life as though nothing changed. People would say, 'You can have a Rolls-Royce'. I'd say to that, 'What do I want with a Rolls-Royce when I can have a Volkswagen or a bike?' Some people get carried away with the juice.

quote: If you focus on producing a great experience for anyone, that's how you get big.

quote: As long as it is supported by Democratic politicians and by liberal Hollywood players, censorship is a useful tool to stifle dissent.

quote: Simple and to the point is always the best way to get your point across.

quote: Movement isn't progress.

quote: Curiosity about life in all of its aspects, I think, is still the secret of great creative people.

quote: If you don't look good, we don't look good.

quote: You can design and create, and build the most wonderful place in the world. But it takes people to make the dream a reality.

quote: Patience is a virtue, and I'm learning patience. It's a tough lesson.

quote: Risk comes from not knowing what you're doing.

quote: A friendship founded on business is better than a business founded on friendship.

quote: You cannot push any one up a ladder unless he be willing to climb a little himself.

quote: We are continually faced by great opportunities brilliantly disguised as insoluble problems.

quote: My name is Linus, and I am your God.

quote: If you work just for money, you'll never make it, but if you love what you're doing and you always put the customer first, success will be yours.

quote: I don't get caught up in the moment.

quote: It's very clear that AI is going to impact every industry. I think that every nation needs to make sure that AI is a part of their national strategy. Every country will be impacted.

quote: Don't bottom fish.

quote: Meeting sports athletes that are the best in the world is a thrill to this day.

quote: I thought, I'm only going to be on this planet once, and only for a short time. What can I do with my life that will lead to permanent benefits?

quote: The biggest quest to learn anything is curiosity. If you are curious about something, you will go and dig.

quote: What I love is to win. What I love is being number one.

quote: Talent is God-given; be humble. Fame is man-given; be thankful. Conceit is self-given; be careful.

quote: Trust your passion. Believe in your dream.

quote: Rap helps me connect emotionally.

quote: Jim Newman, the business visionary who created the term 'comfort zone,' showed me how to expand my horizons. Thanks to Jim, after I attended one of his PACE Seminars in 1978; I moved out of my comfort zone at Bear Stearns and became a super successful oilman.

quote: Nothing is more precious than life... especially the life of your child.

quote: If you saw a dog going to be crushed under a car, wouldn't you help him?

quote: As a young boy, I was taught in high school that hacking was cool.

quote: Any commodity that sees its price going higher will see new mines opening up. When the supply increases, the prices soften. When prices fall, some mines with higher production costs will shut down as they become unviable.

quote: I think success is a relative term. If you're a caveman, success is capturing an elephant. Success is achieving better than the norm. Success is being exceptional. It's exceptional reputation, exceptional income, and exceptional respect.

quote: I struggled to get through high school. I didn't get to go to college. But it made me realize you can do anything if you want to bad enough.

quote: Labor Day is seen as a day of rest for many hardworking Americans.

quote: Leadership is about doing the right thing, even if it going against a vast number of naysayers and mediocre people.

quote: If you have a dream, give it a chance to happen.

quote: Accessible design is good design.

quote: I hate 'Mafia Wars'.

quote: Every breakthrough business idea begins with solving a common problem. The bigger the problem, the bigger the opportunity. I discovered a big one when I took apart an IBM PC. quote: If the banks become unreliable lenders, apartment prices will drop dramatically.
author: Harry Triguboff

quote: People look at me and think I am an expert in the automobile industry, and I'm not.

quote: Money is all right but once you have it you learn it's not the be all and end all.

quote: Do what you fear most and you control fear.

quote: Having one of the highest IQs ever measured is as much a curse as it is a blessing. My parents were great, though: they were always seeking the most difficult presents possible for me - Rubik's cubes and things like that.

quote: I strongly believe the business of a business is to improve the world.

quote: Better ingredients, better pizza - it's not a slogan. It's a way of life.

quote: I was the seventh child in a family of eight siblings. We lost our father very young, and my mother had pretty much single-handedly brought us up.

quote: God is a frequency. Stay tuned.

quote: In communications, familiarity breeds apathy.

quote: I don't believe in 50 friends. I believe in a smaller number. Nor do I care about society events. It's the most senseless use of time.

quote: The most disappointing businesses, for me, are the ones where the people flat-out lie. I had one in Queens where I gave them a couple hundred thousand dollars and they started spending it on themselves.

quote: If we can go some way to creating a vibrant anaerobic digestion industry here in the U.K., we will be reaching our goals both in terms of economics and the environment.

quote: I came seriously close to getting married four times, and each time I backed off in fear or for one reason or another. quote: I've said all along that we're building Axovant as a lasting company for the long run, not to hand over that upside to a pharma company in the future.

quote: I cannot think of a more personally rewarding and appropriate use of wealth than to give while one is living.

quote: The most reliable way to forecast the future is to try to understand the present.

quote: Good people hire people better than themselves. So A players hire A+ players. But others hire below their skills to make themselves look good. So B players hire C players. C players hire D players, etc.

quote: You gotta use cuss words when you don't have no intellect.

quote: The electric car, it's not the government saying, 'Oh, we must have electric cars.' The market was ready for that. People were ready for that, so, we have electric cars.

quote: Let me tell you this: if Marco Rubio - even though he's only been in the Senate for a very short period of time, that man has a huge, huge opportunity in this country, and I think he could be the president.

quote: My four years in the Marine Corps left me with an indelible understanding of the value of leadership skills.

quote: Moore's Law-based technology is so much easier than neuroscience. The brain works in such a different way from the way a computer does.

quote: I'm not in it for the money. No, no. I like to run a business that's successful... I'm a very creative person.

quote: What helps people, helps business.

quote: I've been doing long-distance backpacking since 2002 when I hiked the Appalachian Trail. You start to calm down and relax and get into the slower rhythm of nature.

quote: We always strive to be the best in the wage package.

quote: If it were up to me, I'd rather create things that last long-term, but my thrill comes from reflecting what's going on now.

quote: Snapchat really has to do with the way photographs have changed. Historically, photos have always been used to save really important memories: major life moments. But today... pictures are being used for talking.

quote: I am a monkey fan.

quote: You have to lead people gently toward what they already know is right.

quote: If you're not worried that you're pricing it too cheap, you're not pricing it cheap enough.

quote: The curiosity to see the prisoners appears to be unabated.

quote: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The Internet is becoming the town square for the global village of tomorrow.

quote: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.

quote: Right now I'm just delighted to be alive and to have had a nice long bath.

quote: When you give everyone a voice and give people power, the system usually ends up in a really good place. So, what we view our role as, is giving people that power.

quote: When I am myself, I am happy and have a good result.

quote: What's dangerous is not to evolve.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: You really want a company full of missionaries, not mercenaries.
author: Sam Altman

quote: For me, the Beatles are proof of the existence of God.

quote: What all of us have to do is to make sure we are using AI in a way that is for the benefit of humanity, not to the detriment of humanity.

quote: I deeply appreciate all the support and encouragement I have received from people all across India.
author: Satya Nadella

quote: To succeed in business it is necessary to make others see things as you see them.

quote: Without intellectual honesty, you can't have a culture that's willing to tolerate failure because people cling too much to an idea that likely will be bad or isn't working and they feel like their reputation is tied up in it. They can't admit failure.

quote: Food is not just eating energy. It's an experience.
author: Guy Fieri

quote: Truth will always be truth, regardless of lack of understanding, disbelief or ignorance.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: I don't go near the money and the money doesn't go near me.
author: Peter Lynch

quote: We wanted Nike to be the world's best sports and fitness company. Once you say that, you have a focus. You don't end up making wing tips or sponsoring the next Rolling Stones world tour.
author: Phil Knight

quote: I focus on spiritual wealth now, and I'm busier, more enthusiastic, and more joyful than I have ever been.
author: John Templeton

quote: When I took over Louis Vuitton, everyone said, 'It's already so big - what more can you do?' And since then, we've multiplied that success tenfold.
author: Bernard Arnault

quote: In the past a leader was a boss. Today's leaders must be partners with their people... they no longer can lead solely based on positional power.

quote: Because if you're prepared and you know what it takes, it's not a risk. You just have to figure out how to get there. There is always a way to get there.

quote: Vote for the man who promises least; he'll be the least disappointing.

quote: Economies of scale are a good thing. If we didn't have them, we'd still be living in tents and eating buffalo.

quote: There is no friendship in trade.

quote: Know thy self, know thy enemy. A thousand battles, a thousand victories.

quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Experience without theory is blind, but theory without experience is mere intellectual play.

quote: Talent hits a target no one else can hit; Genius hits a target no one else can see.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
author: Epictetus

quote: The discipline of desire is the background of character.
author: John Locke

quote: If you are lonely when you're alone, you are in bad company.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: A man who has nothing for which he is willing to fight, nothing which is more important than his own personal safety, is a miserable creature and has no chance of being free unless made and kept so by the exertions of better men than himself.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: It is no measure of health to be well adjusted to a profoundly sick society.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
author: William James

quote: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: We are not human beings having a spiritual experience. We are spiritual beings having a human experience.
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: Reserve your right to think, for even to think wrongly is better than not to think at all.
author: Hypatia

quote: Let come what comes, let go what goes. See what remains.
author: Ramana Maharshi

quote: Nothing great in the world has ever been accomplished without passion.
author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quote: In the kingdom of the blind, the one-eyed man is king.
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
author: John Dewey

quote: Friends are the siblings God never gave us.
author: Mencius

quote: Permanence, perseverance and persistence in spite of all obstacles, discouragements, and impossibilities: It is this, that in all things distinguishes the strong soul from the weak.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: I believe it is impossible to be sure of anything.
author: Han Fei

quote: I dreamed I was a butterfly, flitting around in the sky; then I awoke. Now I wonder: Am I a man who dreamt of being a butterfly, or am I a butterfly dreaming that I am a man?
author: Zhuangzi

quote: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
author: Maimonides

quote: Without struggle, no progress and no result. Every breaking of habit produces a change in the machine.
author: George Gurdjieff

quote: My life has been full of terrible misfortunes most of which never happened.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Self-respect is the fruit of discipline; the sense of dignity grows with the ability to say no to oneself.
author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quote: Beauty in things exists in the mind which contemplates them.
author: David Hume

quote: Whoever will be free must make himself free. Freedom is no fairy gift to fall into a man's lap. What is freedom? To have the will to be responsible for one's self.
author: Max Stirner

quote: Human nature is evil, and goodness is caused by intentional activity.
author: Xun Kuang

quote: Our knowledge can only be finite, while our ignorance must necessarily be infinite.
author: Karl Popper

quote: The passions grafted on wounded pride are the most inveterate; they are green and vigorous in old age.
author: George Santayana

quote: Out of difficulties grow miracles.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Stretching his hand up to reach the stars, too often man forgets the flowers at his feet.
author: Jeremy Bentham

quote: We adore babies because they're so cute. And, of course, we are amused by jokes because they are funny. This is all backwards. It is. And Darwin shows us why.
author: Daniel Dennett

quote: From each as they choose, to each as they are chosen.
author: Robert Nozick

quote: Every failure is a step to success.
author: William Whewell

quote: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul.
author: Democritus

quote: India Conquered and dominated China culturally for 20 centuries without ever having to send a single soldier across her border.
author: Hu Shih

quote: Coming close to death you begin to know what life means, and what it means is gratitude.
author: Roger Scruton

quote: Life is short and we have never too much time for gladdening the hearts of those who are travelling the dark journey with us. Oh be swift to love, make haste to be kind.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: Time is the father of truth, its mother is our mind.
author: Giordano Bruno

quote: Curiosity begins as an act of tearing to pieces or analysis.
author: Samuel Alexander

quote: It is better to die well than to live badly.
author: Jan Hus

quote: The most difficult thing in life is to know yourself.
author: Thales

quote: I believe that in this new world that we live in, we often have a responsibility, you know, to actually go beyond the thou shalt nots - that is, the not harming others - and say we can help others and we should be helping others.
author: Peter Singer

quote: Listen to the inner light; it will guide you. Listen to inner peace; it will feed you. Listen to inner love; it will transform you, it will divinise you, it will immortalise you.
author: Sri Chinmoy

quote: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
author: Bernard Williams

quote: Society is unity in diversity.
author: George Herbert Mead

quote: Experience by itself is not science.
author: Edmund Husserl

quote: If I had followed the multitude, I should not have studied philosophy.
author: Chrysippus

quote: We're all human beings, in the end, despite our differences.
author: Timothy Morton

quote: The secret of happiness is to admire without desiring. And that is not happiness.
author: F. H. Bradley

quote: We have first raised a dust and then complain we cannot see.
author: George Berkeley

quote: Love without conversation is impossible.
author: Mortimer Adler

quote: Appearances are a glimpse of the unseen.
author: Anaxagoras

quote: I rise to taste the dawn, and find that love alone will shine today.
author: Ken Wilber

quote: In science there are no 'depths'; there is surface everywhere.
author: Rudolf Carnap

quote: The characteristic of scientific progress is our knowing that we did not know.
author: Gaston Bachelard

quote: Bread for myself is a material question. Bread for my neighbor is a spiritual one.
author: Nikolai Berdyaev

quote: Compassion automatically invites you to relate with people because you no longer regard people as a drain on your energy.
author: Chogyam Trungpa

quote: Saturn seems to have impressed the seal of melancholy on me from the beginning.
author: Marsilio Ficino

quote: To be is to be the value of a variable.
author: Willard Van Orman Quine

quote: Mankind is poised midway between the gods and the beasts.
author: Plotinus

quote: Originality is independence, not rebellion; it is sincerity, not antagonism.
author: George Henry Lewes

quote: True enjoyment comes from activity of the mind and exercise of the body; the two are ever united.
author: Wilhelm von Humboldt

quote: Gratitude is the most exquisite form of courtesy.
author: Jacques Maritain

quote: The universal principle of etymology in all languages: words are carried over from bodies and from the properties of bodies to express the things of the mind and spirit. The order of ideas must follow the order of things.
author: Giambattista Vico

quote: One never really knows who one's enemy is.
author: Jurgen Habermas

quote: The nature of God is a circle of which the center is everywhere and the circumference is nowhere.
author: Empedocles

quote: It is the mission of the twentieth century to elucidate the irrational.
author: Maurice Merleau-Ponty

quote: Blessed are the blind, for they know not enough to ask why.
author: Ernest Renan

quote: Written laws are like spiders' webs, and will, like them, only entangle and hold the poor and weak, while the rich and powerful will easily break through them.
author: Anacharsis

quote: Contemplation and wisdom are highest achievements and man is not totally at home with them.
author: Gabriel Marcel

quote: You can't go wrong with fish and chips.
author: Michael Sandel

quote: We must always tell what we see. Above all, and this is more difficult, we must always see what we see.
author: Charles Peguy

quote: Words are potent weapons for all causes, good or bad.
author: Manly Hall

quote: Recognizing truth requires selflessness. You have to leave yourself out of it so you can find out the way things are in themselves, not the way they look to you or how you feel about them or how you would like them to be.
author: Harry Frankfurt

quote: For me, the only sources of moral values are the pursuit of understanding and the pursuit of happiness.
author: Matthew Stewart

quote: Everyone who remembers his own education remembers teachers, not methods and techniques. The teacher is the heart of the educational system.
author: Sidney Hook

quote: Optimism is essential to achievement and it is also the foundation of courage and true progress.
author: Nicholas M. Butler

quote: Wisdom denotes the pursuing of the best ends by the best means.
author: Francis Hutcheson

quote: Poetry is the mother-tongue of the human race.
author: Johann Georg Hamann

quote: By doubting we are led to question, by questioning we arrive at the truth.
author: Peter Abelard

quote: I have this extraordinary curiosity about all subjects of the natural and human world and the interaction between the physical sciences and the social sciences.
author: Ian Hacking

quote: If we would have new knowledge, we must get a whole world of new questions.
author: Susanne Langer

quote: The artist finds, that the more he can confine his attention to a particular part of any work, his productions are the more perfect, and grow under his hands in the greater quantities.
author: Adam Ferguson

quote: And I might add the confidence with which distracted persons do oftentimes, when they are awake, think, they see black fiends in places, where there is no black object in sight without them.
author: Robert Boyle

quote: Scientific knowledge is a kind of discourse.
author: Jean-Francois Lyotard

quote: The lonely wanderer, who watches by the seashore the waves that roll between him and his home, talks of cruel facts, material barriers that, just because they are material, and not ideal, shall be the irresistible foes of his longing heart.
author: Josiah Royce

quote: The Law is but words and paper without the hands of swords of men.
author: James Harrington

quote: Ideology... is indispensable in any society if men are to be formed, transformed and equipped to respond to the demands of their conditions of existence.
author: Louis Althusser

quote: There is a kind of serenity in love which is almost a paradise.
author: Alain Badiou

quote: I define a 'good person' as somebody who is fully conscious of their own limitations. They know their strengths, but they also know their 'shadow' - they know their weaknesses. In other words, they understand that there is no good without bad. Good and evil are really one, but we have broken them up in our consciousness. We polarize them.
author: John Bradshaw

quote: Think with your whole body.
author: Taisen Deshimaru

quote: It really is a nice theory. The only defect I think it has is probably common to all philosophical theories. It's wrong.
author: Saul Kripke

quote: Dignity belongs to the conquered.
author: Kenneth Burke

quote: The questions of philosophy proper are human desires and fears and aspirations - human emotions - taking an intellectual form.
author: Chauncey Wright

quote: Like all science, psychology is knowledge; and like science again, it is knowledge of a definite thing, the mind.
author: James Mark Baldwin

quote: A Soviet man is a product of invisible changes, degradation and progressive deformation. Breaking the chain of those changes is hard. Perhaps they are irreversible.
author: Merab Mamardashvili

quote: The extension of women's rights is the basic principle of all social progress.
author: Charles Fourier

quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: The only antidote to mental suffering is physical pain.
author: Karl Marx

quote: Never lose an opportunity of seeing anything beautiful, for beauty is God's handwriting.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: All truth passes through three stages. First, it is ridiculed. Second, it is violently opposed. Third, it is accepted as being self-evident.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: To have faith is to trust yourself to the water. When you swim you don't grab hold of the water, because if you do you will sink and drown. Instead you relax, and float.
author: Alan Watts

quote: I would rather live my life as if there is a God and die to find out there isn't, than live as if there isn't and to die to find out that there is.
author: Albert Camus

quote: All mankind... being all equal and independent, no one ought to harm another in his life, health, liberty or possessions.
author: John Locke

quote: Every existing thing is born without reason, prolongs itself out of weakness, and dies by chance.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Although it is not true that all conservatives are stupid people, it is true that most stupid people are conservative.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: Reading maketh a full man; conference a ready man; and writing an exact man.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: Insults are the arguments employed by those who are in the wrong.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: The most satisfying thing in life is to have been able to give a large part of one's self to others.
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: Fables should be taught as fables, myths as myths, and miracles as poetic fantasies. To teach superstitions as truths is a most terrible thing. The child mind accepts and believes them, and only through great pain and perhaps tragedy can he be in after years relieved of them.
author: Hypatia

quote: Every moment there is creation, every moment destruction. There is no absolute creation, no absolute destruction. Both are movement, and that is eternal.
author: Ramana Maharshi

quote: The learner always begins by finding fault, but the scholar sees the positive merit in everything.
author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quote: Women, can't live with them, can't live without them.
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: Time and memory are true artists; they remould reality nearer to the heart's desire.
author: John Dewey

quote: A jury is composed of twelve men of average ignorance.
author: Herbert Spencer

quote: No sadder proof can be given by a man of his own littleness than disbelief in great men.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: The Universal view melts things into a blur.
author: Emil Cioran

quote: I can, therefore I am.
author: Simone Weil

quote: The price of inaction is far greater than the cost of making a mistake.
author: Meister Eckhart

quote: Without self knowledge, without understanding the working and functions of his machine, man cannot be free, he cannot govern himself and he will always remain a slave.
author: George Gurdjieff

quote: The harder the struggle, the more glorious the triumph. Self-realization demands very great struggle.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: All of nature begins to whisper its secrets to us through its sounds. Sounds that were previously incomprehensible to our soul now become the meaningful language of nature.
author: Rudolf Steiner

quote: The heights of popularity and patriotism are still the beaten road to power and tyranny.
author: David Hume

quote: The state calls its own violence law, but that of the individual crime.
author: Max Stirner

quote: The petty man is eager to make boasts, yet desires that others should believe in him. He enthusiastically engages in deception, yet wants others to have affection for him. He conducts himself like an animal, yet wants others to think well of him.
author: Xun Kuang

quote: The basic question 'will I obey Christ 's teaching?' is rarely taken as a serious issue. For example, to take one of Jesus' commands, that is relevant to contemporary life, I don't know of any church that actually teaches a church how to bless people who curse them, yet this is a clear command.
author: Dallas Willard

quote: It's a form of human love to accept our complicated, messy humanity and not run away from it.
author: Martha Nussbaum

quote: The highest state is laughter.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: A man can do what he ought to do; and when he says he cannot, it is because he will not.
author: Johann Gottlieb Fichte

quote: There is no social entity with a good that undergoes some sacrifice for its own good. There are only individual people, different individual people, with their own individual lives.
author: Robert Nozick

quote: Think like a man of action, act like a man of thought.
author: Henri Bergson

quote: The logs of wood which move down the river together Are driven apart by every wave. Such inevitable parting Should not be the cause of misery.
author: Nagarjuna

quote: And revolutions always mean the breakdown of old authority.
author: Hu Shih

quote: To live with someone who likes you, and whose judgement you respect, because you love them, does make quite a difference, I find.
author: Roger Scruton

quote: There is no respect for others without humility in one's self.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: An animal's eyes have the power to speak a great language.
author: Martin Buber

quote: An expectation is a future object, recognised as belonging to me.
author: Samuel Alexander

quote: He that fears death loses the joys of life.
author: Jan Hus

quote: There are three attributes for which I am grateful to Fortune: that I was born, first, human and not animal; second, man and not woman; and third, Greek and not barbarian.
author: Thales

quote: It was wrong to capture wild animals and confine them in captivity for people to go and gawk at them. And that's basically how zoos got started. But once you do that, and once you have animals that have been bred in captivity, you're really stuck with them in some sense. You can't return them to the wild.
author: Peter Singer

quote: You can only hate someone whom you have the capacity to love, because if you are really indifferent, you cannot even get up the enough energy to hate him.
author: Sri Chinmoy

quote: Talent is a flame. Genius is a fire.
author: Bernard Williams

quote: The self has the characteristic that it is an object to itself, and that characteristic distinguishes it from other objects and from the body.
author: George Herbert Mead

quote: In a few decades of reconstruction, even the mathematical natural sciences, the ancient archetypes of theoretical perfection, have changed habit completely!
author: Edmund Husserl

quote: No evil is honorable: but death is honorable; therefore death is not evil.
author: Citium Zeno

quote: There are also two kinds of truths: truth of reasoning and truths of fact. Truths of reasoning are necessary and their opposite is impossible; those of fact are contingent and their opposite is possible.
author: Gottfried Leibniz

quote: The real question is, when will we draft an artificial intelligence bill of rights? What will that consist of? And who will get to decide that?
author: Gray Scott

quote: Nothing is more singular about this generation than its addiction to music.
author: Allan Bloom

quote: To understand is to perceive patterns.
author: Isaiah Berlin

quote: Socialism is nothing but the capitalism of the lower classes.
author: Oswald Spengler

quote: Men would live exceedingly quiet if these two words, mine and thine, were taken away.
author: Anaxagoras

quote: The subconscious is ceaselessly murmuring, and it is by listening to these murmurs that one hears the truth.
author: Gaston Bachelard

quote: The goal of modern propaganda is no longer to transform opinion but to arouse an active and mythical belief.
author: Jacques Ellul

quote: Those who give hoping to be rewarded with honor are not giving, they are bargaining.
author: Philo

quote: A man will give up almost anything except his suffering.
author: Chogyam Trungpa
