quote: I tried to drown my sorrows, but the bastards learned how to swim, and now I am overwhelmed by this decent and good feeling.
author: Frida Kahlo

quote: Set your sights high, the higher the better. Expect the most wonderful things to happen, not in the future but right now. Realize that nothing is too good. Allow absolutely nothing to hamper you or hold you up in any way.
author: Eileen Caddy

quote: For me, life is about experience and being a good person.
author: Chris Hemsworth

quote: I'm surrounded by good people, and I surround myself with good people.
author: Lil Peep

quote: Drugs are a waste of time. They destroy your memory and your self-respect and everything that goes along with with your self-esteem. They're no good at all.
author: Kurt Cobain

quote: It's good to know how to read, but it's dangerous to know how to read and not how to interpret what you're reading.
author: Mike Tyson

quote: English language is the most universal language in history, way more than the Latin of Julius Caesar. It's the most punderful language because its vocabulary has a certain critical mass that makes a lingo good for punning.
author: Richard Lederer

quote: Don't worry about being a star, worry about doing good work, and all that will come to you.
author: Ice Cube

quote: Until we meet again, may the good Lord take a liking to you.
author: Roy Rogers

quote: Good luck has its storms.
author: George Lucas

quote: A good painting to me has always been like a friend. It keeps me company, comforts and inspires.
author: Hedy Lamarr

quote: Every action has a consequence, so always try to be good.
author: Richard Eyre

quote: Start living now. Stop saving the good china for that special occasion. Stop withholding your love until that special person materializes. Every day you are alive is a special occasion. Every minute, every breath, is a gift from God.
author: Mary Manin Morrissey

quote: I do not try to play a role. I feel good being myself and saying what I think.
author: Volodymyr Zelensky

quote: Remember, the storm is a good opportunity for the pine and the cypress to show their strength and their stability.
author: Ho Chi Minh

quote: When you're doing good, everybody praises you. But when everything's all gone, a lot of people are nowhere to be found. So you always just believe in yourself, do it yourself and you won't be let down.
author: Ginuwine

quote: It's a lot easier to do good work when you have good words to say and work with good people.
author: Mark Harmon

quote: Nothing tastes as good as skinny feels.
author: Kate Moss

quote: I'm a good guy with a good heart, and I have good intentions.
author: Antonio Brown

quote: Hobbits are an unobtrusive but very ancient people, more numerous formerly than they are today; for they love peace and quiet and good tilled earth: a well-ordered and well-farmed countryside was their favourite haunt.
author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quote: There are good and bad times, but our mood changes more often than our fortune.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Mr. Tennyson has said that more things are wrought by prayer than this world dreams of, but he wisely refrains from saying whether they are good or bad things.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Good humor is a tonic for mind and body. It is the best antidote for anxiety and depression. It is a business asset. It attracts and keeps friends. It lightens human burdens. It is the direct route to serenity and contentment.
author: Grenville Kleiser

quote: If everybody is doing it one way, there's a good chance you can find your niche by going exactly in the opposite direction.
author: Sam Walton

quote: When government - in pursuit of good intentions - tries to rearrange the economy, legislate morality, or help special interests, the cost come in inefficiency, lack of motivation, and loss of freedom. Government should be a referee, not an active player.
author: Milton Friedman

quote: Silence is golden when you can't think of a good answer.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Leadership consists of picking good men and helping them do their best.
author: Chester W. Nimitz

quote: Every experience, good or bad, you have to learn from.
author: Patrick Mahomes

quote: What greater bliss than to look back on days spent in usefulness, in doing good to those around us.
author: Dorothea Dix

quote: An armed society is a polite society. Manners are good when one may have to back up his acts with his life.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: A company is only as good as the people it keeps.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: If you desire to be good, begin by believing that you are wicked.
author: Epictetus

quote: We made the buttons on the screen look so good you'll want to lick them.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: As long as your intentions are solid and about growth and progression and being productive and not being idle, then you're doing good in my book.
author: Frank Ocean

quote: Baseball has been very good to me.
author: Roberto Clemente

quote: When you take care of yourself, you're a better person for others. When you feel good about yourself, you treat others better.
author: Solange Knowles

quote: Good luck is when opportunity meets preparation, while bad luck is when lack of preparation meets reality.
author: Eliyahu Goldratt

quote: Sometimes I'm in a bad mood, sometimes I'm in a good mood. It's like everyone else.
author: Tricky

quote: I'm not good at future planning. I don't plan at all. I don't know what I'm doing tomorrow. I don't have a day planner and I don't have a diary. I completely live in the now, not in the past, not in the future.
author: Heath Ledger

quote: It's better to be good than evil, but one achieves goodness at a terrific cost.
author: Stephen King

quote: The good man is the man who, no matter how morally unworthy he has been, is moving to become better.
author: John Dewey

quote: Life's too short to dwell on things. When you go through experiences that are bad, it's a good thing. You learn from it - become a stronger person. Life is a roller coaster, and you don't know what's going to be thrown at you next, so all you can do is give it your best shot.
author: Alesha Dixon

quote: A good song never gets old.
author: Bad Bunny

quote: What makes a child gifted and talented may not always be good grades in school, but a different way of looking at the world and learning.
author: Chuck Grassley

quote: Buildings are storytellers. They teach us about our history, good and bad. They tell stories about people.
author: George Clarke

quote: I was raised Catholic, but then I discovered Buddhism, and I used to have a boyfriend who was a Scientologist, and they are all good religions that help people. As far as I'm concerned, you can have all three religions at once and it's okay!
author: Penelope Cruz

quote: There are good people who are dealt a bad hand by fate, and bad people who live long, comfortable, privileged lives. A small twist of fate can save or end a life; random chance is a permanent, powerful player in each of our lives, and in human history as well.
author: Jeff Greenfield

quote: Politics ought to be the part-time profession of every citizen who would protect the rights and privileges of free people and who would preserve what is good and fruitful in our national heritage.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Attitude and enthusiasm play a big part in my life. I get excited about the things that inspire me. I also believe in laughing and having a good time.
author: Dwayne Johnson

quote: I just save my money, man. I don't even try to enjoy it like these other rappers; they having fun and they lit, but they gon' be broke later on. I be savin', I be chillin'. It feels good to know I got it, but it feel better to know I'ma keep it too.
author: Lil Baby

quote: If anything is good for pounding humility into you permanently, it's the restaurant business.
author: Anthony Bourdain

quote: Capitalism is the astounding belief that the most wickedest of men will do the most wickedest of things for the greatest good of everyone.
author: John Maynard Keynes

quote: Life is not a matter of holding good cards, but sometimes, playing a poor hand well.
author: Jack London

quote: I could talk food all day. I love good food.
author: Tom Brady

quote: Good design is making something intelligible and memorable. Great design is making something memorable and meaningful.
author: Dieter Rams

quote: There is nothing more important than a good, safe, secure home.
author: Rosalynn Carter

quote: Fast food is popular because it's convenient, it's cheap, and it tastes good. But the real cost of eating fast food never appears on the menu.
author: Eric Schlosser

quote: Humans aren't as good as we should be in our capacity to empathize with feelings and thoughts of others, be they humans or other animals on Earth. So maybe part of our formal education should be training in empathy. Imagine how different the world would be if, in fact, that were 'reading, writing, arithmetic, empathy.'
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: I used to play sports. Then I realized you can buy trophies. Now I am good at everything.
author: Demetri Martin

quote: We can choose to wake up and grumble all day and be bitter and angry and judge others and find satisfaction in others doing bad instead of good. Or we can we wake up with optimism and love and say, 'Just what is this beautiful day going to bring me?'
author: Margaret Trudeau

quote: The first time I do something, I'll probably be good at it.
author: King Von

quote: I would like to be remembered as a man who had a wonderful time living life, a man who had good friends, fine family - and I don't think I could ask for anything more than that, actually.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: Good judgment comes from experience, and experience comes from bad judgment.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: Anyone can have a good day, but you have to be able to perform on a bad day.
author: Jurgen Klopp

quote: One only dies once, and if one does not die well, a good opportunity is lost and will not present itself again.
author: Jose Rizal

quote: Constant attention by a good nurse may be just as important as a major operation by a surgeon.
author: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: I think most of us are raised with preconceived notions of the choices we're supposed to make. We waste so much time making decisions based on someone else's idea of our happiness - what will make you a good citizen or a good wife or daughter or actress. Nobody says, 'Just be happy - go be a cobbler or go live with goats.'
author: Sandra Bullock

quote: A good memory is one trained to forget the trivial.
author: Clifton Fadiman

quote: Good behavior is the last refuge of mediocrity.
author: Henry S. Haskins

quote: When the weather's good, there's no better place to be than the British countryside.
author: Ross Kemp

quote: No good movie is too long and no bad movie is short enough.
author: Roger Ebert

quote: Sharing is good, and with digital technology, sharing is easy.
author: Richard Stallman

quote: All the good music has already been written by people with wigs and stuff.
author: Frank Zappa

quote: Being a good police officer is one of the most difficult, dangerous, idealistic jobs in the world.
author: Thomas Hauser

quote: To invent, you need a good imagination and a pile of junk.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Life is an ordeal, albeit an exciting one, but I wouldn't trade it for the good old days of poverty and obscurity.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: I like food. I like eating. And I don't want to deprive myself of good food.
author: Sarah Michelle Gellar

quote: We all have the duty to do good.
author: Pope Francis

quote: The less people know about you, the more you understand how beautiful life is. It's good when you exist only on screen. I don't want them to take me home. I love to have my privacy.
author: Fahadh Faasil

quote: A good fragrance should have a certain personality that makes people identify the scent with you.
author: Shakira

quote: The power of choosing good and evil is within the reach of all.
author: Origen

quote: We have a powerful potential in out youth, and we must have the courage to change old ideas and practices so that we may direct their power toward good ends.
author: Mary McLeod Bethune

quote: A delayed game is eventually good, but a rushed game is forever bad.
author: Shigeru Miyamoto

quote: Endure and persist; this pain will turn to good by and by.
author: Ovid

quote: No one knows what's a good idea or a bad idea until you try it.
author: Marc Randolph

quote: I've been a bad boy trying to be a good man my whole life.
author: Jimmy Snuka

quote: Good manners sometimes means simply putting up with other people's bad manners.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Yet, taught by time, my heart has learned to glow for other's good, and melt at other's woe.
author: Homer

quote: Because you know what happens when you say 'hello' or 'good morning?' You make a connection. And isn't that what being human is all about?
author: Philip Rosenthal

quote: You are educated. Your certification is in your degree. You may think of it as the ticket to the good life. Let me ask you to think of an alternative. Think of it as your ticket to change the world.
author: Tom Brokaw

quote: They say any landing you can walk away from is a good one.
author: Alan Shepard

quote: When you adopt a dog, you have a lot of very good days and one very bad day.
author: W. Bruce Cameron

quote: Happiness is good health and a bad memory.
author: Ingrid Bergman

quote: Good things happen when you meet strangers.
author: Yo-Yo Ma

quote: Whatever makes men good Christians, makes them good citizens.
author: Daniel Webster

quote: Many good sayings are to be found in holy books, but merely reading them will not make one religious.
author: Ramakrishna

quote: I wake up every day and I think, 'I'm breathing! It's a good day.'
author: Eve Ensler

quote: Baseball is the only field of endeavor where a man can succeed three times out of ten and be considered a good performer.
author: Ted Williams

quote: A good director creates an environment, which gives the actor the encouragement to fly.
author: Kevin Bacon

quote: Leadership contains certain elements of good management, but it requires that you inspire, that you build durable trust. For an organization to be not just good but to win, leadership means evoking participation larger than the job description, commitment deeper than any job contract's wording.
author: Stanley A. McChrystal

quote: When you look good, you feel good. Confidence with what you're wearing is very important. If you feel good, you will always perform your best without worrying about anything.
author: Maria Sharapova

quote: Good governance requires working toward common ground. It isn't easy.
author: Pete Hoekstra

quote: No man chooses evil because it is evil; he only mistakes it for happiness, the good he seeks.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quote: There is something good in all seeming failures. You are not to see that now. Time will reveal it. Be patient.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: Good friends, good books and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The natural desire of good men is knowledge.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: To make a film is easy; to make a good film is war. To make a very good film is a miracle.
author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: The past is our definition. We may strive with good reason to escape it, or to escape what is bad in it. But we will escape it only by adding something better to it.
author: Wendell Berry

quote: Make friends with the angels, who though invisible are always with you. Often invoke them, constantly praise them, and make good use of their help and assistance in all your temporal and spiritual affairs.
author: Saint Francis de Sales

quote: I go to sleep every single night thinking I'm not good enough. I really do. I don't know if that's healthy or not. But I really do have a fear of not being good, and I don't like that.
author: Diana Taurasi

quote: I will form good habits and become their slave. And how will I accomplish this difficult feat? Through these scrolls it will be done, for each scroll contains a principle which will drive a bad habit from my life and replace it with one which will bring me closer to success.
author: Og Mandino

quote: Whatever words we utter should be chosen with care for people will hear them and be influenced by them for good or ill.
author: Buddha

quote: We have to acknowledge that adolescence is that time of transition where we begin to introduce to children that life isn't pretty, that there are difficult things, there are hard situations, it's not fair. Bad things happen to good people.
author: Laurie Halse Anderson

quote: Dusting is a good example of the futility of trying to put things right. As soon as you dust, the fact of your next dusting has already been established.
author: George Carlin

quote: People always want welfare, development, and good governance. As long as you are delivering, people are with you.
author: N. Chandrababu Naidu

quote: A good decision is based on knowledge and not on numbers.
author: Plato

quote: Golf is not a game of good shots. It's a game of bad shots.
author: Ben Hogan

quote: The most amazing thing for me is that every single person who sees a movie, not necessarily one of my movies, brings a whole set of unique experiences. Now, through careful manipulation and good storytelling, you can get everybody to clap at the same time, to hopefully laugh at the same time, and to be afraid at the same time.
author: Steven Spielberg

quote: I was born at a bad time for Spain, but a really good one for cinema.
author: Pedro Almodovar

quote: It is absurd to divide people into good and bad. People are either charming or tedious.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I tell students that the opportunities I had were a result of having a good educational background. Education is what allows you to stand out.
author: Ellen Ochoa

quote: No matter how good you are, you're going to lose one-third of your games. No matter how bad you are, you're going to win one-third of your games. It's the other third that makes the difference.
author: Tommy Lasorda

quote: That which is not good for the bee-hive cannot be good for the bees.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: I hope there will be some good news and some good profits, and people will realize we have a lot of outstanding executives, and a lot of companies that are doing a good job, and those are good companies to invest in.
author: Don Nickles

quote: If you are lucky enough to find something that you love, and you have a shot at being good at it, don't stop, don't put it down.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: Over the centuries, mankind has tried many ways of combating the forces of evil... prayer, fasting, good works and so on. Up until Doom, no one seemed to have thought about the double-barrel shotgun. Eat leaden death, demon.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Much good work is lost for the lack of a little more.
author: Edward H. Harriman

quote: Everything is good when you're winning. But true colors come out when you lose.
author: Jamal Murray

quote: A director is the captain of the ship; he gets the vision of the film much before anyone else can. While I want to experiment with characters, I know a good director means I am in safe hands.
author: Koel Mallick

quote: Dogs and philosophers do the greatest good and get the fewest rewards.
author: Diogenes

quote: Good Christian people, I am come hither to die, for according to the law, and by the law I am judged to die, and therefore I will speak nothing against it. I am come hither to accuse no man, nor to speak anything of that, whereof I am accused and condemned to die.
author: Anne Boleyn

quote: Being honest with myself is something I like. I am happy that I don't make excuses when I make a mistake. This is a good way to improve in the fastest way.
author: Charles Leclerc

quote: He that gives good advice, builds with one hand; he that gives good counsel and example, builds with both; but he that gives good admonition and bad example, builds with one hand and pulls down with the other.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: The secret to success is good leadership, and good leadership is all about making the lives of your team members or workers better.
author: Tony Dungy

quote: Your days are short here; this is the last of your springs. And now in the serenity and quiet of this lovely place, touch the depths of truth, feel the hem of Heaven. You will go away with old, good friends. And don't forget when you leave why you came.
author: Adlai Stevenson II

quote: I surround myself with positive, productive people of good will and decency.
author: Ted Nugent

quote: Fear is always a good motivator.
author: James Dyson

quote: Only bad golfers are lucky. They're the ones bouncing balls off trees, curbs, turtles and cars. Good golfers have bad luck. When you hit the ball straight, a funny bounce is bound to be unlucky.
author: Lee Trevino

quote: Just try to do the right thing, and that's immediate karma: 'I feel good about myself.'
author: Linda Thompson

quote: I love glamour and being sexy and dressing up, and I think it's good to be confident.
author: Kelly Brook

quote: Good questions outrank easy answers.
author: Paul Samuelson

quote: So long as you've got your friends about you, and a good positive attitude, you don't really have to care what everyone else thinks.
author: Gail Porter

quote: No matter how devastating our struggles, disappointments, and troubles are, they are only temporary. No matter what happens to you, no matter the depth of tragedy or pain you face, no matter how death stalks you and your loved ones, the Resurrection promises you a future of immeasurable good.
author: Josh McDowell

quote: I know you've heard it a thousand times before. But it's true - hard work pays off. If you want to be good, you have to practice, practice, practice. If you don't love something, then don't do it.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: A good name is rather to be chosen than riches.
author: King Solomon

quote: Life is all about sharing. If we are good at something, pass it on. That is the pleasure I get from teaching - whether it is television or books. We should all share.
author: Mary Berry

quote: Truthful words are not beautiful; beautiful words are not truthful. Good words are not persuasive; persuasive words are not good.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The four characteristics of humanism are curiosity, a free mind, belief in good taste, and belief in the human race.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: I like seeing good people win.
author: Mac Miller

quote: Everything is a learning experience, both good and bad that happen to you. You take what happens and learn from it. That's how I look at everything, the good and bad. You learn about it, and you improve.
author: Markelle Fultz

quote: We must develop and maintain the capacity to forgive. He who is devoid of the power to forgive is devoid of the power to love. There is some good in the worst of us and some evil in the best of us. When we discover this, we are less prone to hate our enemies.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: A good garden may have some weeds.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: I am a teacher. It's how I define myself. A good teacher isn't someone who gives the answers out to their kids but is understanding of needs and challenges and gives tools to help other people succeed. That's the way I see myself, so whatever it is that I will do eventually after politics, it'll have to do a lot with teaching.
author: Justin Trudeau

quote: Love seeks one thing only: the good of the one loved. It leaves all the other secondary effects to take care of themselves. Love, therefore, is its own reward.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: When I do good I feel good, when I do bad I feel bad, and that's my religion.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Golf is a good walk spoiled.
author: Mark Twain

quote: There is no shortage of good days. It is good lives that are hard to come by.
author: Annie Dillard

quote: All tyranny needs to gain a foothold is for people of good conscience to remain silent.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: Learn to say 'no' to the good so you can say 'yes' to the best.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: I don't have a feeling of inferiority. Never had. I'm as good as anybody, but no better.
author: Katherine Johnson

quote: I think it matters whether someone has a good heart.
author: Elon Musk

quote: The general who advances without coveting fame and retreats without fearing disgrace, whose only thought is to protect his country and do good service for his sovereign, is the jewel of the kingdom.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: I wish they'd had electric guitars in cotton fields back in the good old days. A whole lot of things would've been straightened out.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: Sometimes I sit down and I think 'Do I regret this? Do I regret that?' And I feel like everything makes this snowball effect, you know? If you regret something, it's good because it just means that it's something that's affected you enough for you to stop and think... There's a reason that everything happens.
author: Santan Dave

quote: To enjoy good health, to bring true happiness to one's family, to bring peace to all, one must first discipline and control one's own mind. If a man can control his mind he can find the way to Enlightenment, and all wisdom and virtue will naturally come to him.
author: Buddha

quote: Diligence is the mother of good luck.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Great and good are seldom the same man.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Finding a good barber is like finding a good lawyer - you gotta go to the same guy.
author: Ronny Chieng

quote: Good can exist without evil, whereas evil cannot exist without good.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: I would advise all youths aspiring to athletic fame or a professional career to practice clean living, fair play and good sportsmanship.
author: Major Taylor

quote: Something good always comes from something bad.
author: Brady Jandreau

quote: It is a good morning exercise for a research scientist to discard a pet hypothesis every day before breakfast. It keeps him young.
author: Konrad Lorenz

quote: Problems are the price of progress. Don't bring me anything but trouble. Good news weakens me.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: The more man meditates upon good thoughts, the better will be his world and the world at large.
author: Confucius

quote: A good wife is one who serves her husband in the morning like a mother does, loves him in the day like a sister does and pleases him like a prostitute in the night.
author: Chanakya

quote: If you want a good education, go to private schools. If you can't afford it, tough luck. You can go to the public school.
author: Paul LePage

quote: Little League baseball is a very good thing because it keeps the parents off the streets.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: You must never be satisfied with losing. You must get angry, terribly angry, about losing. But the mark of the good loser is that he takes his anger out on himself and not his victorious opponents or on his teammates.
author: Richard M. Nixon

quote: Jealousy is both reasonable and belongs to reasonable men, while envy is base and belongs to the base, for the one makes himself get good things by jealousy, while the other does not allow his neighbour to have them through envy.
author: Aristotle

quote: The intersection of law, politics, and technology is going to force a lot of good thinking.
author: Bill Gates

quote: My country is the world, and my religion is to do good.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Don't gamble; take all your savings and buy some good stock and hold it till it goes up, then sell it. If it don't go up, don't buy it.
author: Will Rogers

quote: I say, 'Yeah, Taylor Swift.' I think she is a smart, beautiful girl. I think she's making all the right moves. She's got a good head on her shoulders. She's surrounded with wonderful people. Her songs are great. She keeps herself anchored. She knows who she is, and she's living and standing by that.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: Good humor is one of the best articles of dress one can wear in society.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: A good objective of leadership is to help those who are doing poorly to do well and to help those who are doing well to do even better.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: A film is never really good unless the camera is an eye in the head of a poet.
author: Orson Welles

quote: People are basically the same the world over. Everybody wants the same things - to be happy, to be healthy, to be at least reasonably prosperous, and to be secure. They want friends, peace of mind, good family relationships, and hope that tomorrow is going to be even better than today.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: In my career, there's many things I've won and many things I've achieved, but for me, my greatest achievement is my children and my family. It's about being a good father, a good husband, just being connected to family as much as possible.
author: David Beckham

quote: The way to gain a good reputation is to endeavor to be what you desire to appear.
author: Socrates

quote: To wear your heart on your sleeve isn't a very good plan; you should wear it inside, where it functions best.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: If I knew for a certainty that a man was coming to my house with the conscious design of doing me good, I should run for my life.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I always like it when I eat myself out of breath. That's a good boost to my day. You know, I'm eating, and I go, 'Oooohhh.' It's better a few moments later when you get to think about it, when you're like, 'Why did I just stop to take a deep breath? Oh yeah, my body also needs air.'
author: Tom Segura

quote: Just as treasures are uncovered from the earth, so virtue appears from good deeds, and wisdom appears from a pure and peaceful mind. To walk safely through the maze of human life, one needs the light of wisdom and the guidance of virtue.
author: Buddha

quote: Baseball is a universe as large as life itself, and therefore all things in life, whether good or bad, whether tragic or comic, fall within its domain.
author: Paul Auster

quote: Necessity never made a good bargain.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Look within. Within is the fountain of good, and it will ever bubble up, if thou wilt ever dig.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Love is the joy of the good, the wonder of the wise, the amazement of the Gods.
author: Plato

quote: Everyone loves fried chicken, Don't ever make it. Ever. Buy it from a place that makes good fried chicken.
author: Nora Ephron

quote: It is wonderful how much time good people spend fighting the devil. If they would only expend the same amount of energy loving their fellow men, the devil would die in his own tracks of ennui.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Teaching is a very noble profession that shapes the character, caliber, and future of an individual. If the people remember me as a good teacher, that will be the biggest honour for me.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: I am like the sick sheep that strays from the rest of the flock. Unless the Good Shepherd takes me on His shoulders and carries me back to His fold, my steps will falter, and in the very effort of rising, my feet will give way.
author: St. Jerome

quote: Every day we should hear at least one little song, read one good poem, see one exquisite picture, and, if possible, speak a few sensible words.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: I would go to the deeps a hundred times to cheer a downcast spirit. It is good for me to have been afflicted, that I might know how to speak a word in season to one that is weary.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: When I woke up this morning my girlfriend asked me, 'Did you sleep good?' I said 'No, I made a few mistakes.'
author: Steven Wright

quote: No man is good enough to govern another man without the other's consent.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: And above all things, never think that you're not good enough yourself. A man should never think that. My belief is that in life people will take you at your own reckoning.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: Associate with men of good quality if you esteem your own reputation; for it is better to be alone than in bad company.
author: George Washington

quote: I'm at peace with what I'm doing, I feel good with what I wake up doing and about my lifestyle.
author: Nipsey Hussle

quote: Most people don't like change. They revolt against it unless they can clearly see the advantage it brings. For that reason, when good leaders prepare to take action or make changes, they take people through a process to get them ready for it.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: I believe that every human mind feels pleasure in doing good to another.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: When one has not had a good father, one must create one.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Some people are so heavenly minded that they are no earthly good.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: I'm La Flame at all times. That, at times, can be bad, at times can be good.
author: Travis Scott

quote: Finding good players is easy. Getting them to play as a team is another story.
author: Casey Stengel

quote: An empty stomach is not a good political adviser.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: E-governance is easy governance, effective governance, and also economic governance. E-governance paves the way for good governance.
author: Narendra Modi

quote: Life expectancy would grow by leaps and bounds if green vegetables smelled as good as bacon.
author: Doug Larson

quote: Never give in - never, never, never, never, in nothing great or small, large or petty, never give in except to convictions of honour and good sense.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Get correct views of life, and learn to see the world in its true light. It will enable you to live pleasantly, to do good, and, when summoned away, to leave without regret.
author: Robert E. Lee

quote: The good man is the friend of all living things.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: It takes more than just a good looking body. You've got to have the heart and soul to go with it.
author: Epictetus

quote: Every book you pick up has its own lesson or lessons, and quite often the bad books have more to teach than the good ones.
author: Stephen King

quote: Happiness is secured through virtue; it is a good attained by man's own will.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: We should keep on going along the path of globalization. Globalization is good... when trade stops, war comes.
author: Jack Ma

quote: Hatred is gained as much by good works as by evil.
author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: They wrote in the old days that it is sweet and fitting to die for one's country. But in modern war, there is nothing sweet nor fitting in your dying. You will die like a dog for no good reason.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: I live in sin, to kill myself I live; no longer my life my own, but sin's; my good is given to me by heaven, my evil by myself, by my free will, of which I am deprived.
author: Michelangelo

quote: A good picture is equivalent to a good deed.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: The reading of all good books is like a conversation with the finest minds of past centuries.
author: Rene Descartes

quote: Women wish to be loved without a why or a wherefore; not because they are pretty, or good, or well-bred, or graceful, or intelligent, but because they are themselves.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: The only freedom which deserves the name is that of pursuing our own good, in our own way, so long as we do not attempt to deprive others of theirs, or impede their efforts to obtain it.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: Hope is a good breakfast, but it is a bad supper.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: You do not play hockey for good seasons. You play to win the Stanley Cup. It has to be the objective.
author: Guy Lafleur

quote: Well-being cannot exist just in your own head. Well-being is a combination of feeling good as well as actually having meaning, good relationships and accomplishment.
author: Martin Seligman

quote: If people are failing, they look inept. If people are succeeding, they look strong and good and competent. That's the 'halo effect.' Your first impression of a thing sets up your subsequent beliefs. If the company looks inept to you, you may assume everything else they do is inept.
author: Daniel Kahneman

quote: As a matter of self-preservation, a man needs good friends or ardent enemies, for the former instruct him and the latter take him to task.
author: Diogenes

quote: I am for doing good to the poor, but I differ in opinion about the means. I think the best way of doing good to the poor is not making them easy in poverty, but leading or driving them out of it.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Treasure the love you receive above all. It will survive long after your good health has vanished.
author: Og Mandino

quote: You sit at the board and suddenly your heart leaps. Your hand trembles to pick up the piece and move it. But what chess teaches you is that you must sit there calmly and think about whether it's really a good idea and whether there are other, better ideas.
author: Stanley Kubrick

quote: Not life, but good life, is to be chiefly valued.
author: Socrates

quote: And finally I twist my heart round again, so that the bad is on the outside and the good is on the inside, and keep on trying to find a way of becoming what I would so like to be, and could be, if there weren't any other people living in the world.
author: Anne Frank

quote: The wicked leader is he who the people despise. The good leader is he who the people revere. The great leader is he who the people say, 'We did it ourselves.'
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Little progress can be made by merely attempting to repress what is evil. Our great hope lies in developing what is good.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: You don't need a college degree to be a good carpenter, welder, plumber, auto mechanic, member of the armed forces, or firefighter.
author: Kathy Szeliga

quote: You don't have to be serious all the time to do a good job.
author: Simone Biles

quote: He who is to be a good ruler must have first been ruled.
author: Aristotle

quote: It's a good thing we don't get all the government we pay for.
author: Will Rogers

quote: The devil ain't got no power over me. The devil come, and me shake hands with the devil. Devil have his part to play. Devil's a good friend, too... because when you don't know him, that's the time he can mosh you down.
author: Bob Marley

quote: I had a stick of CareFree gum, but it didn't work. I felt pretty good while I was blowing that bubble, but as soon as the gum lost its flavor, I was back to pondering my mortality.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: I am alone a lot, which is good. I need that time to just be alone after a long day, just decompress. So, I go to either my house or the hotel, or my apartment, or whatever - wherever I am, I go home and I watch TV and I sit there, with my cat, and I just watch TV or go online, check my emails.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: A youth, when at home, should be filial and, abroad, respectful to his elders. He should be earnest and truthful. He should overflow in love to all and cultivate the friendship of the good. When he has time and opportunity, after the performance of these things, he should employ them in polite studies.
author: Confucius

quote: Research indicates that employees have three prime needs: Interesting work, recognition for doing a good job, and being let in on things that are going on in the company.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: I am in politics because of the conflict between good and evil, and I believe that in the end good will triumph.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Tomorrow is nothing, today is too late; the good lived yesterday.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: There was never a good war, or a bad peace.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Virtue is persecuted more by the wicked than it is loved by the good.
author: Buddha

quote: Good evening, ladies and gentleman. My name is Orson Welles. I am an actor. I am a writer. I am a producer. I am a director. I am a magician. I appear onstage and on the radio. Why are there so many of me and so few of you?
author: Orson Welles

quote: Randomly enough, my older sisters went to a makeup school when they were younger, so they're all really good at it. They've always told me that 'natural is better.'
author: Kendall Jenner

quote: It's good sportsmanship to not pick up lost golf balls while they are still rolling.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Good order is the foundation of all things.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: Good leaders must communicate vision clearly, creatively, and continually. However, the vision doesn't come alive until the leader models it.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The only thing that could spoil a day was people. People were always the limiters of happiness except for the very few that were as good as spring itself.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: A man who was completely innocent, offered himself as a sacrifice for the good of others, including his enemies, and became the ransom of the world. It was a perfect act.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: No evil can happen to a good man, either in life or after death. He and his are not neglected by the gods.
author: Socrates

quote: I really believe in the philosophy that you create your own universe. I'm just trying to create a good one for myself.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: Good things will come from self-expression.
author: John Cho

quote: I have to practice to be good at guitar. I have to write 100 songs before you write the first good one.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: He who speaks without modesty will find it difficult to make his words good.
author: Confucius

quote: Aim above morality. Be not simply good, be good for something.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: One can survive everything, nowadays, except death, and live down everything except a good reputation.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Charity bestowed upon those who are worthy of it is like good seed sown on a good soil that yields an abundance of fruits. But alms given to those who are yet under the tyrannical yoke of the passions are like seed deposited in a bad soil. The passions of the receiver of the alms choke, as it were, the growth of merits.
author: Buddha

quote: Good stories are driven by conflict, tension, and high stakes.
author: William Landay

quote: I'm just trying to make music everybody can get happy to and vibe to and turn up to. So long as I keep making good music, everything's going to be OK.
author: Post Malone

quote: And I believe that good journalism, good television, can make our world a better place.
author: Christiane Amanpour

quote: Sure, I can get a little bit jealous. The good part about jealousy is that it comes from passion. It's also the dangerous part and it's an ugly emotion that hurts.
author: Matthew McConaughey

quote: When I wake up, I expect things to be good. If they're not, then I try to set about trying to make them as good as I can 'cause I know I'm gonna have to live that day anyway. So why not try to make the most of it if you can? Some days, they pan out a little better than others, but you still gotta always just try.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: There are things they tell us that sound good to hear, but when they have accomplished their purpose they will go home and will not try to fulfill our agreements with them.
author: Sitting Bull

quote: Whatever your situation might be, set your mind to whatever you want to do and put a good attitude in it, and I believe that you can succeed. You are not going to get anywhere just sitting on your butt and moping around.
author: Bethany Hamilton

quote: If you're in a hit movie, it's good to be in another hit movie straight away.
author: Val Kilmer

quote: I haven't seen about half the movies I've done. You know, you've got to make a living, but some I don't get a good vibe with.
author: Ray Liotta

quote: Everyone has seen the serious side of myself and sometimes I need to take a chill pill and have a good laugh. That's who I am as a person.
author: Rhea Ripley

quote: Music is the pleasure the human mind experiences from counting without being aware that it is counting.
author: Gottfried Leibniz

quote: The secret of all victory lies in the organization of the non-obvious.
author: Oswald Spengler

quote: Modern technology has become a total phenomenon for civilization, the defining force of a new social order in which efficiency is no longer an option but a necessity imposed on all human activity.
author: Jacques Ellul

quote: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.
author: Philo

quote: Grief is only the memory of widowed affections.
author: James Martineau

quote: Wrong people are wrong because they use their freedom to deny it to others.
author: William A. Dembski

quote: Willing or preferring is the same with respect to good and evil, that judging is with respect to truth or falsehood.
author: Anthony Collins

quote: Act so that the effects of your actions are compatible with the permanence of genuine human life.
author: Hans Jonas

quote: Love is not a feeling of happiness. Love is a willingness to sacrifice.
author: Michael Novak

quote: Transnational, gigantic industrial companies no longer operate within political systems, but rather above them.
author: Georg Henrik von Wright

quote: The secret of happiness is: Find something more important than you are and dedicate your life to it.
author: Daniel Dennett

quote: A man content to go to heaven alone will never go to heaven.
author: Boethius

quote: Everything is a railway junction where past and future are sliding over one another, not touching.
author: Timothy Morton

quote: The enslaving of the other is also the enslaving of the self.
author: Nikolai Berdyaev

quote: The man of petty ambition if invited to dinner will be eager to be set next his host.
author: Theophrastus

quote: No men who really think deeply about women retain a high opinion of them; men either despise women or they have never thought seriously about them.
author: Otto Weininger

quote: A man of courage flees forward, in the midst of new things.
author: Jacques Maritain

quote: In fact history does not belong to us; but we belong to it.
author: Hans-Georg Gadamer

quote: Infelicity is an ill to which all acts are heir which have the general character of ritual or ceremonial, all conventional acts.
author: J. L. Austin

quote: The world is... the natural setting of, and field for, all my thoughts and all my explicit perceptions. Truth does not inhabit only the inner man, or more accurately, there is no inner man, man is in the world, and only in the world does he know himself.
author: Maurice Merleau-Ponty

quote: Genius is nothing but continued attention.
author: Claude Adrien Helvetius

quote: On a grassroots level we say that man can touch more than he can grasp.
author: Gabriel Marcel

quote: It is impossible for someone to lie unless he thinks he knows the truth. A person who lies is thereby responding to the truth, and he is to that extent respectful of it.
author: Harry Frankfurt

quote: Necessity does the work of courage.
author: Nicholas M. Butler

quote: That action is best which procures the greatest happiness for the greatest numbers.
author: Francis Hutcheson

quote: I have a big problem with Islam.
author: Michel Onfray

quote: The key to wisdom is this - constant and frequent questioning, for by doubting we are led to question and by questioning we arrive at the truth.
author: Peter Abelard

quote: Art is the objectification of feeling, and the subjectification of nature.
author: Susanne Langer

quote: A work can become modern only if it is first postmodern. Postmodernism thus understood is not modernism at its end but in the nascent state, and this state is constant.
author: Jean-Francois Lyotard

quote: For no continuity of social act is possible without a corresponding social status and the many different kinds of act required in an industrial state, with its high degree of specialization, make for corresponding classification of status.
author: Kenneth Burke

quote: Religion is the belief in an ever-living God, that is, in a Divine Mind and Will ruling the Universe and holding moral relations with mankind.
author: James Martineau

quote: Any necessary truth, whether a priori or a posteriori, could not have turned out otherwise.
author: Saul Kripke

quote: That nature does not care, one way or the other, is the true abyss. That only man cares, in his finitude facing nothing but death, alone with his contingency and the objective meaninglessness of his projecting meanings, is a truly unprecedented situation.
author: Hans Jonas

quote: Just as our eyes need light in order to see, our minds need ideas in order to conceive.
author: Nicolas Malebranche

quote: The Russian norm is an extremely barbaric state of mind.
author: Merab Mamardashvili

quote: Purchasing power is a license to purchase power.
author: Raoul Vaneigem

quote: It takes a wise man to recognize a wise man.
author: Xenophanes

quote: Socialists find me too far left; Trotskyites not far enough; ecologists say I am too happy eating foie gras, defending nuclear energy and GM plants; feminists find I am not enough of a woman; anarchists a petit-bourgeois who has sold out because I believe in universal suffrage.
author: Michel Onfray

quote: Sense data are much more controversial than qualia, because they are associated with a controversial theory of perception - that one perceives the world by perceiving one's sense-data, or something like that.
author: David Chalmers

quote: Knowledge is and will be produced in order to be sold, it is and will be consumed in order to be valorised in a new production: in both cases, the goal is exchange.
author: Jean-Francois Lyotard

quote: No man can be a politician, except he be first a historian or a traveller; for except he can see what must be, or what may be, he is no politician.
author: James Harrington

quote: Time is not a line, but a series of now-points.
author: Taisen Deshimaru

quote: Evil is the interruption of a truth by the pressure of particular or individual interests.
author: Alain Badiou

quote: Heredity provides for the modification of its own machinery.
author: James Mark Baldwin

quote: To dare is to lose one's footing momentarily. Not to dare is to lose oneself.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: No work or love will flourish out of guilt, fear, or hollowness of heart, just as no valid plans for the future can be made by those who have no capacity for living now.
author: Alan Watts

quote: Dictatorship naturally arises out of democracy, and the most aggravated form of tyranny and slavery out of the most extreme liberty.
author: Plato

quote: The kingdom of heaven is like electricity. You don't see it. It is within you.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: By philosophy the mind of man comes to itself, and from henceforth rests on itself without foreign aid, and is completely master of itself, as the dancer of his feet, or the boxer of his hands.
author: Johann Gottlieb Fichte

quote: Every man is his own chief enemy.
author: Anacharsis

quote: Under the rule of a repressive whole, liberty can be made into a powerful instrument of domination.
author: Herbert Marcuse

quote: There are more truths in twenty-four hours of a man's life than in all the philosophies.
author: Raoul Vaneigem

quote: God is one, greatest of gods and men, not like mortals in body or thought.
author: Xenophanes

quote: Instead, it appears to be a particular mark of beauty that it is considered with tranquil satisfaction; that it pleases if we also do not possess it and we are still far removed from demanding to possess it.
author: Moses Mendelssohn

quote: I preferred the weapons of dialectic to all the other teachings of philosophy, and armed with these, I chose the conflicts of disputation rather than the trophies of war.
author: Peter Abelard

quote: Our working hypothesis is that the status of knowledge is altered as societies enter what is known as the postindustrial age and cultures enter what is known as the postmodern age.
author: Jean-Francois Lyotard

quote: Conscience without judgment is superstition.
author: Benjamin Whichcote

quote: Vice: Whatever was passion in the contemplation of man, being brought forth by his will into action.
author: James Harrington

quote: If the highest things are unknowable, then the highest capacity or virtue of man cannot be theoretical wisdom.
author: Leo Strauss

quote: For a scientific theory of him to be possible, man, including his habits of valuation, has to be taken as determined by causal laws, as an instance and part of nature.
author: Hans Jonas

quote: Creation implies authority in the sense of originator. The possibility of a 'Fall' is implied in a Covenant insofar as the idea of a Covenant implies the possibility of its being violated.
author: Kenneth Burke

quote: We see things in this material world, wherein our bodies dwell, only because our mind through its attention lives in another world, only because it contemplates the beauties of the archetypal and intelligible world which Reason contains.
author: Nicolas Malebranche

quote: One of the penalties for refusing to participate in politics is that you end up being governed by your inferiors.
author: Plato

quote: No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it's not the same river and he's not the same man.
author: Heraclitus

quote: Silence is better than unmeaning words.
author: Pythagoras

quote: The mind is not a vessel to be filled but a fire to be kindled.
author: Plutarch

quote: Words empty as the wind are best left unsaid.
author: Homer

quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
author: Aesop

quote: Of all men's miseries the bitterest is this: to know so much and to have control over nothing.
author: Herodotus

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: He is not a lover who does not love forever.
author: Euripides

quote: Give me a lever long enough and a fulcrum on which to place it, and I shall move the world.
author: Archimedes

quote: Excess of grief for the dead is madness; for it is an injury to the living, and the dead know it not.
author: Xenophon

quote: Whoever has trusted a woman has trusted deceivers.
author: Hesiod

quote: Man is the measure of all things.
author: Protagoras

quote: Every man of action has a strong dose of egoism, pride, hardness, and cunning. But all those things will be regarded as high qualities if he can make them the means to achieve great ends.
author: Giorgos Seferis

quote: As iron is eaten away by rust, so the envious are consumed by their own passion.
author: Antisthenes

quote: I grow old learning something new every day.
author: Solon

quote: An opera begins long before the curtain goes up and ends long after it has come down. It starts in my imagination, it becomes my life, and it stays part of my life long after I've left the opera house.
author: Maria Callas

quote: To become truly immortal, a work of art must escape all human limits: logic and common sense will only interfere. But once these barriers are broken, it will enter the realms of childhood visions and dreams.
author: Giorgio de Chirico

quote: Old women should not seek to be perfumed.
author: Archilochus

quote: Time is the most valuable thing a man can spend.
author: Theophrastus

quote: A man must fortify himself and understand that a wise man who yields to laziness or anger or passion or love of drink, or who commits any other action prompted by impulse and inopportune, will probably find his fault condoned; but if he stoops to greed, he will not be pardoned, but render himself odious as a combination of all vices at once.
author: Apollonius of Tyana

quote: A camel is a horse designed by committee.
author: Alec Issigonis

quote: Love can sometimes be magic. But magic can sometimes... just be an illusion.
author: Javan

quote: I've always had a healthy disregard for authority - it allows me to do my job as a portrait photographer and not as someone who is playing the power game.
author: Platon

quote: In Greece there is a very particular situation because on one hand the colonels took away everyone's political rights, but at the same time the economic and social situation improved.
author: Mikis Theodorakis

quote: They, astounded at the flash of the armor, and the swiftness of the charge, and attacked by showers of arrows and missiles, half naked as they were, never stopped to resist but gave way.
author: Arrian

quote: I am somebody who believes that every political direction is valid, as with every religion. The basis of Christianity is perfect, just like the basis of Islam. But then the leaders change the direction, and lose the quality.
author: Demis Roussos

quote: Delays in granting of justice very often reduce the speed with which investment could be undertaken, discouraging investors.
author: Lucas Papademos

quote: We are given to the cult of personality; when things go badly we look to some messiah to save us. If by chance we think we have found one, it will not be long before we destroy him.
author: Konstantinos Karamanlis

quote: Practice is everything. This is often misquoted as Practice makes perfect.
author: Periander

quote: Why thrust your kid into that? You try to protect them from all the bad people out there.
author: John Aniston

quote: I was very politicized always. I was very conservative politically, because I'd seen what the communists did to my country.
author: Taki Theodoracopulos

quote: Everything yields to diligence.
author: Antiphanes

quote: What, ultimately, is Greece if it is not the people who live in this country? It's not the mountains and the plains.
author: Alexis Tsipras

quote: A lot of people judge me because I like to, you know, look good, but I grew up in fashion.
author: Marie-Chantal Claire

quote: Difficult years lie ahead, patience is required.
author: Yiannis Stournaras

quote: Verily, great grace may go with a little gift; and precious are all things that come from a friend.
author: Theocritus

quote: We have two ears and one mouth so that we can listen twice as much as we speak.
author: Epictetus

quote: There is nothing permanent except change.
author: Heraclitus

quote: Death does not concern us, because as long as we exist, death is not here. And when it does come, we no longer exist.
author: Epicurus

quote: Happiness is a choice that requires effort at times.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Painting is silent poetry, and poetry is painting that speaks.
author: Plutarch

quote: Be still my heart; thou hast known worse than this.
author: Homer

quote: Adventure is worthwhile.
author: Aesop

quote: We must free ourselves of the hope that the sea will ever rest. We must learn to sail in high winds.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: There is the sky, which is all men's together.
author: Euripides

quote: The shortest distance between two points is a straight line.
author: Archimedes

quote: Nothing exists except atoms and empty space; everything else is opinion.
author: Democritus

quote: Every dictator is an enemy of freedom, an opponent of law.
author: Demosthenes

quote: Does not the gratitude of the dog put to shame any man who is ungrateful to his benefactors?
author: Saint Basil

quote: It is not possible either to trick or escape the mind of Zeus.
author: Hesiod

quote: Men are the dreams of a shadow.
author: Pindar

quote: There are only two people who can tell you the truth about yourself - an enemy who has lost his temper and a friend who loves you dearly.
author: Antisthenes

quote: Vice cannot be removed completely, nor is it right that it should be removed.
author: Chrysippus

quote: I'm a composer. I know nothing about money and commercial stuff. I just write music.
author: Vangelis

quote: Art is the fatal net which catches these strange moments on the wing like mysterious butterflies, fleeing the innocence and distraction of common men.
author: Giorgio de Chirico

quote: Let who will boast their courage in the field, I find but little safety from my shield, Nature's, not honour's law we must obey: This made me cast my useless shield away.
author: Archilochus

quote: There is no royal road to geometry.
author: Euclid

quote: The public don't know what they want; it's my job to tell them.
author: Alec Issigonis

quote: I don't wish to be everything to everyone, but I would like to be something to someone.
author: Javan

quote: I choose the likely man in preference to the rich man; I want a man without money rather than money without a man.
author: Themistocles

quote: I'm not a Johnny-come-lately Jew. I've been around. I watch out for the Jews; I watch out for the Catholics.
author: John Catsimatidis

quote: There is this concept of politics as a dirty game. It's a difficult game, but it doesn't have to be dirty. I think this is what we need to bring to politics. I think politics around the world has very often been captured by big interests - 'lobbies' they call them in the States.
author: George Papandreou

quote: There is a mass of immigrants, a million of them without work. We will stop this invasion.
author: Antonis Samaras

quote: Be assured, fellow citizens, that in a democracy it is the laws that guard the person of the citizen and the constitution of the state, whereas the despot and the oligarch find their protection in suspicion and in armed guards.
author: Aeschines

quote: Gradually, decentralized trust will be accepted as a new and effective trust model. We have seen this evolution of understanding before - on the Internet.
author: Andreas Antonopoulos

quote: In the 20 years before Greece end up with the Euro, efforts to improve competitiveness through exchange rate and adjustments resulted only in temporary gains of competitiveness.
author: Lucas Papademos

quote: No one wants to stoke coal if he can regulate an oil valve instead.
author: Stavros Niarchos

quote: When strong, be merciful, if you would have the respect, not the fear of your neighbors.
author: Chilon

quote: People who decide they came to earth to work, who make work their personal philosophy, are kept very busy.
author: Konstantinos Karamanlis

quote: Syriza is what it is: a radical, left-wing party that feels the pulse of the times, knows what's at stake, and is after a wide consensus and unity for political change in Greece. This is something that departs from the narrow limits of the radical left.
author: Alexis Tsipras

quote: In show business, you get chewed up and spit out.
author: John Aniston

quote: I don't see democracy getting better. I see democracy diminishing. More rules, more legislation. Eventually governments will see everything.
author: Taki Theodoracopulos

quote: Every summer my father gave us this incredible vacation, in the Philippines, Thailand, Europe - wherever.
author: Marie-Chantal Claire

quote: There are no such things as the Elgin Marbles.
author: Melina Mercouri

quote: The goal of the government is to guarantee the place of Greece in the eurozone against those who want to undermine it.
author: Yiannis Stournaras

quote: There is no great genius without some touch of madness.
author: Aristotle

quote: Wherever the art of medicine is loved, there is also a love of humanity.
author: Hippocrates

quote: Trust dies but mistrust blossoms.
author: Sophocles

quote: We should remember that one man is much the same as another, and that he is best who is trained in the severest school.
author: Thucydides

quote: Since we cannot change reality, let us change the eyes which see reality.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: Eureka! - I have found it!
author: Archimedes

quote: As a vessel is known by the sound, whether it be cracked or not; so men are proved, by their speeches, whether they be wise or foolish.
author: Demosthenes

quote: Many a man curses the rain that falls upon his head, and knows not that it brings abundance to drive away the hunger.
author: Saint Basil

quote: Do not let a flattering woman coax and wheedle you and deceive you; she is after your barn.
author: Hesiod

quote: Great deeds give choice of many tales. Choose a slight tale, enrich it large, and then let wise men listen.
author: Pindar

quote: Learn to obey before you command.
author: Solon

quote: When my enemies stop hissing, I shall know I'm slipping.
author: Maria Callas

quote: Everything has a natural explanation. The moon is not a god, but a great rock, and the sun a hot rock.
author: Anaxagoras

quote: I believe, however, that such abnormal moments can be found in everyone, and it is all the more fortunate when they occur in individuals with creative talent or with clairvoyant powers.
author: Giorgio de Chirico

quote: And by a prudent flight and cunning save A life which valour could not, from the grave. A better buckler I can soon regain, But who can get another life again?
author: Archilochus

quote: An expert is someone who tells you why you can't do something.
author: Alec Issigonis

quote: People are at their best when they can be natural. And that's the hardest thing as a photographer.
author: Platon

quote: To be bowed by grief is folly; Naught is gained by melancholy; Better than the pain of thinking, Is to steep the sense in drinking.
author: Alcaeus

quote: There are certainly delays in this year's agreed program, and we must quickly catch up. Let's not kid ourselves, there is still big waste in the public sector, and it must stop.
author: Antonis Samaras

quote: Our enemies are Medes and Persians, men who for centuries have lived soft and luxurious lives; we of Macedon for generations past have been trained in the hard school of danger and war. Above all, we are free men, and they are slaves.
author: Arrian

quote: I am not like any other singer in America - I am a new creation.
author: Demis Roussos

quote: If I was sad or afraid, I would sit in a corner and sing. If I was happy I would jump into the middle of the room and sing. It was how I expressed my emotions.
author: Nana Mouskouri

quote: I invite all those who share my anxiety about, and hopes for, the future, and who burn with the desire for a political rebirth, to enlist with us. And addressing myself especially to the young, I invite them to become the vanguard in this sortie of national reconstruction. For a proud and happy Greece!
author: Konstantinos Karamanlis

quote: This is a business. Be smart. Choose wisely.
author: John Aniston

quote: The quest for riches darkens the sense of right and wrong.
author: Antiphanes

quote: Austerity is not part of the European treaties; democracy and the principle of popular sovereignty are.
author: Alexis Tsipras

quote: Much has been said and continues to be said of what little concern the Turks had for the Acropolis treasures.
author: Melina Mercouri

quote: Our problem is not adopting reforms, which we will do without question. It is not reaching an objective, which we will meet. But it is finding an end to the recession.
author: Yiannis Stournaras

quote: By all means, marry. If you get a good wife, you'll become happy; if you get a bad one, you'll become a philosopher.
author: Socrates

quote: Concern should drive us into action and not into a depression. No man is free who cannot control himself.
author: Pythagoras

quote: Cure sometimes, treat often, comfort always.
author: Hippocrates

quote: Without a sign, his sword the brave man draws, and asks no omen, but his country's cause.
author: Homer

quote: A liar will not be believed, even when he speaks the truth.
author: Aesop

quote: Ignorance is bold and knowledge reserved.
author: Thucydides

quote: A person needs a little madness, or else they never dare cut the rope and be free.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: To be one of the best to ever play the game? I think I have the ability to do that. But I've got to work hard. If I just keep talking and don't put some work in, it's not going to happen.
author: Giannis Antetokounmpo

quote: I will venture to maintain that where the teacher is not pleasing to the pupil, there is no education.
author: Xenophon

quote: The sword the body wounds, sharp words the mind.
author: Menander

quote: How can you dare teach a man to read until you've taught him everything else first?
author: Giorgos Seferis

quote: The most useful piece of learning for the uses of life is to unlearn what is untrue.
author: Antisthenes

quote: Let no man be called happy before his death. Till then, he is not happy, only lucky.
author: Solon

quote: It is not I who have lost the Athenians, but the Athenians who have lost me.
author: Anaxagoras

quote: If the party is a broad church, then it only has one priest. It was my job to keep it united and at the same time to ensure that I transform it into a modern liberal party.
author: Kyriakos Mitsotakis

quote: We must consider the distinctive characters and the general nature of plants from the point of view of their morphology, their behavior under external conditions, their mode of generation, and the whole course of their life.
author: Theophrastus

quote: I feel very, very proud that so many people have copied me.
author: Alec Issigonis

quote: I'm a visionary. I'm not a maintenance person.
author: John Catsimatidis

quote: The Marshall Plan was after destruction, and the U.S. came to our help and obviously this was very, very important for the future of Europe. I think now we have all the capabilities of doing it on our own and, in a sense, we have to.
author: George Papandreou

quote: When you want something very dearly, you make the time.
author: Nana Mouskouri

quote: There is absolutely no doubt about it, and I may not be the one that does it, but the cloned child is coming. There is absolutely no way that it will not happen.
author: Panayiotis Zavos

quote: I've become very, very liberal as far as war is concerned. It's just too terrible. I've been to wars and I've seen what happens. I know what it is to be hurt, and it's nothing compared to these guys. To be blind for the rest of your life. To have prosthetic limbs.
author: Taki Theodoracopulos

quote: There was a huge lack of freedom in communist regimes, but at least they had humanity at the center of their thinking.
author: Alexis Tsipras

quote: The vast majority of Greeks accept the need for reform and want to keep our country inside the euro zone.
author: Evangelos Venizelos

quote: If you do not expect the unexpected you will not find it, for it is not to be reached by search or trail.
author: Heraclitus

quote: Anger begins with folly, and ends with repentance.
author: Pythagoras

quote: There are in fact two things, science and opinion; the former begets knowledge, the latter ignorance.
author: Hippocrates

quote: After all is said and done, more is said than done.
author: Aesop

quote: The strong do what they have to do and the weak accept what they have to accept.
author: Thucydides

quote: The real meaning of enlightenment is to gaze with undimmed eyes on all darkness.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: Time is the wisest counselor of all.
author: Pericles

quote: Whatever I try to do, I always try to give it my best and try to be a killer because, at the end of the day, if you don't work hard, you are not going to get food on your table.
author: Giannis Antetokounmpo

quote: For what the horse does under compulsion, as Simon also observes, is done without understanding; and there is no beauty in it either, any more than if one should whip and spur a dancer.
author: Xenophon

quote: Every evil is a sickness of soul, but virtue offers the cause of its health.
author: Saint Basil

quote: For a man wins nothing better than a good wife, and then again nothing deadlier than a bad one.
author: Hesiod

quote: I think there's all these unknown things you can tap into when you just leave things open, and nothing is forbidden. Then you allow yourself to mold that thing that has been created by freedom and spontaneity and flexibility. That's why I avoid limiting performances of actors and characters.
author: Yorgos Lanthimos

quote: Observe your enemies, for they first find out your faults.
author: Antisthenes

quote: Call no man happy before he dies, he is at best but fortunate.
author: Solon

quote: Every day I paint, and every day I compose music.
author: Vangelis

quote: If you look at the policies that were implemented over the past four years post 2015, these are not really growth oriented policies.
author: Kyriakos Mitsotakis

quote: An orator without judgment is a horse without a bridle.
author: Theophrastus

quote: I delight to lodge in such temples as are not regularly kept closed. None of the gods reject me; they make me partner of their roof.
author: Apollonius of Tyana

quote: Perhaps the most important people that I should photograph are the people who don't have a voice.
author: Platon

quote: Always I have lived with two sounds - one political, one musical.
author: Mikis Theodorakis

quote: What happens when an industry transitions from using one or more 'smart' and centralized networks to using a common, decentralized, open, and dumb network? A tsunami of innovation that was pent up for decades is suddenly released.
author: Andreas Antonopoulos

quote: The financial crisis in our country is not a passing storm. Given the size of the problems, our national effort will not be completed in 2012. It will take many years and will require the efforts and insistence of several governments.
author: Lucas Papademos

quote: You do what you have to do in life, when you form a philosophy that you can't talk yourself out of.
author: Konstantinos Karamanlis

quote: We will do whatever we could do to keep Greece inside the euro and inside Europe.
author: Alexis Tsipras

quote: I love to dress up. You have to have a sense of fun in life, too. We can all be serious and work and do our bit, but every now and again you have to have a good giggle.
author: Marie-Chantal Claire

quote: We will do everything to change what needs to be changed, fight against recession so that the country meets its targets, while reinforcing our country in the heart of the euro and the European Union.
author: Yiannis Stournaras

quote: Wisdom comes alone through suffering.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Wise to resolve, and patient to perform.
author: Homer

quote: History is Philosophy teaching by example.
author: Thucydides

quote: True teachers use themselves as bridges over which they invite their students to cross; then, having facilitated their crossing, joyfully collapse, encouraging them to create bridges of their own.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: Question everything. Learn something. Answer nothing.
author: Euripides

quote: You can just never forget where you came from.
author: Giannis Antetokounmpo

quote: Fast is fine, but accuracy is everything.
author: Xenophon

quote: By nature, men desire the beautiful.
author: Saint Basil

quote: Necessity is the strongest of things, for it rules everything.
author: Thales

quote: Don't think too hard. Just be present, and things will reveal themselves.
author: Yorgos Lanthimos

quote: In giving advice seek to help, not to please, your friend.
author: Solon

quote: You are born an artist or you are not. And you stay an artist, dear, even if your voice is less of a fireworks. The artist is always there.
author: Maria Callas

quote: The descent to Hades is the same from every place.
author: Anaxagoras

quote: I have a job to do, and I have a lot of confidence in my abilities.
author: Kyriakos Mitsotakis

quote: Ah, yes, superstition: it would appear to be cowardice in face of the supernatural.

quote: I'm not a politician or a scholar or political historian. I'm just a photographer who's trying to capture a spirit. It's not an intellectual process; it's an intuitive process.
author: Platon

quote: It isn't right to judge strength as better than good wisdom.
author: Xenophanes

quote: Our first goal is to stop the recession and start with recovery.
author: Antonis Samaras

quote: Greece is the only country in the Balkans that does not have territorial designs on its neighbors and wants to live in peace with them.
author: Mikis Theodorakis

quote: I think it's often discussed that leaving the Euro is an option for Greece. I think this is really not an option.
author: Lucas Papademos

quote: One of the most wonderful memories in my life was when I sang at the Opera House in Sydney. I will never forget that. It is one of the most beautiful Houses I have ever sung in my life.
author: Nana Mouskouri

quote: In the future, when we get serious about executing things correctly, this thing will be very easy to do. If we find out that this technique does not work, I don't intend to step on dead bodies to achieve something because I don't have that kind of ambition. My ambition is to help people.
author: Panayiotis Zavos

quote: I'm a third-culture child. It's an interesting concept. Having an American father, a South American mother, born in England, grew up in Hong Kong, went to school in Europe - it makes me a third-culture child, which means you take on the culture of the place where you live. So I'm very adaptable.
author: Marie-Chantal Claire

quote: To know, is to know that you know nothing. That is the meaning of true knowledge.
author: Socrates

quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
author: Plato

quote: There is only a finger's difference between a wise man and a fool.
author: Diogenes

quote: Big results require big ambitions.
author: Heraclitus

quote: The oldest, shortest words - 'yes' and 'no' - are those which require the most thought.
author: Pythagoras

quote: To find fault is easy; to do better may be difficult.
author: Plutarch

quote: Circumstances rule men; men do not rule circumstances.
author: Herodotus

quote: Don't sleep too much. If you sleep three hours less each night for a year, you will have an extra month and a half to succeed in.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: Persistent in life? I think, yes, I am. I'm going to do something until I get it right.
author: Giannis Antetokounmpo

quote: If thou suffer injustice, console thyself; the true unhappiness is in doing it.
author: Democritus

quote: All speech is vain and empty unless it be accompanied by action.
author: Demosthenes

quote: Why, I'd like nothing better than to achieve some bold adventure, worthy of our trip.
author: Aristophanes

quote: The chief beginning of evil is goodness in excess.
author: Menander

quote: Learn what you are and be such.
author: Pindar

quote: The soul is joined to and is separated from the body. Therefore, the soul is corporeal.
author: Chrysippus

quote: I would not kill my enemies, but I will make them get down on their knees. I will, I can, I must.
author: Maria Callas

quote: I have big belief in the Greek real estate market. We live in a lovely country and we need to make investing in Greek real estate more attractive.
author: Kyriakos Mitsotakis

quote: Never may a man prone to believe scandal be a despot or a popular leader! Under his guidance, democracy itself will be despotism.
