quote: As mayor, I would support law enforcement, not knock it down.
author: John Catsimatidis

quote: Better than the strength of men and horses is our wisdom.
author: Xenophanes

quote: I am fully aware of the critical moments we face as a country.
author: Antonis Samaras

quote: My records have done very well in Europe and I want Americans to like my music too.
author: Demis Roussos

quote: The Berlin Wall go down, that was the most wonderful thing that could happen, absolutely. I celebrated with everybody in Berlin that day when the Wall was down.
author: Nana Mouskouri

quote: We're not really under pressure to deliver a cloned baby to this world. What we are under pressure to do is to deliver a cloned baby that is a healthy one.

quote: I knew I was artistic, and I wanted to do something in the arts.
author: Marie-Chantal Claire

quote: Read Churchill, he tells you how crucial was the Greek role in your decisive desert victory over Rommel.

quote: The worst form of inequality is to try to make unequal things equal.

quote: People are not disturbed by things, but by the view they take of them.
author: Epictetus

quote: Let no one be slow to seek wisdom when he is young nor weary in the search of it when he has grown old. For no age is too early or too late for the health of the soul.

quote: Memory is the mother of all wisdom.

quote: Make a habit of two things: to help; or at least to do no harm.
author: Hippocrates

quote: Two friends, two bodies with one soul inspired.
author: Homer

quote: United we stand, divided we fall.
author: Aesop

quote: Justice will not come to Athens until those who are not injured are as indignant as those who are injured.

quote: We come from a dark abyss, we end in a dark abyss, and we call the luminous interval life.

quote: If I can't score, I do whatever I can to support my teammates.
author: Giannis Antetokounmpo

quote: There is small risk a general will be regarded with contempt by those he leads, if, whatever he may have to preach, he shows himself best able to perform.
author: Xenophon

quote: What is the benefit of fasting in our body while filling our souls with innumerable evils? He who does not play at dice, but spends his leisure otherwise, what nonsense does he not utter? What absurdities does he not listen to? Leisure without the fear of God is, for those who do not know how to use time, the teacher of wickedness.
author: Saint Basil

quote: The character of a man is known from his conversations.
author: Menander

quote: Bring a wife home to your house when you are of the right age, not far short of 30 years, nor much above; this is the right time for marriage.
author: Hesiod

quote: Telling a story is the way of exploring so many different things - human behavior, society, whatever existence.
author: Yorgos Lanthimos

quote: Speech is the mirror of action.
author: Solon

quote: I don't need the money, dear. I work for art.
author: Maria Callas

quote: Greece should really be a shipping hub for the world it really should be a shipping hub for the entire world not just for Europe.
author: Kyriakos Mitsotakis

quote: It's very intimidating to be photographed, but if I kneel down and chat with you, so you're looking down at me, it makes you feel less threatened.
author: Platon

quote: All men begin their learning with Homer.
author: Xenophanes

quote: Greece's position in Europe will not be put in doubt.
author: Antonis Samaras

quote: I'm a romantic singer. That's my nook, my motif.
author: Demis Roussos

quote: I grew up thinking that singing was my security.
author: Nana Mouskouri

quote: The social inefficiency of capitalism is going to clash at some point with the technological innovations capitalism engenders, and it is out of that contradiction that a more efficient way of organising production and distribution and culture will emerge.

quote: My motivation is my desire to help people. If people want to have children and cannot in the normal way, and I can do something about it, then I will do so.
author: Panayiotis Zavos

quote: I always did healthy things. I didn't sit around in nightclubs. Sure, I had my fair share of fun, but no one could ever accuse me of being a dilettante and doing nothing. I was always on this unbelievable quest to go and do.

quote: He is richest who is content with the least, for content is the wealth of nature.
author: Socrates

quote: The greater the difficulty the more glory in surmounting it. Skillful pilots gain their reputation from storms and tempests.

quote: You cannot step into the same river twice.
author: Heraclitus

quote: The art of living well and the art of dying well are one.
author: Epicurus

quote: I have learned to hate all traitors, and there is no disease that I spit on more than treachery.

quote: A physician without a knowledge of Astrology has no right to call himself a physician.
author: Hippocrates

quote: Do not count your chickens before they are hatched.
author: Aesop

quote: It is frequently a misfortune to have very brilliant men in charge of affairs. They expect too much of ordinary men.
author: Thucydides

quote: My entire soul is a cry, and all my work is a commentary on that cry.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
author: Euripides

quote: I just stay home all the time. But the things I have learned outside of basketball is you got to take care of your body.
author: Giannis Antetokounmpo

quote: The sweetest of all sounds is praise.
author: Xenophon

quote: Whatever requires an undue amount of thought or trouble or involves a large expenditure of effort and causes our whole life to revolve, as it were, around solicitude for the flesh must be avoided by Christians.

quote: Badness you can get easily, in quantity; the road is smooth, and it lies close by, But in front of excellence the immortal gods have put sweat, and long and steep is the way to it.

quote: I think human relationships - the whole thing is cruel. It's very difficult.

quote: Fate is a sempiternal and unchangeable series and chain of things, rolling and unraveling itself through eternal sequences of cause and effect, of which it is composed and compounded.

quote: If I've made money from music, it was never my aim to do that. I didn't do it to become famous.

quote: I don't see people voting for me for coming from a political family. I see people voting for me despite me coming from a political family.

quote: Every argument is incapable of helping unless it is singular and addressed to a single person. Therefore, one who discourses in any other way presumably does so from love of reputation.

quote: I'm not ashamed of being successful. You know, they criticized Romney for being ashamed of it. I think we've got to inspire our kids that we shouldn't be ashamed to be successful.

quote: Every leader wants to put his or her imprint on the work that they do, and grow up in specific eras.

quote: My dream is to turn Europe into 300 million princes.

quote: UNICEF has made the most rewarding thing that I have ever done in my life.
author: Nana Mouskouri

quote: The U.S. have printed money; they intend to tax the rich in order to avoid the fiscal cliff. These are things that sees anyone who dares to propose them in Greece and Europe labeled an extremist, when at the same time, it's what Obama does.

quote: Greece is a medium-sized country in Europe. Our debt accounts for only 2.5 percent of the total of all members of the euro zone.
author: Evangelos Venizelos

quote: We say to the British government: you have kept those sculptures for almost two centuries. You have cared for them as well as you could, for which we thank you. But now in the name of fairness and morality, please give them back.

quote: Anybody can become angry - that is easy, but to be angry with the right person and to the right degree and at the right time and for the right purpose, and in the right way - that is not within everybody's power and is not easy.

quote: Every heart sings a song, incomplete, until another heart whispers back. Those who wish to sing always find a song. At the touch of a lover, everyone becomes a poet.

quote: The great thieves lead away the little thief.
author: Diogenes

quote: It is folly for a man to pray to the gods for that which he has the power to obtain by himself.

quote: God always strives together with those who strive.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Science is the father of knowledge, but opinion breeds ignorance.
author: Hippocrates

quote: To have a great man for an intimate friend seems pleasant to those who have never tried it; those who have, fear it.

quote: It is easy to be brave from a safe distance.

quote: If a man insisted always on being serious, and never allowed himself a bit of fun and relaxation, he would go mad or become unstable without knowing it.

quote: Find a priest who understands English and doesn't look like Rasputin.

quote: Nothing has more strength than dire necessity.
author: Euripides

quote: Everything existing in the universe is the fruit of chance and necessity.

quote: A man is his own easiest dupe, for what he wishes to be true he generally believes to be true.

quote: Shrines! Shrines! Surely you don't believe in the gods. What's your argument? Where's your proof?

quote: Whom the gods love dies young.
author: Menander

quote: Whatever is beautiful is beautiful by necessity.

quote: Of causes, some are complete and primary, others auxiliary and proximate. Hence, when we say that all things come about through fate by antecedent causes, we do not mean this to be understood as 'by complete and primary causes,' but 'by auxiliary and proximate causes.'

quote: I don't know what happens to me on stage. Something else seems to take over.

quote: While most of the music I write is instrumental, I love to use the human voice as another instrument.

quote: The gods did not reveal, from the beginning, all things to us.
author: Xenophanes

quote: The Greek people today voted for Greece to remain on its European path and in the eurozone.

quote: I've been uprooted. I don't think a tree that's been uprooted as a happy tree and I'm not very happy. I can't be. I do not accept to be.

quote: The participation of our country in the eurozone is a guarantee for the country's monetary stability. It is a driver of financial prosperity.

quote: I plan to concentrate on helping set up a Pan-European political movement, inspired by the Athens Spring, that will work toward Europe's democratization.
author: Yanis Varoufakis

quote: Those who have a lot of money in Greece invest in housing abroad. It's all immoral. The Greek crisis is structural, but also political.

quote: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.

quote: When I look upon seamen, men of science and philosophers, man is the wisest of all beings; when I look upon priests and prophets nothing is as contemptible as man.
author: Diogenes

quote: Of all the things which wisdom provides to make us entirely happy, much the greatest is the possession of friendship.

quote: The life so short, the craft so long to learn.
author: Hippocrates

quote: To him who is in fear everything rustles.

quote: The level of our success is limited only by our imagination and no act of kindness, however small, is ever wasted.

quote: Men's indignation, it seems, is more excited by legal wrong than by violent wrong; the first looks like being cheated by an equal, the second like being compelled by a superior.

quote: Beauty is merciless. You do not look at it, it looks at you and does not forgive.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: We regard wealth as something to be properly used, rather than as something to boast about. As for poverty, no one need be ashamed to admit it: the real shame is in not taking practical measures to escape from it.

quote: Throw moderation to the winds, and the greatest pleasures bring the greatest pains.

quote: For myself, I think that those who cultivate wisdom and believe themselves able to instruct their fellow-citizens as to their interests are least likely to become partisans of violence. They are too well aware that to violence attach enmities and dangers, whereas results as good may be obtained by persuasion safely and amicably.
author: Xenophon

quote: Do not measure your loss by itself; if you do, it will seem intolerable; but if you will take all human affairs into account you will find that some comfort is to be derived from them.
author: Saint Basil

quote: You should not decide until you have heard what both have to say.

quote: Admire a small ship, but put your freight in a large one; for the larger the load, the greater will be the profit upon profit.

quote: Having rules means that sometimes people break them, and that means punishment.
author: Yorgos Lanthimos

quote: Good teachers make the best of a pupil's means; great teachers foresee a pupil's ends.

quote: I'm very happy that people call me by my first name now. They seem to believe that I'm not just doing this job because my father did. I also hope I will be more successful than my father.

quote: Just as an individual of pre-eminent worth transforms democracy into a monarchy of the best man, even so the rule of one man, if in all things it has an eye to the common welfare, is democracy.

quote: There is one God - supreme among gods and men - who is like mortals in neither body nor mind.
author: Xenophanes

quote: I put one questions. For whom I compose? My answer is I wanted to address to all my people. And if I write music for the Greek people because I'm Greek, I compose for all the people.
author: Mikis Theodorakis

quote: Our membership of the euro is a guarantee of monetary stability and creates the right conditions for sustainable growth. Our membership of the euro is the only choice.
author: Lucas Papademos

quote: I have a lot of social engagements, and I like to dress up for them. I try to wear what I feel comfortable in, as self-confidence is so much about how you look. Generally, I love to wear long dresses; they make you feel special.
author: Marie-Chantal Claire

quote: Once made equal to man, woman becomes his superior.
author: Socrates

quote: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
author: Plato

quote: He has the most who is most content with the least.
author: Diogenes

quote: The hidden harmony is better than the obvious.
author: Heraclitus

quote: There is nothing so easy but that it becomes difficult when you do it reluctantly.
author: Pythagoras

quote: The very spring and root of honesty and virtue lie in good education.
author: Plutarch

quote: Light is the task where many share the toil.
author: Homer

quote: Appearances are often deceiving.
author: Aesop

quote: The more you own, the more you know you don't own.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: No one can confidently say that he will still be living tomorrow.

quote: Just every day try to be a leader, try to get better and to help my team win. I just want to be more vocal, like talk more so my teammates can know I got their back.
author: Giannis Antetokounmpo

quote: He who eats with most pleasure is he who least requires sauce.
author: Xenophon

quote: Liberated from the error of pagan tradition through the benevolence and loving kindness of the good God with the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, and by the operation of the Holy Spirit, I was reared from the very beginning by Christian parents. From them I learned even in babyhood the Holy Scriptures which led me to a knowledge of the truth.
author: Saint Basil

quote: These impossible women! How they do get around us! The poet was right: Can't live with them, or without them.
author: Aristophanes

quote: I'm a big believer in the transatlantic relationship. I have to work with whoever is in the White House.
author: Kyriakos Mitsotakis

quote: Multicolored stones and paintings, walkways, and theaters are useless in a city unless it also contains wisdom and law. Such things are the subject of wisdom and law, not equivalent to them.
author: Apollonius of Tyana

quote: I am not a photojournalist and certainly not used to the Jason Bourne type stuff that some photographers have to deal with.
author: Platon

quote: There are certain moments in the history of a nation when the choices made define the decades to come.
author: George Papandreou

quote: My music came right on time. It was romantic Mediterranean music addressed to all the people who wanted to go on holiday.
author: Demis Roussos

quote: My first encounter with Marx's writings came very early in life, as a result of the strange times I grew up in, with Greece exiting the nightmare of the neofascist dictatorship of 1967-74.
author: Yanis Varoufakis

quote: From the deepest desires often come the deadliest hate.
author: Socrates

quote: The first and greatest victory is to conquer yourself; to be conquered by yourself is of all things most shameful and vile.
author: Plato

quote: All religions must be tolerated... for every man must get to heaven in his own way.
author: Epictetus

quote: Nothing endures but change.
author: Heraclitus

quote: There is a good principle which created order, light, and man, and an evil principle which created chaos, darkness, and woman.
author: Pythagoras

quote: The real destroyer of the liberties of the people is he who spreads among them bounties, donations and benefits.
author: Plutarch

quote: There is no witness so terrible and no accuser so powerful as conscience which dwells within us.
author: Sophocles

quote: I am bound to tell what I am told, but not in every case to believe it.
author: Herodotus

quote: For famous men have the whole earth as their memorial.
author: Pericles

quote: I'm a humble kid. I grew up with Filathlitikos. There were some people in Filathlitikos that taught to me how to stay humble. It was coach Tzivas that never allowed me to get carried away. That's who I am.
author: Giannis Antetokounmpo

quote: You see that even the enemy did not dare to declare war against us till they had seized our generals, for they were sensible that, while we had commanders and yielded obedience to them, we were able to conquer them; but, having seized our commanders, they concluded that we should, from a want of command and discipline, be destroyed.
author: Xenophon

quote: It is impious to say that evil has its origin from God, because naught contrary is produced by the contrary. Life does not generate death, nor is darkness the beginning of light, nor is disease the maker of health, but in the changes of conditions there are transitions from one condition to the contrary.
author: Saint Basil

quote: Let bravery be thy choice, but not bravado.
author: Menander

quote: The present will not long endure.
author: Pindar

quote: I am not an angel and do not pretend to be. That is not one of my roles. But I am not the devil either. I am a woman and a serious artist, and I would like so to be judged.
author: Maria Callas

quote: Not being able to read and write music is not the same as being illiterate in speech and writing.
author: Yanni

quote: I'm a portrait photographer that's used to shooting celebrities, and I usually need time and all kinds of lights and a studio to set up my shots.
author: Platon

quote: You can theorise about the options you have but in reality they are very specific.
author: George Papandreou

quote: My music was liked by the people.
author: Demis Roussos

quote: Dealing with Greece's problems will be more difficult if Greece is not a member of the eurozone.
author: Lucas Papademos

quote: Every non-Marxist economic theory that treats human and non-human productive inputs as interchangeable assumes that the dehumanisation of human labour is complete. But if it could ever be completed, the result would be the end of capitalism as a system capable of creating and distributing value.
author: Yanis Varoufakis

quote: Much learning does not teach understanding.
author: Heraclitus

quote: The most momentous thing in human life is the art of winning the soul to good or evil.
author: Pythagoras

quote: Death is softer by far than tyranny.
author: Aeschylus

quote: It is more important to know what sort of person has a disease than to know what sort of disease a person has.
author: Hippocrates

quote: Our happiness depends on wisdom all the way.
author: Sophocles

quote: We Greeks are lovers of the beautiful, yet simple in our tastes, and we cultivate the mind without loss of manliness.
author: Thucydides

quote: Leave no stone unturned.
author: Euripides

quote: I was selling stuff probably since I could remember, like 6 or 7 years old. I was always out there helping my mom and dad sell watches, glasses, CDs, DVDs, stuff like that. Whatever we could put our hands on. I did it until I was around 17. But I was just doing it because I had to. There was no other option.
author: Giannis Antetokounmpo

quote: It is better to destroy one's own errors than those of others.
author: Democritus

quote: The best protection for the people is not necessarily to believe everything people tell them.
author: Demosthenes

quote: Men of sense often learn from their enemies. It is from their foes, not their friends, that cities learn the lesson of building high walls and ships of war.
author: Aristophanes

quote: He is senseless who would match himself against a stronger man; for he is deprived of victory and adds suffering to disgrace.
author: Hesiod

quote: On stage, I am in the dark.
author: Maria Callas

quote: Truth is the number one element in whatever you do with music.
author: Yanni

quote: I've been one of the image-makers who created this concept of perfection. I've done a thousand magazine covers where I'm celebrating Hollywood, glamorous people. Which is all good. It's all entertainment.
author: Platon

quote: People would say you look weak if you're not cursing the opposition and driving around in a big black car while always wearing a tie. Above all, to be 'strong' you're always supposed to be giving orders.
author: George Papandreou

quote: In Greece, the picket line is forbidden.
author: Mikis Theodorakis

quote: And judging what is appropriate or not appropriate for a country, I think it is important in particular in judging what is the appropriate economic policy framework, one should take into account the overall political environment and the institutional framework within which economic policy operates.
author: Lucas Papademos

quote: My hope that Thatcher would inadvertently bring about a new political revolution was well and truly bogus. All that sprang out of Thatcherism were extreme financialisation, the triumph of the shopping mall over the corner store, the fetishisation of housing and Tony Blair.
author: Yanis Varoufakis

quote: True wisdom comes to each of us when we realize how little we understand about life, ourselves, and the world around us.
author: Socrates

quote: There are two things a person should never be angry at, what they can help, and what they cannot.
author: Plato

quote: Justice will overtake fabricators of lies and false witnesses.
author: Heraclitus

quote: Beans have a soul.
author: Pythagoras

quote: Courage consists not in hazarding without fear; but being resolutely minded in a just cause.
author: Plutarch

quote: Hateful to me as are the gates of hell, Is he who, hiding one thing in his heart, Utters another.
author: Homer

quote: Slow but steady wins the race.
author: Aesop

quote: He is the best man who, when making his plans, fears and reflects on everything that can happen to him, but in the moment of action is bold.
author: Herodotus

quote: Let your youth have free reign. It won't come again, so be bold, and no repenting.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: All who have taken it upon themselves to rule over others have incurred hatred and unpopularity for a time; but if one has a great aim to pursue, this burden of envy must be accepted, and it is wise to accept it.
author: Pericles

quote: Hope of ill gain is the beginning of loss.
author: Democritus

quote: There is one safeguard known generally to the wise, which is an advantage and security to all, but especially to democracies as against despots - suspicion.
author: Demosthenes

quote: No one who is in this world will deny that evils exist. What, then, do we say? That evil is not a living and animated substance, but a condition of the soul which is opposed to virtue and which springs up In the slothful because of their falling away from good.
author: Saint Basil

quote: He who labors diligently need never despair; for all things are accomplished by diligence and labor.
author: Menander

quote: The best is he who calls men to the best. And those who heed the call are also blessed. But worthless who call not, heed not, but rest.
author: Hesiod

quote: If something were brought about without an antecedent cause, it would be untrue that all things come about through fate. But if it is plausible that all events have an antecedent cause, what ground can be offered for not conceding that all things come about through fate?
author: Chrysippus

quote: The avant-garde feel important, but they hardly understand what they're doing.
author: Vangelis

quote: I believe business has to do well and that the surrounding communities do well.
author: John Catsimatidis

quote: Macedonia was, is and will forever be Greek.
author: Mikis Theodorakis

quote: My job will not be easy but I am convinced the problems will be solved in a quicker and more efficient way if there is unity and consensus.
author: Lucas Papademos

quote: It's nice to look good, but the most important thing is to be you.
author: Nana Mouskouri

quote: It was such an idyllic time when I grew up in Hong Kong. It was a British colony and very much geared towards buying the best of Britain. My childhood does have a huge influence on how we design. There must be a little bit of that nostalgia - childhood is so special.
author: Marie-Chantal Claire

quote: A friend to all is a friend to none.
author: Aristotle

quote: If you want to improve, be content to be thought foolish and stupid.
author: Epictetus

quote: Justice... is a kind of compact not to harm or be harmed.
author: Epicurus

quote: Time brings all things to pass.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Everything in excess is opposed to nature.
author: Hippocrates

quote: No enemy is worse than bad advice.
author: Sophocles

quote: Beware lest you lose the substance by grasping at the shadow.
author: Aesop

quote: I felt deep within me that the highest point a man can attain is not Knowledge or Virtue or Goodness or Victory but something even greater, more heroic and more despairing: Sacred Awe!
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: It is right to endure with resignation what the gods send, and to face one's enemies with courage.
author: Pericles

quote: Raising children is an uncertain thing; success is reached only after a life of battle and worry.
author: Democritus

quote: Excessive dealings with tyrants are not good for the security of free states.
author: Demosthenes

quote: Even God lends a hand to honest boldness.
author: Menander

quote: I think you can tell a lot about people if you observe them as they're observing.
author: Yorgos Lanthimos

quote: If you look for truth, you have to be courageous.
author: Vangelis

quote: O thou Sun, send me as far over the earth as is my pleasure and thine, and may I make the acquaintance of good men, but never hear anything of bad ones, nor they of me.
author: Apollonius of Tyana

quote: Greece has given Europe the opportunity to fix a defect in the euro zone, that is the fact that we did not have a fiscal union. Now steps have been taken to begin that process. And there is more solidarity from nation to nation, and that is a good thing. That has been Greece's gift to Europe.
author: George Papandreou

quote: We cry. The Greeks cry because we have not an objective today. Yesterday we have objective to put off the dictatorship. Today the objective is to find ourselves.
author: Mikis Theodorakis

quote: Our position in Europe is not negotiable. The Greek people will defend it by all means. But participation in the euro involves rules and obligations, which we must consistently meet. Greece belongs to Europe and Europe cannot be envisaged without Greece.
author: Lucas Papademos

quote: The euro is a hybrid of a fixed exchange-rate regime, like the 1980s ERM or the 1930s gold standard, and a state currency.
author: Yanis Varoufakis

quote: It is impossible to begin to learn that which one thinks one already knows.
author: Epictetus

quote: Eyes and ears are poor witnesses to people if they have uncultured souls.
author: Heraclitus

quote: It is impossible to live a pleasant life without living wisely and well and justly. And it is impossible to live wisely and well and justly without living a pleasant life.
author: Epicurus

quote: Bronze in the mirror of the form, wine of the mind.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Natural forces within us are the true healers of disease.
author: Hippocrates

quote: The little reed, bending to the force of the wind, soon stood upright again when the storm had passed over.
author: Aesop

quote: The masses do not see the Sirens. They do not hear songs in the air. Blind, deaf, stooping, they pull at their oars in the hold of the earth. But the more select, the captains, harken to a Siren within them... and royally squander their lives with her.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: The bravest are surely those who have the clearest vision of what is before them, glory and danger alike, and yet notwithstanding go out to meet it.
author: Pericles

quote: I'm a really competitive guy. I'm a really stubborn guy. That's what makes me want to take Milwaukee to the top, make Milwaukee a big market team. That's a goal I've set for myself. Hopefully, one day I can achieve it.
author: Giannis Antetokounmpo

quote: For drink, there was beer which was very strong when not mingled with water, but was agreeable to those who were used to it. They drank this with a reed, out of the vessel that held the beer, upon which they saw the barley swim.
author: Xenophon

quote: As we were baptized, so we profess our belief. As we profess our belief, so also we offer praise. As then baptism has been given us by the Savior, in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Ghost, so, in accordance with our baptism, we make the confession of the creed, and our doxology in accordance with our creed.
author: Saint Basil

quote: 'Know thyself' is a good saying, but not in all situations. In many it is better to say 'know others.'
author: Menander

quote: Women are not pals enough with men, so we must make ourselves indispensable. After all, we have the greatest weapon in our hands by just being women.
author: Maria Callas

quote: And going into my studio at night, particularly at night when everybody's asleep, is just a total pleasure for me.
author: Yanni

quote: While in my late teens and in my 20s, I worked seven days a week, 20 hours a day. I worked my tail off.
author: John Catsimatidis

quote: I was thankful to him, this man who freed me. At the same time I was annoyed be cause the man who freed me doesn't have the right to speak for me. I had no intention to disavow my old principles. But to disavow Servan Schreiber made for problems.
author: Mikis Theodorakis

quote: I am a unique kind of personage and voice! No one else is like me!
author: Demis Roussos

quote: I was born a singer. I need to do that.
author: Nana Mouskouri

quote: I think it's very important to have the stewardship of a company by a family member.
author: Marie-Chantal Claire

quote: Republics decline into democracies and democracies degenerate into despotisms.
author: Aristotle

quote: Only the educated are free.
author: Epictetus

quote: It is possible to provide security against other ills, but as far as death is concerned, we men live in a city without walls.
author: Epicurus

quote: Search well and be wise, nor believe that self-willed pride will ever be better than good counsel.
author: Aeschylus

quote: What medicines do not heal, the lance will; what the lance does not heal, fire will.
author: Hippocrates

quote: The keenest sorrow is to recognize ourselves as the sole cause of all our adversities.
author: Sophocles

quote: How much better a thing it is to be envied than to be pitied.
author: Herodotus

quote: Life is trouble. Only death is not. To be alive is to unfasten your belt and look for a fight.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: It is more of a disgrace to be robbed of what one has than to fail in some new undertaking.
author: Pericles

quote: Now as of old the gods give men all good things, excepting only those that are baneful and injurious and useless. These, now as of old, are not gifts of the gods: men stumble into them themselves because of their own blindness and folly.
author: Democritus

quote: It will not always be summer; build barns.
author: Hesiod

quote: Love is so much better when you're not married.
author: Maria Callas

quote: Success is sweet and treacherous.
author: Vangelis

quote: I feel friendship towards philosophers, but towards sophists, teachers of literature, or any other such kind of godforsaken people, I neither feel friendship now, nor may I ever do so in the future.
author: Apollonius of Tyana

quote: Today I want to send a message of optismism to all Greeks. Our road, our path, will be more stabilised. Our country will be in a better situation. We will be stronger.
author: George Papandreou

quote: Our eurozone partners have made it clear: The choice is between staying in or getting out of the eurozone.
author: Lucas Papademos

quote: Bankruptocracy is as much a European predicament as it is an American 'invention.' The difference between the experience of the two continents is that at least Americans did not have to labour under the enormous design faults of the eurozone.
author: Yanis Varoufakis

quote: Wisdom begins in wonder.
author: Socrates

quote: To attain any assured knowledge about the soul is one of the most difficult things in the world.
author: Aristotle

quote: The world turns aside to let any man pass who knows where he is going.
author: Epictetus

quote: A man's character is his guardian divinity.
author: Heraclitus

quote: Above all things, reverence yourself.
author: Pythagoras

quote: Whenever a doctor cannot do good, he must be kept from doing harm.
author: Hippocrates

quote: Children are the anchors that hold a mother to life.
author: Sophocles

quote: Force has no place where there is need of skill.
author: Herodotus

quote: No one is truly free, they are a slave to wealth, fortune, the law, or other people restraining them from acting according to their will.
author: Euripides

quote: Trees, though they are cut and loped, grow up again quickly, but if men are destroyed, it is not easy to get them again.
author: Pericles

quote: Wherever magistrates were appointed from among those who complied with the injunctions of the laws, Socrates considered the government to be an aristocracy.
author: Xenophon

quote: The wise learn many things from their enemies.
author: Aristophanes

quote: He fashions evil for himself who does evil to another, and an evil plan does mischief to the planner.
author: Hesiod

quote: I was always too mature for my age - and not very happy. I had no young friends. I wish I could go back to those days. If I could only live it all again, how I would play and enjoy other girls. What a fool I was.
author: Maria Callas

quote: In my judgment, excellence and wealth are direct opposites, since when the one shrinks, the other grows, and when one grows, the other shrinks.
author: Apollonius of Tyana

quote: As long as I feel I am doing what I think is right and just for my country, for the Greek people, that is enough for me. Saving Greece from this crisis was the first thing on the agenda. We are now on a much more normalised road.
author: George Papandreou

quote: Everything that happens in the life of a human being, especially artists, who are supposed to be more sensitive, yes, it can affect you. In Lebanon I saw 10- and 12-year-old kids walking around with guns, and I understood how much human actions affect people.
author: Demis Roussos

quote: With my songs I tried to prove that there is love.
author: Nana Mouskouri

quote: Those that know, do. Those that understand, teach.
author: Aristotle

quote: Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself.
author: Plato

quote: A friend is one soul abiding in two bodies.
author: Diogenes

quote: A free life cannot acquire many possessions, because this is not easy to do without servility to mobs or monarchs.
author: Epicurus

quote: There is no sickness worse for me than words that to be kind must lie.
author: Aeschylus

quote: True friends appear less moved than counterfeit.
author: Homer

quote: We often give our enemies the means for our own destruction.
author: Aesop

quote: In soft regions are born soft men.
author: Herodotus

quote: Talk sense to a fool and he calls you foolish.
author: Euripides

quote: I like living in a smaller place, but I like being in big cities, too, like Athens.
author: Giannis Antetokounmpo

quote: Wise people, even though all laws were abolished, would still lead the same life.
author: Aristophanes

quote: Acquisition means life to miserable mortals.
author: Hesiod

quote: It's a very terrible thing to be Maria Callas, because it's a question of trying to understand something you can never really understand.
author: Maria Callas

quote: I am so happy that I didn't go to school and I didn't have anyone to tell me how to position my fingers on the piano correctly. And what you do with music and what is the correct way to write it and what is not the correct way to write it.
author: Yanni

quote: I'm a New York businessman.
author: John Catsimatidis

quote: I wanted to unite the popular and the serious, and to make a popular symphony, a popular oratorio.
author: Mikis Theodorakis

quote: When I was growing up in the United States and Sweden, I never thought about becoming a politician.
author: George Papandreou

quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
author: Helen Keller

quote: A single sunbeam is enough to drive away many shadows.
author: Francis of Assisi

quote: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
author: Edith Wharton

quote: Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: If you always put limit on everything you do, physical or anything else. It will spread into your work and into your life. There are no limits. There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there, you must go beyond them.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Whatever you vividly imagine, ardently desire, sincerely believe, and enthusiastically act upon... must inevitably come to pass!
author: Paul J. Meyer

quote: To the mind that is still, the whole universe surrenders.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: There is nothing impossible to him who will try.
author: Alexander the Great

quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
author: Robin Williams

quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Today I choose life. Every morning when I wake up I can choose joy, happiness, negativity, pain... To feel the freedom that comes from being able to continue to make mistakes and choices - today I choose to feel life, not to deny my humanity but embrace it.
author: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.
author: Martin Luther

quote: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: Two roads diverged in a wood and I - I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.
author: Robert Frost

quote: The most authentic thing about us is our capacity to create, to overcome, to endure, to transform, to love and to be greater than our suffering.
author: Ben Okri

quote: All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Keep your feet on the ground, but let your heart soar as high as it will. Refuse to be average or to surrender to the chill of your spiritual environment.
author: Arthur Helps

quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
author: Og Mandino

quote: I believe that if one always looked at the skies, one would end up with wings.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Most of us have far more courage than we ever dreamed we possessed.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: Tomorrow is the most important thing in life. Comes into us at midnight very clean. It's perfect when it arrives and it puts itself in our hands. It hopes we've learned something from yesterday.
author: John Wayne

quote: When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Let us remember: One book, one pen, one child, and one teacher can change the world.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: What great thing would you attempt if you knew you could not fail?
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: Learning how to be still, to really be still and let life happen - that stillness becomes a radiance.
author: Morgan Freeman

quote: Miracles are a retelling in small letters of the very same story which is written across the whole world in letters too large for some of us to see.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: A champion is someone who gets up when he can't.
author: Jack Dempsey

quote: I believe that one defines oneself by reinvention. To not be like your parents. To not be like your friends. To be yourself. To cut yourself out of stone.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: If the doors of perception were cleansed everything would appear to man as it is, infinite.
author: William Blake

quote: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.
author: Ella Fitzgerald

quote: Light tomorrow with today!
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: Turn your face to the sun and the shadows fall behind you.
author: Unknown

quote: I believe there's an inner power that makes winners or losers. And the winners are the ones who really listen to the truth of their hearts.
author: Sylvester Stallone

quote: Prayer is man's greatest power!
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: We have it in our power to begin the world over again.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Every story I create, creates me. I write to create myself.
author: Octavia E. Butler

quote: In oneself lies the whole world and if you know how to look and learn, the door is there and the key is in your hand. Nobody on earth can give you either the key or the door to open, except yourself.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: The most beautiful thing in the world is, of course, the world itself.
author: Wallace Stevens

quote: If you accept the expectations of others, especially negative ones, then you never will change the outcome.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Memories of our lives, of our works and our deeds will continue in others.
author: Rosa Parks

quote: When the sun is shining I can do anything; no mountain is too high, no trouble too difficult to overcome.
author: Wilma Rudolph

quote: A compliment is something like a kiss through a veil.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Lord, grant that I may always desire more than I can accomplish.
author: Michelangelo

quote: The authentic self is the soul made visible.
author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quote: From a small seed a mighty trunk may grow.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Thought is the wind, knowledge the sail, and mankind the vessel.
author: Augustus Hare

quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
author: Sharon Begley

quote: Every charitable act is a stepping stone toward heaven.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: The fact that I can plant a seed and it becomes a flower, share a bit of knowledge and it becomes another's, smile at someone and receive a smile in return, are to me continual spiritual exercises.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Let every dawn be to you as the beginning of life, and every setting sun be to you as its close.
author: John Ruskin

quote: Show me your hands. Do they have scars from giving? Show me your feet. Are they wounded in service? Show me your heart. Have you left a place for divine love?
author: Fulton J. Sheen

quote: We relish news of our heroes, forgetting that we are extraordinary to somebody too.
author: Helen Hayes

quote: Yesterday we obeyed kings and bent our necks before emperors. But today we kneel only to truth, follow only beauty, and obey only love.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: A #2 pencil and a dream can take you anywhere.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Courage, my friends; 'tis not too late to build a better world.
author: Tommy Douglas

quote: Love the moment and the energy of that moment will spread beyond all boundaries.
author: Corita Kent

quote: You change your life by changing your heart.
author: Max Lucado

quote: Of all things visible, the highest is the heaven of the fixed stars.
author: Nicolaus Copernicus

quote: You are always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.
author: Richard Bach

quote: Enthusiasm moves the world.
author: Arthur Balfour

quote: And when I breathed, my breath was lightning.
author: Black Elk

quote: Your heart is full of fertile seeds, waiting to sprout.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: Find out who you are and be that person. That's what your soul was put on this Earth to be. Find that truth, live that truth and everything else will come.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: I know why I am here and my only real focused goal is to live each day to the fullest and to try and honor God and be an encouragement to others. What the future holds is firmly in God's hands, and I am very happy about that!
author: Ken Hensley

quote: Let each man exercise the art he knows.
author: Aristophanes

quote: Noble deeds that are concealed are most esteemed.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: I arise full of eagerness and energy, knowing well what achievement lies ahead of me.
author: Zane Grey

quote: The handicap of deafness is not in the ear; it is in the mind.
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: Joy descends gently upon us like the evening dew, and does not patter down like a hailstorm.
author: Jean Paul

quote: A human being has so many skins inside, covering the depths of the heart. We know so many things, but we don't know ourselves! Why, thirty or forty skins or hides, as thick and hard as an ox's or bear's, cover the soul. Go into your own ground and learn to know yourself there.
author: Meister Eckhart

quote: Too low they build, who build beneath the stars.
author: Edward Young

quote: Man never made any material as resilient as the human spirit.
author: Bernard Williams

quote: The undertaking of a new action brings new strength.
author: Richard L. Evans

quote: Be brave enough to live life creatively. The creative place where no one else has ever been.
author: Alan Alda

quote: Belief creates the actual fact.
author: William James

quote: From its brilliancy everything is illuminated.
author: Guru Nanak

quote: It's a moment that I'm after, a fleeting moment, but not a frozen moment.
author: Andrew Wyeth

quote: Great hopes make great men.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: The truth is on the march and nothing will stop it.
author: Emile Zola

quote: It is not ignorance but knowledge which is the mother of wonder.
author: Joseph Wood Krutch

quote: Nothing makes one feel so strong as a call for help.
author: Pope Paul VI

quote: I believe it is in my nature to dance by virtue of the beat of my heart, the pulse of my blood and the music in my mind.
author: Robert Fulghum

quote: Ideas shape the course of history.
author: John Maynard Keynes

quote: Plant thy foot firmly in the prints which His foot has made before thee.
author: Joseph Barber Lightfoot

quote: The Wright brothers flew right through the smoke screen of impossibility.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: As people are walking all the time, in the same spot, a path appears.
author: John Locke

quote: Nothing is worth more than this day.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: The essential elements of giving are power and love - activity and affection - and the consciousness of the race testifies that in the high and appropriate exercise of these is a blessedness greater than any other.
author: Mark Hopkins

quote: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Only those who have learned the power of sincere and selfless contribution experience life's deepest joy: true fulfillment.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Each day provides its own gifts.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: We convince by our presence.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
author: Francis of Assisi

quote: I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
author: Anne Frank

quote: With self-discipline most anything is possible.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The measure of who we are is what we do with what we have.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Everyone here has the sense that right now is one of those moments when we are influencing the future.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Once I knew only darkness and stillness... my life was without past or future... but a little word from the fingers of another fell into my hand that clutched at emptiness, and my heart leaped to the rapture of living.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Live your beliefs and you can turn the world around.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Love and desire are the spirit's wings to great deeds.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: How glorious a greeting the sun gives the mountains!
author: John Muir

quote: It is always the simple that produces the marvelous.
author: Amelia Barr

quote: Reach for it. Push yourself as far as you can.
author: Christa McAuliffe

quote: Silence is the last thing the world will ever hear from me.
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: God loves to help him who strives to help himself.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Every heart that has beat strongly and cheerfully has left a hopeful impulse behind it in the world, and bettered the tradition of mankind.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: I want to make this world perfect.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: Mankind is made great or little by its own will.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: I celebrate myself, and sing myself.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: The ideal life is in our blood and never will be still.
author: Phillips Brooks

quote: I love those who yearn for the impossible.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: To be an Instagram model, you absolutely cannot just post pictures of yourself in a bikini for the sake of people seeing you in a bikini - even if that is exactly what you are doing. No, you need to caption these photos with an inspirational quote so that people will know that you are not just a butt, you're a gosh dang philosopher.
author: Kat Timpf

quote: The best form of flattery is to be admired, imitated or respected. I've always felt proud our fans look up to us or feel we are inspirational.
author: Cheryl James

quote: Inspirational leaders need to have a winning mentality in order to inspire respect. It is hard to trust in the leadership of someone who is half-hearted about their purpose, or only sporadic in focus or enthusiasm.
author: Sebastian Coe

quote: If you want to know why the coast is such an inspirational place, ask Herman Melville, Jack London, Nordhoff and Hall, Robert Louis Stevenson or Joseph Conrad. It's a glimpse of eternity. It invites rumination, the relentless whisper of the tide against the shore.
author: John Cooper Clarke

quote: I know that my life story is an inspirational one and one that can, hopefully, help others achieve goals in their own lives.
author: Montel Vontavious Porter

quote: I've never been a die-hard Beyonce fan. I always thought she was inspirational and beautiful.
author: Winnie Harlow

quote: What were once only hopes for the future have now come to pass; it is almost exactly 13 years since the overwhelming majority of people in Ireland and Northern Ireland voted in favour of the agreement signed on Good Friday 1998, paving the way for Northern Ireland to become the exciting and inspirational place that it is today.
author: Queen Elizabeth II

quote: I had hoped when my life was chronicled, it would be an inspirational story.
author: Om Puri

quote: If someone says 'grunge' or 'punk,' you know what the sound is, but if you say 'No Wave,' it's kind of mysterious. That was the most interesting part and should have been the most inspirational thing about it... here's this collective sonic insanity, and none of it sounds anything alike.
author: Lydia Lunch

quote: It is such a luxury to open a new book that's highly recommended by friends - either an inspirational yet humorously self-deprecating memoir, or a page-turning piece of fiction.
author: Kelli O'Hara

quote: There are thousands of inspirational stories waiting to be told about young women who yearn for a great education. They are stories of struggle and stories of success, and they will inspire others to take action and work to change lives.
author: Soledad O'Brien

quote: I think anyone who has a passion for what they love to do, and who pursue it, is inspirational for me.
author: Colin Morgan

quote: Can a person be inspirational? Does a person have global sensibility? That's the hardest thing to find.
author: Anand Mahindra

quote: The people that are inspirational to me are those who are truly struggling.
author: Melody Gardot

quote: It was incredible being on tour with Taylor Swift: she was the epitome of a professional, and she works so hard. For someone as successful as her to work that hard every night - truly inspirational.
author: Shawn Mendes

quote: You never know when some small thing will lead to a big idea. Travel is very inspirational - but it's in the ordinary that I find my themes of love and work and family.
author: Adriana Trigiani

quote: I'm not here to impose Sharia law, and I'm not here to have a message about disability being inspirational - I'm here to make people laugh. But when I can layer things and make people not only laugh but question, make people not only laugh but be offended... I have to do that.
author: Maysoon Zayid

quote: I may not have got the Nobel Prize, but I've won countless other awards, including 'Most Inspirational Living Woman Scientist.'
author: Jocelyn Bell Burnell

quote: 'Star Wars' is fun, its exciting, its inspirational, and people respond to that. It's what they want.
author: George Lucas

quote: Inspirational content really resonates, like how to raise venture capital.
author: Justin Kan

quote: The power of pop culture stories should not be underestimated, and there is an enormous potential for inspirational stories that can have a positive, transformative effect on our lives.
author: Anita Sarkeesian

quote: Kunta Kinte is the closest thing I've ever seen... to a superhero. He's amazing. He's inspirational.
author: Malachi Kirby

quote: I will always desire to play with Bruce Springsteen. He's the most inspirational, most dedicated, most committed and most focused artist I've ever seen. I like to be around people like that.
author: Max Weinberg

quote: The hymn 'Amazing Grace' is so inspirational - I wish I'd written it.
author: Neil Sedaka

quote: Since we launched the original 'Pop Idol' in England, I've remained close with Simon Fuller. Working as executive producer on 'American idol' for its first seven years not only was an inspirational journey into the heart of American pop culture, it opened my eyes to the untapped potential of the incredibly dynamic young people in this world.
author: Nigel Lythgoe

quote: President Obama called for a 'we' nation in his Inauguration Address. Art convenes. It is not just inspirational. It is aspirational. It pricks the walls of our compartmentalized minds, opens our hearts and makes us brave. And that's what we need most in our country today.
author: Anna Deavere Smith

quote: Never meet your heroes' is too much. Sometimes meeting your heroes can be inspirational. Sometimes.
author: Tim Key

quote: Almost every college playwright or sketch or improv comedian was sort of aware of Christopher Durang - even kids in high school. His short plays were so accessible to younger people and I think that was inspirational to me.
author: Mindy Kaling

quote: I love people who Instagram story themselves running and they'll tag me or they'll send me a message and they'll be like, 'Wow this is so motivational and so inspirational.'
author: Andi Dorfman

quote: I don't dislike rappers or hip-hop or people who like it. I went to the Def Jam tour in Manchester in the '80s when rap was inspirational. Public Enemy were awesome. But it's all about status and bling now, and it doesn't say anything to me.
author: Noel Gallagher

quote: 'All in With Laila Ali' is educational, inspirational, compelling programming profiling individuals that have reached for the sky, pushed themselves to the limit and did things that you would think were impossible.
author: Laila Ali

quote: I'm not an inspirational quote kind of person.
author: Chrissy Teigen

quote: Whenever I would go to Hrithik's vanity van to chat or rehearse lines, I'd see him working out or watching inspirational videos. One thing that I've learnt from him is that, as an actor, you have to worship your body.
author: Mrunal Thakur

quote: You can't go with the intention of writing something inspirational. You just have to go with the right heart.
author: Lights

quote: Jesu's walls of distortion are uplifting in comparison to those of its doom-driven contemporaries. The band's 2009 album 'Infinity' has its bleak moments, but that album's single 49-minute song resolves into something inspirational and grandiose by the time it's over.
author: Anthony Fantano

quote: 'Get along, go along' is not an inspirational philosophy, and only God knows how much moral cowardice it has covered up over the years. Serve your time, collect your chits, and cash 'em in for your home state? No, I'd say we could ask for more than that from our senators.
author: Molly Ivins

quote: The upper middle class here still has options for entertainment. We have Internet, Hollywood and books. But for the majority and the masses, there is only TV. A lot of them sit at home and watch TV as they can't afford other forms of entertainment. So, we try to do shows which have inspirational value.
author: Sanam Saeed

quote: We're in a situation where talented, motivated school leavers and graduates can send off a hundred CVs and not get a reply, and where a trip to the Job Centre is depressing rather than inspirational. And you know what, that just feels wrong.
author: Jameela Jamil

quote: The leaders who we admire who have been able to bring great change in the past - Gandhi, Martin Luther King, Nelson Mandela - they're all inspirational religious leaders and smart tacticians. It would be nice to find the Muslim Gandhi, wouldn't it?
author: Dennis C. Blair

quote: I worked at The Old Globe Theater under the great baton of Craig Noel. One of the great theater heroes that we have. He was so great and so inspirational. I think I did 'Antony and Cleopatra' and 'The Taming of the Shrew'. I lived in Ocean Beach, and my rent was $140 a month.
author: Jeffrey Tambor

quote: In Spain, they show many Premier League games on TV, and it is an inspirational league. Maybe I would like to play in the Premier League.
author: Juan Mata

quote: You always draw inspiration from your family or your parents if they've proven to be inspirational. My mother is someone who's always been inspirational to me.
author: Dustin Clare

quote: I think that the reason for my success is that I am really not aspirational. I am inspirational in that the people at home feel like they can really relate to me.
author: Rosie O'Donnell

quote: My tastes and inspirational artists were always rather eclectic and diverse.
author: Taylor Dayne

quote: Don't say I was an inspirational teacher - my former pupils would laugh their heads off. I was grossly incompetent, but I hope I didn't do the children a disservice.
author: Greg Davies

quote: Look at a football field. It looks like a big movie screen. This is theatre. Football combines the strategy of chess. It's part ballet. It's part battleground, part playground. We clarify, amplify and glorify the game with our footage, the narration and that music, and in the end create an inspirational piece of footage.
author: Steve Sabol

quote: Teachers need to be more inspirational. But it's also up to engineering to make itself more interesting.
author: Bruce Dickinson

quote: Reading was very important to me as a kid. It was very inspirational to me. I went to a school where that wasn't encouraged so much, but my parents encouraged that, and it has made me part of who I am.
author: Sasha Grey

quote: My allegiance to the GOP was cemented during the 1980s, when I was in high school and college and Ronald Reagan was in the White House. For me, Reagan was what John F. Kennedy had been to an earlier generation: an inspirational figure who shaped my worldview.
author: Max Boot

quote: There have been many different artists that have been inspirational. I suppose the question is directed to what was the reason why I went into fantasy illustration.
author: Boris Vallejo

quote: It's as if inside the White House the belief in Obama's inspirational charisma is still such that every time the ugliness of brute politics intrudes, it's a startling revelation.
author: Tina Brown

quote: I used to make up stuff in my bio all the time, that I used to be a professional ice-skater and stuff like that. I found it so inspirational. Why not make myself cooler than I am?
author: Stephen Colbert

quote: At the end of the day, the one commonality that both Hindi cinema and Hollywood share is that they are full of talented and inspirational people. Outside of this, there are many differences, from the scheduling and rehearsal to promotion and directing techniques.
author: Nargis Fakhri

quote: The core of what we do is the Gospel of Jesus Christ, and my music is a reflection of the Gospel of Jesus Christ. It's not as much inspirational as it is spreading the Gospel.
author: Kirk Franklin

quote: The government will see that human spaceflight is useful - for science and the economy - and inspirational.
author: Helen Sharman

quote: I've lost count of the number of times that I've been approached by strangers wanting to tell me that they think I'm brave or inspirational, and this was long before my work had any kind of public profile.
author: Stella Young

quote: PUMA has been an iconic name in the fashion world for decades, their ability to remain at the top of the game in not only sportswear, but in culture and fashion is inspirational.
author: Yo Gotti

quote: 'Do What You Gotta Do' is a positive, inspirational song that says no matter what it is; whether you're up against challenges or trying to get your dreams and aspirations met, you should do what whatever you have to do shy of killing yourself or someone else.
author: Angie Stone

quote: I think being directed and mentored by someone as inspirational as Paul Feig not only improves my performance but, as a whole, makes it what it is.
author: Nargis Fakhri

quote: It really is an honor if I can be inspirational to a younger singer or person. It means I've done my job.
author: Aretha Franklin

quote: I am shocked and deeply saddened by McQueen's death. He was a genius, and his talent was second to none. Like many others, I always cited him as a hugely inspirational leader of world fashion. He will be greatly missed.
author: Matthew Williamson

quote: Your personal life, your professional life, and your creative life are all intertwined. I went through a few very difficult years where I felt like a failure. But it was actually really important for me to go through that. Struggle, for me, is the most inspirational thing in the world at the end of the day - as long as you treat it that way.
author: Skylar Grey

quote: I'm not doing what I do to prove what a woman is capable of. I'm not doing what I do to make Formula E more diverse. I'm doing what I do to be successful. If that's inspirational, then great.
author: Susie Wolff

quote: I thought 'Moulin Rouge' was inspirational, and 'Jesus Christ Superstar' I loved.
author: Pierce Brosnan

quote: I think Spain will always remain inspirational, and I think French cuisine will continue to be very French and yet very relevant with its time and keep evolving. But the last thing you want for it is to become too trendy and confusing. It has too much history.
author: Daniel Boulud

quote: Thelonious Monk was one of the musicians I most connected with early on. I'm a huge Betty Carter fan, and the way that Abbey Lincoln and Shirley Horn grew immensely from the time they were young is so inspirational.
author: Cecile McLorin Salvant

quote: I really think that it's disgusting that Paris is the only place where it is illegal for paps to follow you around. It actually took someone losing their life - Diana, an inspirational woman - and then it changed, but they still won't change it in London! It's horrible!
author: Cara Delevingne

quote: I do a lot of inspirational talks for kids, to motivate them to change their lives and give them hope.
author: Adam Beach

quote: I wanted to write a book about what it's like to be 50 and trying to reinvent yourself - that struggle. There are all these books and inspirational speakers talking about being a lifelong learner, and it's so great to reinvent yourself, the brand of you. And I wanted to say, you know, it's not like that. It's actually really painful.
author: Daniel Lyons

quote: I think it's great that you have inspirational female roles, that it's not just the pretty girl on the arm of a man.
author: Hannah John-Kamen

quote: I'd like to one day be featured on a list of inspirational people who have made a difference in the world, whether it be helping underprivileged people or putting an end to the poaching of wildlife in Africa.
author: Candice Swanepoel

quote: Every song you're trying to find something that going to connect in different ways but for me the songs that I'm really drawn to are inspirational, songs that lift you and that everybody can relate to no matter where you're from.
author: Rodney Atkins

quote: I knew, regardless of anything else, singing in front of an orchestra was going to be inspirational. It would feed me.
author: George Michael

quote: If I feel a little lost or disgruntled or upset, I Google 'inspirational quotes' and I feel better. There is one for every eventuality and, although they're cheesy and I sometimes feel I'm turning into Oprah, they give me something I need in that moment.
author: Angela Scanlon

quote: The way my father worked altruistically and the manner in which he used to go behind bars and come back home smilingly was inspirational.
author: Asma Jahangir

quote: I believe in the city as a natural human environment, but we must humanize it. It's art that will re-define public space in the 21st Century. We can make our cities diverse, inspirational places by putting art, dance and performance in all its forms into the matrix of street life.
author: Antony Gormley

quote: If you're funny and working in education, I think the perception is that you're either inspirational or awful. So which was I? I suppose that depends on who you talk to.
author: Greg Davies

quote: Half a century ago, the amazing courage of Rosa Parks, the visionary leadership of Martin Luther King, and the inspirational actions of the civil rights movement led politicians to write equality into the law and make real the promise of America for all her citizens.
author: David Cameron

quote: Books are challenging and inspirational to me.
author: Amy Sedaris

quote: Just as you wouldn't leave the house without taking a shower, you shouldn't start the day without at least 10 minutes of sacred practice: prayer, meditation, inspirational reading.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: My initial goal for the 1984 opening ceremonies was a show that would be majestic, inspirational, and emotional - a 20 goosebump experience.
author: David L. Wolper

quote: My father, Oliver Hynes, was an educator. He was originally just a teacher, a very good one, but then he was promoted to be in charge of education for the entire area. He was always an inspirational teacher. He was my big personal supporter, always coming here for the Tony Awards. My mother, Carmel, was a homemaker.
author: Garry Hynes

quote: We have outstanding schools, world-class teaching and inspirational leadership across the country.
author: Nicky Morgan

quote: 'Can You See' is a beautiful song that follows a story of the star. It's a very inspirational song.
author: Ally Brooke

quote: Our country is one of the youngest in the world. Our youngsters need to be told inspirational stories.
author: Sudha Kongara

quote: I had an inspirational teacher at my junior school: Peter Nixon. He was enthusiastic, knowledgeable and slightly scary - a good combination for a teacher.
author: Stephen Mangan

quote: So I wanted to sing inspirational music, and that's exactly how I approached it - only the words have been changed to declare my relationship with God.
author: Smokey Robinson

quote: I think 'Heroes of Cosplay' will show a lot of the positive things, like how much effort it takes to make a costume. These people on the show aren't taking shortcuts. As long as that effort gets through to the viewers, we will be inspirational. Then there will be people who watch the show that want to get in and hands-on make outfits.
author: Yaya Han

quote: I think, aesthetically, car design is so interesting - the dashboards, the steering wheels, and the beauty of the mechanics. I don't know how any of it works, I don't want to know, but it's inspirational.
author: Paloma Picasso

quote: It was sad to leave 'Pippin' because it was a kind of inspirational turning point in my life. But it was time to move on.
author: Ann Reinking

quote: I feel like music itself is inspirational enough. Especially with the Internet. Not to sound like a shut-in.
author: Thundercat

quote: I do love to eavesdrop. It's inspirational, not only for subject matter but for actual dialogue, the way people talk.
author: Lynda Barry

quote: I often wonder if I should adopt a cause to call my own or start tweeting inspirational messages. And when tragedy strikes and the world takes to social media, is it now my responsibility to respond with #RIPs and #prayfors?
author: Max Joseph

quote: People like the feeling of access that is very raw, unedited, and inspirational.
author: Justin Kan

quote: Who would have thought that a tap-dancing penguin would outpoint James Bond at the box office? And deserve to? Not that there's anything wrong with 'Casino Royale.' But 'Happy Feet' - written and directed by George Miller - is a complete charmer, even if, in the way of most family fare, it can't resist straying into the Inspirational.
author: Robert Gottlieb

quote: When I started my career, I never looked at myself as one to be inspirational, but as I continued to grow, I've met so many different people who ask, 'How do you do it? You make it look easy.' But it's not easy. I have certain tricks and tips I use every day that have been working for me.
author: Karen Civil

quote: Seeing RuPaul go out there and not only create music, but TV and film roles, and continue to go down so many creative avenues - that is inspirational. For a person of color like myself, I see RuPaul and I say, 'Oh, honey, I can do it too.'
author: Shangela

quote: What's on my playlist when I'm fighting is not so much hip-hop. Sometimes, it's something more inspirational. I get a chance to think about what I'm fighting for, like, my family. It takes me to that state because a lot of times, it's a spiritual warfare for me.
author: Tyron Woodley

quote: Every video I've made has an inspirational message behind it. Since day one, I thought, 'Okay, I want my audience to be, like, Disney members.' So if that's the case, I have to keep everything rated G.
author: Michelle Phan

quote: Before the music and before the fame, I loved Apl for Allan Pineda, for being a brother that he is and for the inspiration - for him to actually come to the States from the Philippines and make something of his life. That's inspirational.
author: Taboo

quote: I feel like when you call me inspirational, it takes away from the success that I've actually had. Would you say that to any other comic that just ripped the mic for an hour?
author: Josh Blue

quote: We work very closely with HSN's buying team, to ensure that our products and demonstrations are as exciting, educational and as inspirational as possible.
author: Sara Davies

quote: The only thing that stops me doing the teaching is that there's so much stress involved. And there shouldn't be. It's the most wonderful, inspirational job on the planet from what I saw. I loved it. Teachers, we should be molly-coddling them. Looking after them. Nurturing them.
author: Rhod Gilbert

quote: When Maurice touched a keyboard, it was like something from a movie, magical. He would always give you something from a movie, and you'd go, what did you just play... immediately inspirational writings, amazing. That's what we're going to miss.
author: Robin Gibb

quote: I grew up in a very spiritual home in a Liberty City neighborhood of Miami, FL. I was raised in the church, and my mother was a very inspirational person in my life.
author: Robert Battle

quote: Personally, I can't see the appeal in trekking down to D.C. for a networking extravaganza, even if it is built around a special moment in American history. While I find the election of Barack Obama inspirational, I don't have a desire to memorialize it with overly effusive celebration.
author: Jamie Johnson

quote: Deacon Jones has been the most inspirational person in my football career.
author: Jack Youngblood

quote: Being appointed as the next Gewandhauskapellmeister of the Gewandhausorchester is a completely overwhelming honour. This extraordinary orchestra and its wonderful musicians are unique in so many respects, and particularly in their creation of an exceptional sound world based on outstanding tradition that is, at its heart, inspirational.
author: Andris Nelsons

quote: Craig Sager's amazing attitude was truly inspirational. He was a champion during his battle, fighting every day with grace and humor.
author: Monty Williams

quote: The MTC is known for singing music by great master composers, hymns, American music, Broadway numbers, popular songs, and inspirational music. If the audience doesn't like one genre, they need only wait for the next number.
author: Mack Wilberg

quote: I'm very fond of the British cinema. I'm a big fan of Martin Campbell and Daniel Craig. I actually find Daniel very inspirational, especially on the physical side of things. He really inspired me to get back into shape when I started to add on a few pounds. I think he's a great role model.
author: Steven Bauer

quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: In the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter, and sharing of pleasures. For in the dew of little things the heart finds its morning and is refreshed.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Yesterday is but today's memory, and tomorrow is today's dream.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. And if they don't, they never were.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: I have learned silence from the talkative, toleration from the intolerant, and kindness from the unkind; yet, strange, I am ungrateful to those teachers.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Your living is determined not so much by what life brings to you as by the attitude you bring to life; not so much by what happens to you as by the way your mind looks at what happens.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Trust in dreams, for in them is hidden the gate to eternity.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Your pain is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: We choose our joys and sorrows long before we experience them.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Beauty is eternity gazing at itself in a mirror.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: And ever has it been known that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Forget not that the earth delights to feel your bare feet and the winds long to play with your hair.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: March on. Do not tarry. To go forward is to move toward perfection. March on, and fear not the thorns, or the sharp stones on life's path.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: But let there be spaces in your togetherness and let the winds of the heavens dance between you. Love one another but make not a bond of love: let it rather be a moving sea between the shores of your souls.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Progress lies not in enhancing what is, but in advancing toward what will be.
