quote: We have to trust the voices of the community to be in leadership and know what we need for our communities.
author: Tarana Burke

quote: We have to go to war against the people who enable the gun violence, the people who stop us from keeping guns out of the hands of mentally unstable people, of felons, and that means the NRA leadership.
author: Jerrold Nadler

quote: There are very few good examples of effective, nurturing leadership that unlocks people's potential or even enthusiasm.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Leadership has become a heavy industry. Concern and interest about leadership development is no longer an American phenomenon. It is truly global. Though I will probably be in less demand, I wanted to move on.
author: Warren Bennis

quote: Clearly no one knows what leadership has gone undiscovered in women of all races, and in black and other minority men.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Democrats are going to proudly run on the fact that we turned the economy around. It was our policies under President Obama's leadership through the Recovery Act, through investing in the automobile industry.
author: Debbie Wasserman Schultz

quote: World War II had been such a tremendous success story for this country that the political and military leadership began to assume that they would prevail simply because of who they were. We were like the British at the turn of the 19th century.
author: Neil Sheehan

quote: I think there's a real calling out there for leadership and maybe the Bush family could fill the void. All of us have been bitten by the bug to do something some day in our lives to help others.
author: Neil Bush

quote: I can say with absolute certainty that I will run for one of two offices: my state Senate seat or for the governor. I'm still trying to decide, but I do think people are ready for a change from the partisan, very fractured leadership we have in Texas.
author: Wendy Davis

quote: Leadership desperately needs women.
author: Marilyn Ferguson

quote: The reality is that the leader of a country cannot choose the era in which the person takes that leadership position.
author: Fumio Kishida

quote: I got put into leadership roles very early in life from fifth grade, sixth grade. I always ended up being the quarterback or the leader of the sports teams, and it's kind of benefiting me now.
author: Tony Dungy

quote: You're born with some things inside you that will allow you to lead, but I think you have to take the bull by the horns. You have to want that leadership position, and then there are things you can do to develop that.
author: Tony Dungy

quote: The important thing is that we recognize our President's leadership, that he is not saying: I am going to walk away from this. He is saying: I am going to do the right thing.
author: Kay Bailey Hutchison

quote: Priesthood lessons are regularly devoted to topics of family leadership, and quorum leaders everywhere are feeling more and more their responsibility to teach and train their quorum members to be better husbands and fathers.
author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: The Republican Party is the Grand Old Party. It's made enormous contributions to the success of our country. And it is a party that has embraced its leadership role when it has had the majority or the White House.
author: Nancy Pelosi

quote: In Britain, you do your job. When you do an American TV show, there is a sense of being one with the crew, and there is a leadership element, which was a learning curve for me because it is very different culturally. In Britain, you just do it, leave and say, 'Thanks.'
author: Theo James

quote: I urge the Iraqi leadership for sake of its own people... to seize this opportunity and thereby begin to end the isolation and suffering of the Iraqi people.
author: Kofi Annan

quote: Real leadership means tackling tough problems ourselves and not leaving them to our children.
author: Jon Kyl

quote: Our country also hungers for leadership to ensure the long-term survival of our Social Security system. With 70 million baby boomers in this country on the verge of retirement, we need to take action to shore up the system.
author: Kay Bailey Hutchison

quote: Instead of starting a new nuclear arms race, now is the time to reclaim our Nation's position of leadership on nuclear nonproliferation efforts.
author: Dianne Feinstein

quote: IBM has taken a leadership role in this area and is prepared to be a technology partner with companies around the world to take advantage of these new developments.
author: John Patrick

quote: As far as Iraq, the important thing is that the Taliban is gone in Afghanistan, three-quarters of the al-Qaida leadership is either dead or in jail, and we now have Saudi Arabia working with us, Pakistan working with us.
author: Peter T. King

quote: Shouldn't Democrats insist that Sen. Durbin step down as their whip, the number two man in their leadership?
author: Bill Kristol

quote: As for leadership, I am the kind who leads reluctantly and more by example than anything else. Someone had to be on the incorporation papers as president.
author: Keith Henson

quote: We had a military and political leadership at that period which was genuinely deluded.
author: Neil Sheehan

quote: This is easy to say with the benefit of hindsight, but I think it once again points out how very important style of leadership, that is the way he does what he does, is to his perception.
author: Robert Teeter

quote: Research has shown that the perceived style of leadership is by far the most important thing to most voters in evaluating officeholders and candidates.
author: Robert Teeter

quote: The intelligence investigation under the leadership of Senator Church, which I know has helped cause this investigation by you, points out that the agencies did not disclose certain facts to us and that certain plots were going on.
author: John Sherman Cooper

quote: We should see the leadership from the White House setting dates certain for certain goals of achieving greater alliance on alternative and renewable energy sources, but we are not.
author: Ron Kind

quote: Preparing our city to achieve its destiny will require strong leadership.
author: Thomas Menino

quote: I'm not up on the Internet, but I hear that is a democratic possibility. People can connect with each other. I think people are ready for something, but there is no leadership to offer it to them. People are ready to say, 'Yes, we are part of a world.'
author: Studs Terkel

quote: President Reagan was a leader at a time when the American people most needed leadership. He outlined a vision that captured the imagination of the free world, a vision that toppled the Communist empire and freed countless millions.
author: Dennis Hastert

quote: Moreover, as the leadership of the House confirmed last year, the Administration remains opposed to a congressional resolution on the Armenian Genocide due to Turkish objections. This approach sends absolutely the wrong signal to Turkey and to the rest of the world.
author: Patrick J. Kennedy

quote: The things journalists should pay attention to are the issues the political leadership agrees on, rather than to their supposed antagonisms.
author: Michael Pollan

quote: At that time, the army leadership said the implementation of this agreement would allow everyone, including the IRA, to take its political objectives forward by peaceful and democratic means.
author: Gerry Adams

quote: Year after year, President Bush has broken his campaign promises on college aid. And year after year, the Republican leadership in Congress has let him do it.
author: Sherrod Brown

quote: In the area we're discussing, leadership begins on Madison Avenue, on the desks and in the offices of people who spend hundreds of millions of dollars buying what will get them ratings.
author: Norman Lear

quote: It is with obedience to your call that I take up the burden of government leadership for the final time.
author: Kamisese Mara

quote: An old African leader says about leadership, he says that leadership should never be shared; it should always remain in the hands of the dispossessed people. We will lead the revolution.
author: H. Rap Brown

quote: We should be therefore supporting a larger Europe, and in so doing we should strive to expand the zone of peace and prosperity in the world which is the necessary foundation for a stable international system in which our leadership could be fruitfully exercised.
author: Zbigniew Brzezinski

quote: And I'd say one of the great lessons I've learned over the past couple of decades, from a management perspective, is that really when you come down to it, it really is all about people and all about leadership.
author: Steve Case

quote: The truth is the Republican leadership has created a credit card Congress that is recklessly selling out the future of America, our children and our grandchildren, and President Bush is the most fiscally irresponsible President in the history of America.
author: Dennis Cardoza

quote: Hamas, also elected to governmental leadership in Palestine, includes the jihadists, people who have declared war on the United States of America and its ally, Israel.
author: Zach Wamp

quote: This - the leadership of the mayor is crucial, because it is to the mayor that people will look to provide the vision, the energy, and the sense of confidence in the rebuilding and the recovery.
author: Marc Morial

quote: Bipartisanship isn't an option anymore; it is a requirement. The American people have divided responsibility for leadership right down the middle.
author: Tom Daschle

quote: There has not yet been a major ground offensive battle... There are, we know, negotiations going on between the opposition forces and the Taliban leadership for surrender.
author: Peter Pace

quote: And this administration and this House leadership have said, quote-unquote, they will stop at nothing to pass this health care bill. And now they've gotten rid of me and it will pass. You connect the dots.
author: Eric Massa

quote: But 85 percent of the mosques have extremist leadership in this country. Most Muslims, the overwhelming majority of Muslims, are loyal Americans.
author: Peter T. King

quote: What we heard today was not fiscal leadership from our Commander-in-Chief, what we heard today was a political broadside from our Campaigner-in-Chief.
author: Paul Ryan

quote: Unfortunately, the Republican leadership in the House right now seems to have been strangled by the tea party.
author: Debbie Wasserman Schultz

quote: Actually, I don't ever think there will be a men-only team of leadership in the Labour party again. People would look at it and say, 'What? Are there no women in the party to be part of the leadership? Do men want to do it all themselves?' It just won't happen again.
author: Harriet Harman

quote: We've been sitting at the compromise table for a long time. We're just waiting for that cold chair to be warmed up by the Republican leadership. They still have time to do the right thing and be responsible. They just seem to be moving further and further away from it.
author: Debbie Wasserman Schultz

quote: Now, do I think there has to be shared sacrifice among other nations in the world who want a stable and secure world? Absolutely, there has to be. But I don't think that America can ever abdicate its leadership role in the world because of who we are and where we've come from. We are the symbol for the world for freedom and liberty.
author: Chris Christie

quote: My leadership will end the Obama era and begin a new era of American prosperity.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: Central to America's rise to global leadership is our Judeo-Christian tradition with the vision of the goodness and possibilities of every human life.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: We shouldn't be debating whether to deal with the current code by allowing it to be extended or not. We should have a president who shows leadership and comes to Congress and says: 'You know what? We need to reform this whole tax code.'
author: Rob Portman

quote: The secret to understanding me is, I'm not trying to be anybody other than who I actually am. People want candid, refreshing leadership. And I've always tried to go with solutions. You know, I've always tried to say, here's how we get our economy growing, here's why we get our debt under control. That's what Mitt Romney is offering.
author: Paul Ryan

quote: Millions of young Americans have graduated from college during the Obama presidency, ready to use their gifts and get moving in life. Half of them can't find the work they studied for, or any work at all. So here's the question: Without a change in leadership, why would the next four years be any different from the last four years?
author: Paul Ryan

quote: If anybody ran a business like that they would be out of business quickly, and Barack Obama's leadership is driving this business, the United States of America, toward a fiscal cliff.
author: Chris Christie

quote: So here's the question: Without a change in leadership, why would the next four years be any different from the last four years?
author: Paul Ryan

quote: I think most Americans understand that we went through a period in which American leadership was judged quite critically internationally.
author: Susan Rice

quote: Well football teams are perhaps easier to control than political parties, I'm sure the Prime Minister would agree with me, but yeah I think every team needs discipline and a sense of self-belief and that's important, that's what leadership's all about.
author: Iain Duncan Smith

quote: Let us build a 21st-century rural economy of cutting-edge companies and technologies that lead us to energy and food security. Such an investment will revitalize rural America, re-establish our moral leadership on climate security and eliminate our addiction to foreign oil.
author: Tom Vilsack

quote: I had the closest thing I have ever had to an out-of-body experience lying in bed one morning. I turned on the 'Today' programme and item four on the news was: 'The shadow chancellor has ruled himself out of the leadership.' I lay there thinking that's interesting, then I realised it was me.
author: George Osborne

quote: So I think democracy, in the long-term, in our countries will survive if it comes to be associated with leadership, will not survive if democracy plus media brings to us more and more followship rather than leadership.
author: Mario Monti

quote: If America wants to retain its position as a global power, its president must listen to the people and show strong leadership at this turning point in human history.
author: David Suzuki

quote: The biggest novelty of 2013 will be new leadership in China. Very little is known about the views of the new leaders - who will rule the country for ten years. But we do know they're the first generation of Chinese leaders who have spent the majority of their lives in a China 'opening up' to the rest of the world.
author: David Miliband

quote: With gridlock the norm, Congress's approval rating is below 10 percent and the public has lost faith in its national leadership.
author: Ron Fournier

quote: Washington's answer to a self-inflicted financial crisis reminded Americans why they so deeply distrust the political class. The 'fiscal cliff' process was secretive and sloppy, and the nation's so-called leadership lacked the political courage to address our root problems: joblessness and debt.
author: Ron Fournier

quote: Boone Pickens should be commended for his leadership on American energy security, and for bringing Ted Turner along on some sensible approaches to enhancing it.
author: Frank Gaffney

quote: The current leadership of the Labor party react to the idea that working-class students might study the subjects they studied with the same horror that the Earl of Grantham showed when a chauffeur wanted to marry his daughter.
author: Michael Gove

quote: In the military, I learned that 'leadership' means raising your hand and volunteering for the tough, important assignments.
author: Tulsi Gabbard

quote: I think national issues play into gubernatorial races less than, obviously, in Senate and Congressional races. Much less. They tend to be more decided by personality, leadership qualities and by state or local issues. They still have some effect, no question about it, but not as much as Senate and Congressional races.
author: Ed Rendell

quote: I definitely wasn't cool in high school. I really wasn't. I did belong to many of the clubs and was in leadership on yearbook and did the musical theater route, so I had friends in all areas. But I certainly did not know what to wear, did not know how to do my hair, all those things.
author: Dianna Agron

quote: People more than ever since I can remember are concerned about being out of step and out of line with their political party and won't cross over. There is nobody, man or woman, who wants to be left out, and people are fearful of that. People are fearful of their leadership as well.
author: Gary Ackerman

quote: Well, I've ruffled a few feathers at all the institutions I've led. But I think that's part of leadership.
author: Robert M. Gates

quote: In terms of the principles of politics, I think I understand well. Thailand needs someone who has leadership, who has the management skills to help the country.
author: Yingluck Shinawatra

quote: What nourishes us at home and in school is what inspires us. When we get awareness and learn about the great potential that we all human beings have, we are able to discover our leadership.
author: Vicente Fox

quote: President Clinton not only benefits by gay and lesbian votes, but he benefits by showing the nation that he is a strong leader who implements his beliefs, who stands firm by those who he believes are being treated unfairly, and I think people respect that kind of leadership in the country.
author: David Mixner

quote: There is something discordant about a team of speechwriters and political operatives hammering away to create an image of the 'real, inner' candidate. And, to be blunt, there is no necessary connection between a moving life experience and the skills necessary for leadership.
author: Jeff Greenfield

quote: The conductor is the artistic leader and sometimes cultural arbiter of his or her community. It is their leadership that is looked to and should anything go wrong, they are the persons taking most of the heat.
author: Leonard Slatkin

quote: Individual and corporate support is vital to building on London's leadership in the arts, and I hope others will join me in wanting to build on the National's role at the heart of modern theatre and sustaining it long into the future.
author: Lloyd Dorfman

quote: At IBM, if we kept our same leadership for 36 years, we'd be bankrupt.
author: Scott Howell

quote: This obsession with leadership... It's not neutral; it's American, this idea of the heroic leader who comes in on a white horse to save the day. I think it's killing American companies.
author: Henry Mintzberg

quote: We expect our leaders to be godlike. But I feel that when people try to sanctify leadership, it puts it out of the realm of regular people. And that's where the greatest leaders come from - from the people.
author: Katori Hall

quote: It's not easy for an entrepreneur to find the time to blog. But for those who do it, it is a great tool to communicate with the various stakeholders in their business and build a reputation for thought leadership.
author: Fred Wilson

quote: Republicans working in leadership and the trenches are largely old, white, male, out-of-touch, out of ideas, technology averse, and living in the past.
author: Mark McKinnon

quote: There are no more excuses for leaving women out of the inner circles of power. Qualified women are everywhere. Women are ready for leadership; they just need to be identified and asked.
author: Madeleine M. Kunin

quote: In the past, the U.S. has shown its capacity to reinvent its gifts for leadership. During the 1970s, in the aftermath of the Nixon abdication and the Ford and Carter presidencies, the whole nation peered into the abyss, was horrified by what it saw and elected Ronald Reagan as president, which began a national resurgence.
author: Paul Johnson

quote: Leadership does take work. And it should. If you aspire to be a leader, you ought to treat leadership as a craft, you ought to become a student of it, and you ought to work at it. And if you're not willing to work at it, well, you get what you give.
author: Douglas Conant

quote: When the world is in the midst of change, when adversity and opportunity are almost indistinguishable, this is the time for visionary leadership and when leaders need to look beyond the survival needs of those they're serving.
author: Chip Conley

quote: I'm a pragmatist. I think, as a woman, you have to be more careful. You have to be more communal, you have to say yes to more things than men, you have to worry about things that men don't have to worry about. But once we get enough women into leadership, we can break stereotypes down. If you lead, you get to decide.
author: Sheryl Sandberg

quote: One of the sad truths about leadership is that, the higher up the ladder you travel, the less you know.
author: Margaret Heffernan

quote: There is a science to managing high tech businesses, and it needs to be respected. One of them is that in technology businesses, leadership is temporary. It's constantly recycling. So the asset has limited lifetime.
author: Eric Schmidt

quote: In 2006 it was a horrible election year, and, you know, I lost. But I lost because I continued to be a constant conservative, and the last six years I was someone who was a national figure in the sense that I was the third ranking Republican in leadership and I had just run President Bush's campaign in Pennsylvania.
author: Rick Santorum

quote: Ben Roethlisberger is a proven winner in athletic competition. But the measure of a true leader is how they conduct themselves 24/7, not just during a winning touchdown drive or a goal-line stance. Leadership isn't something that gets switched off because the game clock expires.
author: Jackson Katz

quote: I don't run a non-profit. There are lots of non-profits in America - in Detroit, parts of Wall Street, etc. I run a not for profit. We're a business. The only difference is that instead of selling soap or sneakers, we sell hope and leadership.
author: Nancy Lublin

quote: America is a great power possessed of tremendous military might and a wide-ranging economy, but all this is built on an unstable foundation which can be targeted, with special attention to its obvious weak spots. If America is hit in one hundredth of these weak spots, God willing, it will stumble, wither away and relinquish world leadership.
author: Osama bin Laden

quote: Governments follow their people. A great deal has to do with the vision of the leadership of governments. They have a vision, and they translate that to their people and to their counterparts in other countries. You can fulfill and achieve a great deal if you get along well as individuals, as people, as persons.
author: Salman Khurshid

quote: I think there is probably no better person to aspire to emulate than Steve Jobs and what he has done at Apple in terms of his leadership, his innovation, not settling for mediocrity.
author: Howard Schultz

quote: I am the wealthiest man, not just in Europe, but in the whole world. I collect emotions. I am wealthy in that the people of Russia have twice entrusted me with the leadership of a great nation such as Russia - I believe that is my greatest wealth.
author: Vladimir Putin

quote: I think America has a responsibility to maintain its leadership in technology and its moral leadership in the world, to explore, to seek knowledge.
author: Gene Cernan

quote: We were hoping Obama would reclaim moral leadership for America. That failed.
author: Lech Walesa

quote: Basketball Without Borders is a leadership camp that takes basketball to different places around the world, to Africa, Europe, America and Asia. It's a camp that brings players from different parts of the continent to one city that's been assigned as the host city. We've been going to a different city every year.
author: Dikembe Mutombo

quote: If you have small-government, traditional values, you may be considered by your own leadership to be an enemy of the state.
author: Monica Crowley

quote: I've always believed that government tends to screw up whatever it touches, but Obama in particular seemed different. He understood tech issues that left the other candidates bewildered. Part of it may be his age. But whatever the reason, I had real hope that he could help lead us into a new century of technology leadership and growth.
author: Michael Arrington

quote: Too often, advances in civil rights or women's rights are undermined by wrong-headed legislation or weak-kneed political leadership.
author: Mike Quigley

quote: In politics, Joseph Smith was something of a radical. He preached, instead of democracy, a version of theocratic rule within a framework given by his own prophetic leadership. At Nauvoo, Smith affected a Napoleonic uniform and made himself into a general and quasi king of the polity he had constituted.
author: Noah Feldman

quote: I hope telling the story of how I went from being a single mom to serving in the Texas State Senate to running for governor will remind others that with the right leadership in government, where you start has nothing to do with how far you go.
author: Wendy Davis

quote: I've never worried about payback. People are hungry for leadership that's not afraid of political consequence.
author: Wendy Davis

quote: What happens with a lot of leaders is that their leadership style is like ADD; they are all over the place with different ideas. They could be driving one idea forward but then move on to something else too soon.
author: Henry Cloud

quote: One of the lessons of leadership worth emphasizing is that you want to get to know other great leaders and take their advice. At some point in your development, it's only people who've been in the seat of having to be leaders who can help you in a deep way.
author: Jim Yong Kim

quote: I think the most important leadership lessons I've learned have to do with understanding the context in which you are leading. Universities are places with enormously distributed authority and many different sorts of constituencies, all of whom have a stake in that institution.
author: Drew Gilpin Faust

quote: In politics, as in business, leadership is crucial.
author: Edgar Bronfman, Sr.

quote: Having served in the Nixon Administration, I am well aware of how the political leadership of an administration can try to politicize the civil service, including law enforcement.
author: Frank Wolf

quote: Once the public loses confidence in a president's leadership at a time of war, once they don't trust him anymore, once his credibility is sharply diminished, how does he get it back?
author: Robert Dallek

quote: I fully support U.N. Secretary General Ban Ki-moon in his Global Education First Initiative and the work of U.N. Special Envoy for Global Education Gordon Brown and the respectful president of the U.N. General Assembly Vuk Jeremic. I thank them for the leadership they continue to give.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: When you look at a Congress that has an 84 percent disapproval rating, that means that for the most part, the people of this country, and certainly California, are looking for new leadership.
author: Elizabeth Emken

quote: We know that al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula has some very dangerous, very important leaders who are tied directly to the top leadership of al Qaeda central, including a man who was formerly Osama bin Laden's secretary.
author: Richard Engel

quote: In my view, it is important that our national government exercise leadership to improve the resiliency of the entire nation in the face of continuing extreme weather.
author: Matt Cartwright

quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

quote: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

quote: We do not remember days, we remember moments.
author: Cesare Pavese

quote: I slept and dreamt that life was joy. I awoke and saw that life was service. I acted and behold, service was joy.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy - it's all that matters.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Life is a long lesson in humility.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives.
author: Jackie Robinson

quote: The true secret of happiness lies in taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life.
author: William Morris

quote: Life isn't a matter of milestones, but of moments.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: Life is too short for long-term grudges.
author: Elon Musk

quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: If you live long enough, you'll make mistakes. But if you learn from them, you'll be a better person. It's how you handle adversity, not how it affects you. The main thing is never quit, never quit, never quit.
author: William J. Clinton

quote: Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.
author: Will Smith

quote: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: There is more to life than increasing its speed.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: To live is to change, and to be perfect is to have changed often.
author: John Henry Newman

quote: The art of life is to know how to enjoy a little and to endure very much.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: We must be willing to let go of the life we have planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: Life is ten percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: To me, if life boils down to one thing, it's movement. To live is to keep moving.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: What a wonderful life I've had! I only wish I'd realized it sooner.
author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quote: Life is a moderately good play with a badly written third act.
author: Truman Capote

quote: Life is painting a picture, not doing a sum.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: Mindfulness is about love and loving life. When you cultivate this love, it gives you clarity and compassion for life, and your actions happen in accordance with that.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: The difficulty in life is the choice.
author: George A. Moore

quote: Life is the art of drawing sufficient conclusions from insufficient premises.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: I want to live my life, not record it.
author: Jackie Kennedy

quote: Life is a work in progress.
author: Jeff Rich

quote: Life is growth. If we stop growing, technically and spiritually, we are as good as dead.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: When I hear somebody sigh, 'Life is hard,' I am always tempted to ask, 'Compared to what?'
author: Sydney J. Harris

quote: Maybe all one can do is hope to end up with the right regrets.
author: Arthur Miller

quote: Life is a zoo in a jungle.
author: Peter De Vries

quote: The hardest years in life are those between ten and seventy.
author: Helen Hayes

quote: He not busy being born is busy dying.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: Life is a tide; float on it. Go down with it and go up with it, but be detached. Then it is not difficult.
author: Prem Rawat

quote: Make space in your life for the things that matter, for family and friends, love and generosity, fun and joy. Without this, you will burn out in mid-career and wonder where your life went.
author: Jonathan Sacks

quote: What we play is life.
author: Louis Armstrong

quote: I still find each day too short for all the thoughts I want to think, all the walks I want to take, all the books I want to read, and all the friends I want to see.
author: John Burroughs

quote: Life is a great sunrise. I do not see why death should not be an even greater one.
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: Don't let life discourage you; everyone who got where he is had to begin where he was.
author: Richard L. Evans

quote: The true object of all human life is play. Earth is a task garden; heaven is a playground.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The basic fact about human existence is not that it is a tragedy, but that it is a bore. It is not so much a war as an endless standing in line.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: There may be aliens in our Milky Way galaxy, and there are billions of other galaxies. The probability is almost certain that there is life somewhere in space.
author: Buzz Aldrin

quote: Wrong life cannot be lived rightly.
author: Theodor W. Adorno

quote: Life is a lively process of becoming.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: To know nothing is the happiest life.
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: Nobody got where they are today by living for tomorrow.
author: Tom Wilson

quote: Maybe that's what life is... a wink of the eye and winking stars.
author: Jack Kerouac

quote: Life is a horizontal fall.
author: Jean Cocteau

quote: Life itself still remains a very effective therapist.
author: Karen Horney

quote: A healthful hunger for a great idea is the beauty and blessedness of life.
author: Jean Ingelow

quote: Life is very short and what we have to do must be done in the now.
author: Audre Lorde

quote: If life had a second edition, how I would correct the proofs.
author: John Clare

quote: Unrest of spirit is a mark of life.
author: Karl A. Menninger

quote: All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Life itself is the proper binge.
author: Julia Child

quote: The indispensable first step to getting the things you want out of life is this: decide what you want.
author: Ben Stein

quote: Our entire life - consists ultimately in accepting ourselves as we are.
author: Jean Anouilh

quote: The most exhausting thing in life is being insincere.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: I am simply trying to struggle through life; trying to do God's bidding.
author: George Lucas

quote: I have inspiration and feelings of being alive most every day I live.
author: Judy Collins

quote: The Wine of Life keeps oozing drop by drop, The Leaves of Life keep falling one by one.
author: Edward Fitzgerald

quote: How sweet it is!
author: Jackie Gleason

quote: Unbeing dead isn't being alive.
author: e. e. cummings

quote: I think I've discovered the secret of life - you just hang around until you get used to it.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: If we live good lives, the times are also good. As we are, such are the times.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Life is anything that dies when you stomp on it.
author: Dave Barry

quote: Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The dearest days in one's life are those that seem very far and very near at once.
author: Abraham Cahan

quote: The price of anything is the amount of life you exchange for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Life is a DNA software system.
author: Craig Venter

quote: I do not regret one moment of my life.
author: Lillie Langtry

quote: That it will never come again is what makes life sweet.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Life is wasted on the living.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Conduct is three-fourths of our life and its largest concern.
author: Matthew Arnold

quote: A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable, but more useful than a life spent doing nothing.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: We cannot put off living until we are ready.
author: Jose Ortega y Gasset

quote: Open your eyes, look within. Are you satisfied with the life you're living?
author: Bob Marley

quote: Life has meaning only if one barters it day by day for something other than itself.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: A person will sometimes devote all his life to the development of one part of his body - the wishbone.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Life is something to do when you can't get to sleep.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: What is important in life is life, and not the result of life.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Just as courage imperils life, fear protects it.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: To live is like to love - all reason is against it, and all healthy instinct for it.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Life's more amusing than we thought.
author: Andrew Lang

quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: The story of life is quicker than the blink of an eye, the story of love is hello, goodbye.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: The shoe that fits one person pinches another; there is no recipe for living that suits all cases.
author: Carl Jung

quote: It is often said that before you die your life passes before your eyes. It is in fact true. It's called living.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Here is the test to find whether your mission on Earth is finished: if you're alive, it isn't.
author: Richard Bach

quote: The greatest trap in our life is not success, popularity or power, but self-rejection.
author: Henri Nouwen

quote: Growth is the only evidence of life.
author: John Henry Newman

quote: We are all here for a spell, get all the good laughs you can.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Once you say you're going to settle for second, that's what happens to you in life.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Kindness, I've discovered, is everything in life.
author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: I argue thee that love is life. And life hath immortality.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Life will always be to a large extent what we ourselves make it.
author: Samuel Smiles

quote: It is not length of life, but depth of life.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Who will tell whether one happy moment of love or the joy of breathing or walking on a bright morning and smelling the fresh air, is not worth all the suffering and effort which life implies.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: Life is largely a matter of expectation.
author: Horace

quote: I don't believe people are looking for the meaning of life as much as they are looking for the experience of being alive.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Sometimes life hits you in the head with a brick. Don't lose faith.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Once you bring life into the world, you must protect it. We must protect it by changing the world.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Life would be infinitely happier if we could only be born at the age of eighty and gradually approach eighteen.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I am an artist... I am here to live out loud.
author: Emile Zola

quote: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: An aim in life is the only fortune worth finding.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Our life always expresses the result of our dominant thoughts.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: My life is my message.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: True life is lived when tiny changes occur.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Life does not cease to be funny when people die any more than it ceases to be serious when people laugh.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: What if you gave someone a gift, and they neglected to thank you for it - would you be likely to give them another? Life is the same way. In order to attract more of the blessings that life has to offer, you must truly appreciate what you already have.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: The quality, not the longevity, of one's life is what is important.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: A chain is no stronger than its weakest link, and life is after all a chain.
author: William James

quote: What we think determines what happens to us, so if we want to change our lives, we need to stretch our minds.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: My trade and art is to live.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Character develops itself in the stream of life.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: To live is so startling it leaves little time for anything else.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Life becomes harder for us when we live for others, but it also becomes richer and happier.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Art is the proper task of life.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I decided, very early on, just to accept life unconditionally; I never expected it to do anything special for me, yet I seemed to accomplish far more than I had ever hoped. Most of the time it just happened to me without my ever seeking it.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: The courage of life is often a less dramatic spectacle than the courage of a final moment; but it is no less a magnificent mixture of triumph and tragedy.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: The art of living is more like wrestling than dancing.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: We are to seek wisdom and understanding only in the length of days.
author: Robert Hall

quote: Life would be tragic if it weren't funny.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: There is only one difference between a long life and a good dinner: that, in the dinner, the sweets come last.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: A little credulity helps one on through life very smoothly.
author: Elizabeth Gaskell

quote: Each one of us decides to incarnate upon this planet at a particular point in time and space. We have chosen to come here to learn a particular lesson that will advance us upon our spiritual, evolutionary pathway.
author: Louise L. Hay

quote: Life is far too important a thing ever to talk seriously about.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The person lives twice who lives the first life well.
author: Robert Herrick

quote: Life consists in what a man is thinking of all day.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Execute every act of thy life as though it were thy last.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: When I was a little kid, we only knew about our nine planets. Since then, we've downgraded Pluto but have discovered that other solar systems and stars are common. So life is probably quite prevalent.
author: Buzz Aldrin

quote: Life's a fight. It's a good fight of faith.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: I am all for the short and merry life.
author: Edward Fitzgerald

quote: Life is much shorter than I imagined it to be.
author: Abraham Cahan

quote: I look back on my life like a good day's work, it was done and I am satisfied with it.
author: Grandma Moses

quote: I had no blood relatives till I made some.
author: Andy Dick

quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
author: Robert Frost

quote: You can have everything in life you want, if you will just help other people get what they want.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.'
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: There is only one thing in life worse than being talked about, and that is not being talked about.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive.
author: Matt Cameron

quote: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
author: Omar Khayyam

quote: Life is like a roller coaster, live it, be happy, enjoy life.
author: Avril Lavigne

quote: If the only prayer you ever say in your entire life is thank you, it will be enough.
author: Meister Eckhart

quote: Life is full of beauty. Notice it. Notice the bumble bee, the small child, and the smiling faces. Smell the rain, and feel the wind. Live your life to the fullest potential, and fight for your dreams.
author: Ashley Smith

quote: Life is one big road with lots of signs. So when you riding through the ruts, don't complicate your mind. Flee from hate, mischief and jealousy. Don't bury your thoughts, put your vision to reality. Wake Up and Live!
author: Bob Marley

quote: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The greatest day in your life and mine is when we take total responsibility for our attitudes. That's the day we truly grow up.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Some people think football is a matter of life and death. I assure you, it's much more serious than that.
author: Bill Shankly

quote: Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: If you have the opportunity to play this game of life you need to appreciate every moment. A lot of people don't appreciate the moment until it's passed.
author: Kanye West

quote: I've been absolutely terrified every moment of my life - and I've never let it keep me from doing a single thing I wanted to do.
author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quote: Failure at some point in your life is inevitable, but giving up is unforgivable.
author: Joe Biden

quote: Transformation is a process, and as life happens there are tons of ups and downs. It's a journey of discovery - there are moments on mountaintops and moments in deep valleys of despair.
author: Rick Warren

quote: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Music washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.
author: Berthold Auerbach

quote: Life's tragedy is that we get old too soon and wise too late.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Be regular and orderly in your life, so that you may be violent and original in your work.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Enjoy life... that's what we're here for.
author: David Faustino

quote: Trust is the glue of life. It's the most essential ingredient in effective communication. It's the foundational principle that holds all relationships.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: I have seen many storms in my life. Most storms have caught me by surprise, so I had to learn very quickly to look further and understand that I am not capable of controlling the weather, to exercise the art of patience and to respect the fury of nature.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: The joy of life comes from our encounters with new experiences, and hence there is no greater joy than to have an endlessly changing horizon, for each day to have a new and different sun.
author: Christopher McCandless

quote: Relax! Life is beautiful!
author: David L. Wolper

quote: Life beats down and crushes the soul and art reminds you that you have one.
author: Stella Adler

quote: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: We live in a fantasy world, a world of illusion. The great task in life is to find reality.
author: Iris Murdoch

quote: Only the disciplined ones in life are free. If you are undisciplined, you are a slave to your moods and your passions.
author: Eliud Kipchoge

quote: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.
author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quote: Even in a world with much sadness, at its essence, life is beautiful.
author: Dianne Reeves

quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: I am the Way, the Truth, and the Life. No one comes to the Father except through me.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: Life is too short not to celebrate nice moments!
author: Jurgen Klopp

quote: What would life be if we had no courage to attempt anything?
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: My philosophy is it's none of my business what people say of me and think of me. I am what I am, and I do what I do. I expect nothing and accept everything. And it makes life so much easier.
author: Anthony Hopkins

quote: Right now I am trying to be in a place of calm, a place where I can chill out and then handle the chaos of life better. You don't just get it overnight; you have to work at it. It's a daily struggle.
author: Jackee Harry

quote: Slow down and enjoy life.
author: Skip Marley

quote: Even a happy life cannot be without a measure of darkness, and the word happy would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness. It is far better take things as they come along with patience and equanimity.
author: Carl Jung

quote: I just want to live each moment to the fullest. And enjoy life.
author: Kadeena Cox

quote: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: Tell me, what is it you plan to do with your one wild and precious life?
author: Mary Oliver

quote: Never regret yesterday. Life is in you today and you make your tomorrow.
author: L. Ron Hubbard

quote: Lighten up, just enjoy life, smile more, laugh more, and don't get so worked up about things.
author: Kenneth Branagh

quote: The greatest legacy one can pass on to one's children and grandchildren is not money or other material things accumulated in one's life, but rather a legacy of character and faith.
author: Billy Graham

quote: If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life.
author: Marcus Garvey

quote: Stay true to yourself, yet always be open to learn. Work hard, and never give up on your dreams, even when nobody else believes they can come true but you. These are not cliches but real tools you need no matter what you do in life to stay focused on your path.
author: Phillip Sweet

quote: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life - think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: The whole point is to live life and be - to use all the colors in the crayon box.
author: RuPaul

quote: You're going to go through tough times - that's life. But I say, 'Nothing happens to you, it happens for you.' See the positive in negative events.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Life is the art of drawing without an eraser.
author: John W. Gardner

quote: A healthy social life is found only when, in the mirror of each soul, the whole community finds its reflection, and when, in the whole community, the virtue of each one is living.
author: Rudolf Steiner

quote: One must choose in life between boredom and suffering.
author: Madame de Stael

quote: It is through gratitude for the present moment that the spiritual dimension of life opens up.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Life is so constructed, that the event does not, cannot, will not, match the expectation.
author: Charlotte Bronte

quote: Rain is grace; rain is the sky descending to the earth; without rain, there would be no life.
author: John Updike

quote: The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes.
author: William James

quote: One of the luckiest things that can happen to you in life is, I think, to have a happy childhood.
author: Agatha Christie

quote: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.
author: Langston Hughes

quote: Life is a journey. When we stop, things don't go right.
author: Pope Francis

quote: Youth is something I never wanna take for granted. I just want to smile and live life.
author: Tyler, The Creator

quote: If you spend your whole life waiting for the storm, you'll never enjoy the sunshine.
author: Morris West

quote: I am lucky to do what I do and enjoy life.
author: Boban Marjanovic

quote: Life is not what you expect: it is made up of the most unexpected twists and turns.
author: Ilaiyaraaja

quote: Life comes with pain.
author: Rod Wave

quote: Life is about perspective and how you look at something... ultimately, you have to zoom out.
author: Whitney Wolfe Herd

quote: Life is hard. Life is difficult. Life is going to punch you in the gut. But when you change your attitude, you change your behavior. When your behavior changes, so do your results.
author: Will Hurd

quote: I'm not a hunter, but I've been around guns all my life. I'm a great shot.
author: Sam Elliott

quote: We are all born alone and die alone. The loneliness is definitely part of the journey of life.
author: Jenova Chen

quote: The energy of the mind is the essence of life.
author: Aristotle

quote: Life is one long struggle in the dark.
author: Lucretius

quote: I just enjoy life in a way where I like being my own person.
author: Keith Thurman

quote: Life is about choices. Some we regret, some were proud of. Some will haunt us forever. 'Black Rain' was very much about choices. The message - we are what we chose to be.
author: Graham Brown

quote: Literature adds to reality, it does not simply describe it. It enriches the necessary competencies that daily life requires and provides; and in this respect, it irrigates the deserts that our lives have already become.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: Life goes on, and one should look ahead and not backward.
author: Sonali Bendre

quote: Some people are born on third base and go through life thinking they hit a triple.
author: Barry Switzer

quote: The bottom line is to have fun and enjoy life.
author: Rekha

quote: My life needs editing.
author: Mort Sahl

quote: Music is the soundtrack of your life.
author: Dick Clark

quote: 'Tis easy enough to be pleasant, When life flows along like a song; But the man worth while is the one who will smile when everything goes dead wrong.
author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quote: Three grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: I haven't lived a perfect life. I have regrets. But that's from a lifetime of taking chances, making decisions, and trying not to be frozen. The only thing that I can do with my regrets is understand them.
author: Kevin Costner

quote: The greatest pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
author: Walter Bagehot

quote: Life is a gift, and it offers us the privilege, opportunity, and responsibility to give something back by becoming more.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Life is short, so enjoy it to the fullest.
author: John Walters

quote: Take a step back, evaluate what is important, and enjoy life.
author: Teri Garr

quote: We forge the chains we wear in life.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: It's better to be a lion for a day than a sheep all your life.
author: Elizabeth Kenny

quote: Life is like a game of cards. The hand you are dealt is determinism; the way you play it is free will.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: The best things in life are often waiting for you at the exit ramp of your comfort zone.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.
author: Immanuel Kant

quote: I believe that God put us in this jolly world to be happy and enjoy life.
author: Robert Baden-Powell

quote: The only rule is don't be boring and dress cute wherever you go. Life is too short to blend in.
author: Paris Hilton

quote: The greatest thing about where my life is right now is it's very relaxed and chill. I'm just hanging out, being myself and doing my work.
author: Lucas Grabeel

quote: Don't ever doubt yourselves or waste a second of your life. It's too short, and you're too special.
author: Ariana Grande

quote: The secret of life is honesty and fair dealing. If you can fake that, you've got it made.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: Money doesn't mean anything to me. I've made a lot of money, but I want to enjoy life and not stress myself building my bank account. I give lots away and live simply, mostly out of a suitcase in hotels. We all know that good health is much more important.
author: Keanu Reeves

quote: Life is too short to not have fun; we are only here for a short time compared to the sun and the moon and all that.
author: Coolio

quote: Give yourself a gift of five minutes of contemplation in awe of everything you see around you. Go outside and turn your attention to the many miracles around you. This five-minute-a-day regimen of appreciation and gratitude will help you to focus your life in awe.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Life is a chess match. Every decision that you make has a consequence to it.
author: P.K. Subban

quote: You must trust and believe in people or life becomes impossible.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: Without football, my life is worth nothing.
author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quote: Make it a habit to tell people thank you. To express your appreciation, sincerely and without the expectation of anything in return. Truly appreciate those around you, and you'll soon find many others around you. Truly appreciate life, and you'll find that you have more of it.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: You never know where life is going to take you. So everything I do, I just take it one day at a time, and it always leads you to the right place.
author: Kyle Massey

quote: Life is all memory, except for the one present moment that goes by you so quickly you hardly catch it going.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: Authenticity is everything! You have to wake up every day and look in the mirror, and you want to be proud of the person who's looking back at you. And you can only do that if you're being honest with yourself and being a person of high character. You have an opportunity every single day to write that story of your life.
author: Aaron Rodgers

quote: Life is supposed to be about love and good times, and so I've forgiven myself after paying the consequences of my bad decisions, and I'm ready to move forward and allow my life to be a light to others that it's never over, even for a person like me, who has lost a tremendous amount of respect among my peers, my fans, my friends and family.
author: Jon Jones

quote: Everyone is comparing lives on social media and wants the perfect body, perfect image, perfect outfit, perfect life - we're striving for this perfection, and it's so unhealthy because there's no such thing as perfection.
author: Emily Atack

quote: You may not always have a comfortable life and you will not always be able to solve all of the world's problems at once but don't ever underestimate the importance you can have because history has shown us that courage can be contagious and hope can take on a life of its own.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: Everything we want to do in life requires discipline. And like strength, flexibility, and endurance, it can be built up over time.
author: Laird Hamilton

quote: I don't regret what I've been through. I've had ups and downs, super highs and some really low lows. I've been so blessed that I could never say, 'I wish this didn't happen.' It's part of who I am. There's nothing in my life that's so ugh.
author: Jennifer Lopez

quote: Time is long but life is short.
author: Stevie Wonder

quote: Everyone has a right to their own opinion about me, and that's fine. I'm just going to keep being myself and living my life. That's all I can do.
author: Dan Bilzerian

quote: The tragedy of life is often not in our failure, but rather in our complacency; not in our doing too much, but rather in our doing too little; not in our living above our ability, but rather in our living below our capacities.
author: Benjamin E. Mays

quote: Life's like a movie, write your own ending. Keep believing, keep pretending.
author: Jim Henson

quote: It's unbelievable how much you don't know about the game you've been playing all your life.
author: Mickey Mantle

quote: From what we get, we can make a living; what we give, however, makes a life.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Grace is what matters in anything - especially life, especially growth, tragedy, pain, love, death. That's a quality that I admire very greatly. It keeps you from reaching out for the gun too quickly. It keeps you from destroying things too foolishly. It sort of keeps you alive.
author: Jeff Buckley

quote: My view of life is, 'If you're going to miss Heaven, why miss it by two inches? Miss it!
author: Sam Kinison

quote: No matter if you win or lose, the most important thing in life is to enjoy what you have.
author: Dong Dong

quote: I believe it's so important to love life, enjoy it for its small moments and live without regrets - life is so unpredictable.
author: Mahesh Manjrekar

quote: One life is all we have and we live it as we believe in living it. But to sacrifice what you are and to live without belief, that is a fate more terrible than dying.
author: Joan of Arc

quote: Life is like a dogsled team. If you ain't the lead dog, the scenery never changes.
author: Lewis Grizzard

quote: Whatever you do, do with determination. You have one life to live; do your work with passion and give your best. Whether you want to be a chef, doctor, actor, or a mother, be passionate to get the best result.
author: Alia Bhatt

quote: Dogs are not our whole life, but they make our lives whole.
author: Roger Caras

quote: Life is a mirror and you get back what you give out.
author: Tess Daly

quote: Life is one grand, sweet song, so start the music.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
author: Unknown

quote: There are more important things in life than winning or losing a game.
author: Lionel Messi

quote: Challenging the meaning of life is the truest expression of the state of being human.
author: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: You only get one shot at life, one life to live, make the most out of it put as many smiles as you can on people's faces, help as many people as you can, get you some paper. Live life, you and your folks.
author: Young Dolph

quote: One of the things I learned the hard way was that it doesn't pay to get discouraged. Keeping busy and making optimism a way of life can restore your faith in yourself.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Life is a moving, breathing thing. We have to be willing to constantly evolve. Perfection is constant transformation.
author: Nia Peeples

quote: Life is short and the older you get, the more you feel it. Indeed, the shorter it is. People lose their capacity to walk, run, travel, think, and experience life. I realise how important it is to use the time I have.
author: Viggo Mortensen

quote: There is a vitality, a life force, an energy, a quickening, that is translated through you into action, and because there is only one of you in all time, this expression is unique.
author: Martha Graham

quote: Today is life-the only life you are sure of. Make the most of today. Get interested in something. Shake yourself awake. Develop a hobby. Let the winds of enthusiasm sweep through you. Live today with gusto.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Life is all about having a good time.
author: Miley Cyrus

quote: Once your mind and body is healthy, it creates a freedom that helps you enjoy life.
author: Milind Soman

quote: There is a fountain of youth: it is your mind, your talents, the creativity you bring to your life and the lives of people you love. When you learn to tap this source, you will truly have defeated age.
author: Sophia Loren

quote: If you ask me what I came into this life to do, I will tell you: I came to live out loud.
author: Emile Zola

quote: No matter what kind of challenges or difficulties or painful situations you go through in your life, we all have something deep within us that we can reach down and find the inner strength to get through them.
author: Alana Stewart

quote: Too much sanity may be madness and the maddest of all, to see life as it is and not as it should be.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: What you put into life is what you get out of it.
author: Clint Eastwood

quote: I would rather die a meaningful death than to live a meaningless life.
author: Corazon Aquino

quote: In life, as in art, the beautiful moves in curves.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: I remember my mother's prayers and they have always followed me. They have clung to me all my life.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Life isn't black and white. It's a million gray areas, don't you find?
author: Ridley Scott

quote: The Internet is so big, so powerful and pointless that for some people it is a complete substitute for life.
author: Andrew Brown

quote: Life is tough, and things don't always work out well, but we should be brave and go on with our lives.
author: Suga

quote: Communication is a skill that you can learn. It's like riding a bicycle or typing. If you're willing to work at it, you can rapidly improve the quality of evry part of your life.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Every life has a measure of sorrow, and sometimes this is what awakens us.
author: Steven Tyler

quote: May you live all the days of your life.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: I do not write for this generation. I am writing for other ages. If this could read me, they would burn my books, the work of my whole life. On the other hand, the generation which interprets these writings will be an educated generation; they will understand me and say: 'Not all were asleep in the nighttime of our grandparents.'
author: Jose Rizal

quote: I like people that enjoy life, 'cause I do the same.
author: Lil Wayne

quote: Low expectations is the key to happiness in life.
author: Christopher Miller

quote: To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone and a funny bone.
author: Reba McEntire

quote: Life is beautiful but people are crazy.
author: Charles Osgood

quote: When a team takes ownership of its problems, the problem gets solved. It is true on the battlefield, it is true in business, and it is true in life.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: I'm going to use all my tools, my God-given ability, and make the best life I can with it.
author: LeBron James

quote: Cinema can fill in the empty spaces of your life and your loneliness.
author: Pedro Almodovar

quote: Life is full of challenges, but I always have the Three Ps: Passion, patience and persistence. And the fourth one is pizza.
author: Butch Hartman

quote: It's okay to lose. Losing teaches you something. Having to try and going through the trials and tribulations to actually overcome, to get there to win, to triumph, that's what makes life interesting.
author: Elizabeth Banks

quote: See, I have set before you this day life and good, death and evil... I have set before you life and death, blessing and curse; therefore choose life.
author: Moses

quote: In life, it is important to not be afraid to put yourself out there, win or lose. It is all about the spirit of challenging yourself to be open to realizing your highest potential.
author: Cynthia Bailey

quote: I do have a childlike enthusiasm at times. I certainly enjoy life and get pleasure sometimes in childish things.
author: Brian Baumgartner

quote: The meaning of life is contained in every single expression of life. It is present in the infinity of forms and phenomena that exist in all of creation.
author: Michael Jackson

quote: So, my happiness doesn't come from money or fame. My happiness comes from seeing life without struggle.
author: Nicki Minaj

quote: If I had to live my life again, I'd make the same mistakes, only sooner.
author: Tallulah Bankhead

quote: The difference between life and the movies is that a script has to make sense, and life doesn't.
author: Joseph L. Mankiewicz

quote: Our attitude toward life determines life's attitude towards us.
author: John N. Mitchell

quote: Winning is great, sure, but if you are really going to do something in life, the secret is learning how to lose. Nobody goes undefeated all the time. If you can pick up after a crushing defeat, and go on to win again, you are going to be a champion someday.
author: Wilma Rudolph

quote: Focusing your life solely on making a buck shows a certain poverty of ambition. It asks too little of yourself. Because it's only when you hitch your wagon to something larger than yourself that you realize your true potential.
author: Barack Obama

quote: Today's a beautiful day, and yesterday was a beautiful day, so that means it's a great life.
author: Gnash

quote: The good life consists in deriving happiness by using your signature strengths every day in the main realms of living. The meaningful life adds one more component: using these same strengths to forward knowledge, power or goodness.
author: Martin Seligman

quote: The more specific we are, the more universal something can become. Life is in the details. If you generalize, it doesn't resonate. The specificity of it is what resonates.
author: Jacqueline Woodson

quote: I was 19 when my father died from a heart attack. He was a 55-year-old college professor and had led what was by all appearances a risk-free life. But he was overweight, and heart disease runs in our family.
author: Alex Honnold

quote: Science is a way of life. Science is a perspective. Science is the process that takes us from confusion to understanding in a manner that's precise, predictive and reliable - a transformation, for those lucky enough to experience it, that is empowering and emotional.
author: Brian Greene

quote: Medicine is not only a science; it is also an art. It does not consist of compounding pills and plasters; it deals with the very processes of life, which must be understood before they may be guided.
author: Paracelsus

quote: Many that live deserve death. And some that die deserve life. Can you give it to them? Then do not be too eager to deal out death in judgement. For even the very wise cannot see all ends.
author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quote: Nothing brings me more happiness than trying to help the most vulnerable people in society. It is a goal and an essential part of my life - a kind of destiny. Whoever is in distress can call on me. I will come running wherever they are.
author: Princess Diana

quote: I don't even call them fans. I don't like that. They're literally just a part of my life; they're a part of my family. I don't think of them as on a lower level than me. I don't think I'm anything but equal to all of them. So yeah, they're basically all of my siblings.
author: Billie Eilish

quote: 'Crazy-busy' is a great armor, it's a great way for numbing. What a lot of us do is that we stay so busy, and so out in front of our life, that the truth of how we're feeling and what we really need can't catch up with us.
author: Brene Brown

quote: No matter what you do, people are always going to have something negative to say about it. You could spend your life constantly trying to seek people's approval and validation, but there is always going to be someone that has something negative to say about what you're doing.
author: Tana Mongeau

quote: Nobody's life is ever all balanced. It's a conscious decision to choose your priorities every day.
author: Elisabeth Hasselbeck

quote: Water and air, the two essential fluids on which all life depends, have become global garbage cans.
author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quote: Be patient and understanding. Life is too short to be vengeful or malicious.
author: Phillips Brooks

quote: I don't know why people are so keen to put the details of their private life in public; they forget that invisibility is a superpower.
author: Banksy

quote: We don't accomplish anything in this world alone... and whatever happens is the result of the whole tapestry of one's life and all the weavings of individual threads form one to another that creates something.
author: Sandra Day O'Connor

quote: I am overwhelmed with gratitude, and my heart is full. 'American Sniper' has broken records, which follows such an honest path of Chris's life.
author: Taya Kyle

quote: A lifestyle is what you pay for; a life is what pays you.
author: Thomas Leonard

quote: Everybody just has different steps in their life that they take to do what they should.
author: Travis Scott

quote: Life is full of tough decisions, and nothing makes them easy. But the worst ones are really your personal koans, and tormenting ambivalence is just the sense of satori rising. Try, trust, try, and trust again, and eventually you'll feel your mind change its focus to a new level of understanding.
author: Martha Beck

quote: There are so many great things in life; why dwell on negativity?
author: Zendaya

quote: Vision gets the dreams started. Dreaming employs your God-given imagination to reinforce the vision. Both are part of something I believe is absolutely necessary to building the life of a champion, a winner, a person of high character who is consistently at the top of whatever game he or she is in.
author: Emmitt Smith

quote: If you are given a chance to be a role model, I think you should always take it because you can influence a person's life in a positive light, and that's what I want to do. That's what it's all about.
author: Tiger Woods

quote: I am happy every day, because life is moving in a very positive way.
author: Lil Yachty

quote: Nobody in life gets exactly what they thought they were going to get. But if you work really hard and you're kind, amazing things will happen.
author: Conan O'Brien

quote: Unlike a drop of water which loses its identity when it joins the ocean, man does not lose his being in the society in which he lives. Man's life is independent. He is born not for the development of the society alone, but for the development of his self.
author: B. R. Ambedkar

quote: My life is a roller coaster. A lot of good moments, a lot of bad moments, too. At the end of the day, it's all part of my experience.
author: Brandon Moreno

quote: America is the land of the second chance - and when the gates of the prison open, the path ahead should lead to a better life.
author: George W. Bush

quote: The life of inner peace, being harmonious and without stress, is the easiest type of existence.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: There are only two tragedies in life: one is not getting what one wants, and the other is getting it.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Democracy is not just an election, it is our daily life.
author: Tsai Ing-wen

quote: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Even when life challenges us, it's a gift beyond all measure.
author: Parker Palmer

quote: Racing, competing, it's in my blood. It's part of me, it's part of my life; I have been doing it all my life and it stands out above everything else.
author: Ayrton Senna

quote: Life as we know it, with all its ups and downs, will soon be over. We all will give an accounting to God of how we have lived.
author: William Wilberforce

quote: Peace is the beauty of life. It is sunshine. It is the smile of a child, the love of a mother, the joy of a father, the togetherness of a family. It is the advancement of man, the victory of a just cause, the triumph of truth.
author: Menachem Begin

quote: Do you. Wear what you want to wear. Be an individual. Be unique and live your best life.
author: Kali Uchis

quote: I've learned that you shouldn't go through life with a catcher's mitt on both hands; you need to be able to throw something back.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: With cyberbullying, one press of a finger on an electronic device can shatter someone's reputation and what they think is their entire life. It's scary.
author: Justin Prentice

quote: I have an abundant amount of love in my life, and I'm grateful for that.
author: SZA

quote: Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Real life is messy, and drama is a shaped version of real life.
author: Simon Beaufoy

quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Life is like playing a violin solo in public and learning the instrument as one goes on.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Security is mostly a superstition. It does not exist in nature, nor do the children of men as a whole experience it. Avoiding danger is no safer in the long run than outright exposure. Life is either a daring adventure, or nothing.
author: Helen Keller

quote: To live in this world, you must be able to do three things: to love what is mortal; to hold it against your bones knowing your own life depends on it; and, when the time comes to let it go, to let it go.
author: Mary Oliver

quote: It is by going down into the abyss that we recover the treasures of life. Where you stumble, there lies your treasure.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: The ideal man bears the accidents of life with dignity and grace, making the best of circumstances.
author: Aristotle

quote: Wherever you are, be there totally. If you find your here and now intolerable and it makes you unhappy, you have three options: remove yourself from the situation, change it, or accept it totally. If you want to take responsibility for your life, you must choose one of those three options, and you must choose now. Then accept the consequences.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: We are all sentenced to solitary confinement inside our own skins, for life.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: For time and the world do not stand still. Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or the present are certain to miss the future.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: The object of life is not to be on the side of the majority, but to escape finding oneself in the ranks of the insane.
author: Marcus Aurelius
