quote: I don't like to say I have given my life to art. I prefer to say art has given me my life.
author: Frank Stella

quote: Life is not easy for any of us. But what of that? We must have perseverance and above all confidence in ourselves. We must believe that we are gifted for something and that this thing must be attained.
author: Marie Curie

quote: You have people come into your life shockingly and surprisingly. You have losses that you never thought you'd experience. You have rejection and you have learn how to deal with that and how to get up the next day and go on with it.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Our ability to handle life's challenges is a measure of our strength of character.
author: Les Brown

quote: The expectations of life depend upon diligence; the mechanic that would perfect his work must first sharpen his tools.
author: Confucius

quote: Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
author: William James

quote: Whatever your life's work is, do it well. A man should do his job so well that the living, the dead, and the unborn could do it no better.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Every human is an artist. The dream of your life is to make beautiful art.
author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quote: Life's too short to deal with other people's insecurities.
author: Anthony Hopkins

quote: Your destiny is to fulfill those things upon which you focus most intently. So choose to keep your focus on that which is truly magnificent, beautiful, uplifting and joyful. Your life is always moving toward something.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: Satisfaction consists in freedom from pain, which is the positive element of life.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: People grow through experience if they meet life honestly and courageously. This is how character is built.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Part of the secret of a success in life is to eat what you like and let the food fight it out inside.
author: Mark Twain

quote: For the past 33 years, I have looked in the mirror every morning and asked myself: 'If today were the last day of my life, would I want to do what I am about to do today?' And whenever the answer has been 'No' for too many days in a row, I know I need to change something.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The universe is change; our life is what our thoughts make it.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: He who is not everyday conquering some fear has not learned the secret of life.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: That best portion of a man's life, his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and love.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: There are two means of refuge from the miseries of life: music and cats.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: We love life, not because we are used to living but because we are used to loving.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Life is a series of experiences, each one of which makes us bigger, even though sometimes it is hard to realize this. For the world was built to develop character, and we must learn that the setbacks and grieves which we endure help us in our marching onward.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Help others and give something back. I guarantee you will discover that while public service improves the lives and the world around you, its greatest reward is the enrichment and new meaning it will bring your own life.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: The major value in life is not what you get. The major value in life is what you become.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Life is nothing but a competition to be the criminal rather than the victim.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: The ultimate value of life depends upon awareness and the power of contemplation rather than upon mere survival.
author: Aristotle

quote: This is love: to fly toward a secret sky, to cause a hundred veils to fall each moment. First to let go of life. Finally, to take a step without feet.
author: Rumi

quote: A hero is someone who has given his or her life to something bigger than oneself.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: The greatest mistake you can make in life is continually fearing that you'll make one.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Life is too short to be little. Man is never so manly as when he feels deeply, acts boldly, and expresses himself with frankness and with fervor.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Life's so unpredictable. You never know when the next high or low will strike you. The trick is just to flow with the tide.
author: Zeenat Aman

quote: Everything in life is somewhere else, and you get there in a car.
author: E. B. White

quote: I know in my heart that man is good. That what is right will always eventually triumph. And there's purpose and worth to each and every life.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Always say 'yes' to the present moment... Surrender to what is. Say 'yes' to life - and see how life starts suddenly to start working for you rather than against you.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: One's life has value so long as one attributes value to the life of others, by means of love, friendship, indignation and compassion.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: You have to enjoy life. Always be surrounded by people that you like, people who have a nice conversation. There are so many positive things to think about.
author: Sophia Loren

quote: I think that everybody needs four things in life. Everybody needs something to do regardless of age. Everybody needs someone to love. Everybody needs something to hope for, and, of course, everybody needs someone to believe in.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: We all learn lessons in life. Some stick, some don't. I have always learned more from rejection and failure than from acceptance and success.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: The Christian life is not a constant high. I have my moments of deep discouragement. I have to go to God in prayer with tears in my eyes, and say, 'O God, forgive me,' or 'Help me.'
author: Billy Graham

quote: Water is life, and clean water means health.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Life is either a great adventure or nothing.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Life is partly what we make it, and partly what it is made by the friends we choose.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: It is a useless life that is not consecrated to a great ideal. It is like a stone wasted on the field without becoming a part of any edifice.
author: Jose Rizal

quote: The most glorious moments in your life are not the so-called days of success, but rather those days when out of dejection and despair you feel rise in you a challenge to life, and the promise of future accomplishments.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: When you can do the common things of life in an uncommon way, you will command the attention of the world.
author: George Washington Carver

quote: Courage is the price that life exacts for granting peace.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: The goal of all life is death.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Live your life as though your every act were to become a universal law.
author: Immanuel Kant

quote: If life gives you limes, make margaritas.
author: Jimmy Buffett

quote: My focus is to forget the pain of life. Forget the pain, mock the pain, reduce it. And laugh.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: Eating is so intimate. It's very sensual. When you invite someone to sit at your table and you want to cook for them, you're inviting a person into your life.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I know of no more encouraging fact than the unquestionable ability of man to elevate his life by conscious endeavor.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Without discipline, there's no life at all.
author: Katharine Hepburn

quote: Life is neither good or evil, but only a place for good and evil.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Don't die old, die empty. That's the goal of life. Go to the cemetery and disappoint the graveyard.
author: Myles Munroe

quote: A life of leisure and a life of laziness are two things. There will be sleeping enough in the grave.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The only limits to the possibilities in your life tomorrow are the buts you use today.
author: Les Brown

quote: A man who views the world the same at fifty as he did at twenty has wasted thirty years of his life.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Each player must accept the cards life deals him or her: but once they are in hand, he or she alone must decide how to play the cards in order to win the game.
author: Voltaire

quote: The figure a poem makes. It begins in delight and ends in wisdom... in a clarification of life - not necessarily a great clarification, such as sects and cults are founded on, but in a momentary stay against confusion.
author: Robert Frost

quote: In dwelling, live close to the ground. In thinking, keep to the simple. In conflict, be fair and generous. In governing, don't try to control. In work, do what you enjoy. In family life, be completely present.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Be true to the game, because the game will be true to you. If you try to shortcut the game, then the game will shortcut you. If you put forth the effort, good things will be bestowed upon you. That's truly about the game, and in some ways that's about life too.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: A mission statement is not something you write overnight... But fundamentally, your mission statement becomes your constitution, the solid expression of your vision and values. It becomes the criterion by which you measure everything else in your life.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: All my life through, the new sights of Nature made me rejoice like a child.
author: Marie Curie

quote: The universe is transformation: life is opinion.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: If you don't live your life, then who will?
author: Rihanna

quote: My favorite things in life don't cost any money. It's really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: It is best to rise from life as from a banquet, neither thirsty nor drunken.
author: Aristotle

quote: I came in with Halley's Comet in 1835. It is coming again next year, and I expect to go out with it. It will be the greatest disappointment of my life if I don't go out with Halley's Comet. The Almighty has said, no doubt: 'Now here are these two unaccountable freaks; they came in together, they must go out together.'
author: Mark Twain

quote: Remember your dreams and fight for them. You must know what you want from life. There is just one thing that makes your dream become impossible: the fear of failure.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: I believe that a simple and unassuming manner of life is best for everyone, best both for the body and the mind.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Accept responsibility for your life. Know that it is you who will get you where you want to go, no one else.
author: Les Brown

quote: Wealth is the ability to fully experience life.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I believe life is an intelligent thing: that things aren't random.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Art is parasitic on life, just as criticism is parasitic on art.
author: Harry S Truman

quote: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
author: Orson Welles

quote: Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them humanity cannot survive.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: I feel that there is nothing more truly artistic than to love people.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: The richest love is that which submits to the arbitration of time.
author: Lawrence Durrell

quote: People protect what they love.
author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quote: For small creatures such as we the vastness is bearable only through love.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: Once the realization is accepted that even between the closest human beings infinite distances continue, a wonderful living side by side can grow, if they succeed in loving the distance between them which makes it possible for each to see the other whole against the sky.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Love does not dominate; it cultivates.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Love is the only reality and it is not a mere sentiment. It is the ultimate truth that lies at the heart of creation.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: We need 4 hugs a day for survival. We need 8 hugs a day for maintenance. We need 12 hugs a day for growth.
author: Virginia Satir

quote: Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.
author: Voltaire

quote: Love is being stupid together.
author: Paul Valery

quote: Love feels no burden, thinks nothing of trouble, attempts what is above its strength, pleads no excuse of impossibility; for it thinks all things lawful for itself, and all things possible.
author: Thomas a Kempis

quote: In our life there is a single color, as on an artist's palette, which provides the meaning of life and art. It is the color of love.
author: Marc Chagall

quote: Great thoughts come from the heart.
author: Luc de Clapiers

quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
author: Robert Frost

quote: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Don't threaten me with love, baby. Let's just go walking in the rain.
author: Billie Holiday

quote: Friends can help each other. A true friend is someone who lets you have total freedom to be yourself - and especially to feel. Or, not feel. Whatever you happen to be feeling at the moment is fine with them. That's what real love amounts to - letting a person be what he really is.
author: Jim Morrison

quote: I believe that imagination is stronger than knowledge. That myth is more potent than history. That dreams are more powerful than facts. That hope always triumphs over experience. That laughter is the only cure for grief. And I believe that love is stronger than death.
author: Robert Fulghum

quote: He who loves, flies, runs, and rejoices; he is free and nothing holds him back.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: Blessed is the influence of one true, loving human soul on another.
author: George Eliot

quote: The first duty of love is to listen.
author: Paul Tillich

quote: There isn't any formula or method. You learn to love by loving - by paying attention and doing what one thereby discovers has to be done.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: The moment you have in your heart this extraordinary thing called love and feel the depth, the delight, the ecstasy of it, you will discover that for you the world is transformed.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: Choose your love, Love your choice.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Love is the attempt to form a friendship inspired by beauty.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Love is but the discovery of ourselves in others, and the delight in the recognition.
author: Alexander Smith

quote: Only divine love bestows the keys of knowledge.
author: Arthur Rimbaud

quote: Love is the greatest refreshment in life.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: I think it is all a matter of love: the more you love a memory, the stronger and stranger it is.
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: Love is the hardest habit to break, and the most difficult to satisfy.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: There is no surprise more magical than the surprise of being loved: It is God's finger on man's shoulder.
author: Charles Morgan

quote: True love comes quietly, without banners or flashing lights. If you hear bells, get your ears checked.
author: Erich Segal

quote: One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Love is like an hourglass, with the heart filling up as the brain empties.
author: Jules Renard

quote: Love is the great miracle cure. Loving ourselves works miracles in our lives.
author: Louise L. Hay

quote: Love conquers all.
author: Virgil

quote: In a full heart there is room for everything, and in an empty heart there is room for nothing.
author: Antonio Porchia

quote: The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: We are all born for love. It is the principle of existence, and its only end.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: We waste time looking for the perfect lover, instead of creating the perfect love.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: Love is the greatest gift that God has given us. It's free.
author: Taraji P. Henson

quote: The truth is that love smashes into your life like an ice floe, and even if your heart is built like the Titanic you go down.
author: Jeanette Winterson

quote: Follow love and it will flee, flee love and it will follow thee.
author: John Gay

quote: Pains of love be sweeter far than all other pleasures are.
author: John Dryden

quote: To say 'I love you' one must first be able to say the 'I.'
author: Ayn Rand

quote: No, there's nothing half so sweet in life as love's young dream.
author: Thomas Moore

quote: Stolen kisses are always sweetest.
author: Leigh Hunt

quote: Love is an energy which exists of itself. It is its own value.
author: Thornton Wilder

quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: A kiss is a rosy dot over the 'i' of loving.
author: Cyrano de Bergerac

quote: To love for the sake of being loved is human, but to love for the sake of loving is angelic.
author: Alphonse de Lamartine

quote: Love is blind.
author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quote: With our love, we could save the world.
author: George Harrison

quote: Self-love is the source of all our other loves.
author: Pierre Corneille

quote: Gestures, in love, are incomparably more attractive, effective and valuable than words.
author: Francois Rabelais

quote: Come live in my heart, and pay no rent.
author: Samuel Lover

quote: Being in love is the only transcendent experience.
author: Armistead Maupin

quote: Sometimes it's hard to be a woman giving all your love to just one man.
author: Tammy Wynette

quote: There's no bad consequence to loving fully, with all your heart. You always gain by giving love.
author: Reese Witherspoon

quote: The way to know life is to love many things.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: The art of love is largely the art of persistence.
author: Albert Ellis

quote: Loving others always costs us something and requires effort. And you have to decide to do it on purpose. You can't wait for a feeling to motivate you.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: The sweetest of all sounds is that of the voice of the woman we love.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: I can live without money, but I cannot live without love.
author: Judy Garland

quote: Love is the ultimate expression of the will to live.
author: Tom Wolfe

quote: A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: The love of our private friends is the only preparatory exercise for the love of all men.
author: John Henry Newman

quote: Looking back, I have this to regret, that too often when I loved, I did not say so.
author: Ray Stannard Baker

quote: Familiar acts are beautiful through love.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: People who throw kisses are hopelessly lazy.
author: Bob Hope

quote: The world is not comprehensible, but it is embraceable: through the embracing of one of its beings.
author: Martin Buber

quote: A part of kindness consists in loving people more than they deserve.
author: Joseph Joubert

quote: Where there is love there is life.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Love is supreme and unconditional; like is nice but limited.
author: Duke Ellington

quote: In love the paradox occurs that two beings become one and yet remain two.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: Love will draw an elephant through a key-hole.
author: Samuel Richardson

quote: The truth is that there is only one terminal dignity - love. And the story of a love is not important - what is important is that one is capable of love. It is perhaps the only glimpse we are permitted of eternity.
author: Helen Hayes

quote: Love is always being given where it is not required.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: If it is your time, love will track you down like a cruise missile.
author: Lynda Barry

quote: Love is energy of life.
author: Robert Browning

quote: The course of true love never did run smooth.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Do you have to have a reason for loving?
author: Brigitte Bardot

quote: There is room in the smallest cottage for a happy loving pair.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: There is no disguise which can hide love for long where it exists, or simulate it where it does not.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: There is no limit to the power of loving.
author: John Morton

quote: In every living thing there is the desire for love.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Love is that splendid triggering of human vitality the supreme activity which nature affords anyone for going out of himself toward someone else.
author: Jose Ortega y Gasset

quote: Man must evolve for all human conflict a method which rejects revenge, aggression and retaliation. The foundation of such a method is love.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Love is like a beautiful flower which I may not touch, but whose fragrance makes the garden a place of delight just the same.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Love seeketh not itself to please, nor for itself hath any care, but for another gives its ease, and builds a Heaven in Hell's despair.
author: William Blake

quote: Love is when he gives you a piece of your soul, that you never knew was missing.
author: Torquato Tasso

quote: It is difficult to know at what moment love begins; it is less difficult to know that it has begun.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Who would give a law to lovers? Love is unto itself a higher law.
author: Boethius

quote: Love has reasons which reason cannot understand.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: Love is a smoke made with the fume of sighs.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Love is a force more formidable than any other. It is invisible - it cannot be seen or measured, yet it is powerful enough to transform you in a moment, and offer you more joy than any material possession could.
author: Barbara De Angelis

quote: It's important for us to latch onto the people that we love.
author: Connie Stevens

quote: Woe to the man whose heart has not learned while young to hope, to love - and to put its trust in life.
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: When we lose one we love, our bitterest tears are called forth by the memory of hours when we loved not enough.
author: Maurice Maeterlinck

quote: All love shifts and changes. I don't know if you can be wholeheartedly in love all the time.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: Love is the poetry of the senses.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: I was about half in love with her by the time we sat down. That's the thing about girls. Every time they do something pretty... you fall half in love with them, and then you never know where the hell you are.
author: J. D. Salinger

quote: One must not trifle with love.
author: Alfred de Musset

quote: All love is vanquished by a succeeding love.
author: Ovid

quote: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: There is no remedy for love but to love more.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Love is the word used to label the sexual excitement of the young, the habituation of the middle-aged, and the mutual dependence of the old.
author: John Ciardi

quote: Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You will find as you look back upon your life that the moments when you have truly lived are the moments when you have done things in the spirit of love.
author: Henry Drummond

quote: Love takes up where knowledge leaves off.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: I believe in the compelling power of love. I do not understand it. I believe it to be the most fragrant blossom of all this thorny existence.
author: Theodore Dreiser

quote: First love is only a little foolishness and a lot of curiosity.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Love is, above all, the gift of oneself.
author: Jean Anouilh

quote: Love is my religion - I could die for it.
author: John Keats

quote: Romantic love is an illusion. Most of us discover this truth at the end of a love affair or else when the sweet emotions of love lead us into marriage and then turn down their flames.
author: Thomas Moore

quote: He who loves with purity considers not the gift of the lover, but the love of the giver.
author: Thomas a Kempis

quote: More than kisses, letters mingle souls.
author: John Donne

quote: Love is like a faucet, it turns off and on.
author: Billie Holiday

quote: True love is quiescent, except in the nascent moments of true humility.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: The inner reality of love can be recognized only by love.
author: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quote: There is more pleasure in loving than in being beloved.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Love is when you meet someone who tells you something new about yourself.
author: Andre Breton

quote: Friendship is Love without his wings!
author: Lord Byron

quote: Only love interests me, and I am only in contact with things that revolve around love.
author: Marc Chagall

quote: Loved. You can't use it in the past tense. Death does not stop that love at all.
author: Ken Kesey

quote: The journey from teaching about love to allowing myself to be loved proved much longer than I realised.
author: Henri Nouwen

quote: Lord, grant that I might not so much seek to be loved as to love.
author: Francis of Assisi

quote: Love is of all passions the strongest, for it attacks simultaneously the head, the heart and the senses.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: A pair of powerful spectacles has sometimes sufficed to cure a person in love.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Love is an emotion experienced by the many and enjoyed by the few.
author: George Jean Nathan

quote: Love is all we have, the only way that each can help the other.
author: Euripides

quote: Love's greatest gift is its ability to make everything it touches sacred.
author: Barbara De Angelis

quote: My wife, my family, my friends - they've all taught me things about love and what that emotion really means. In a nutshell, loving someone is about giving, not receiving.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: Can miles truly separate you from friends... If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?
author: Richard Bach

quote: Absence - that common cure of love.
author: Lord Byron

quote: We are born of love; Love is our mother.
author: Rumi

quote: The only abnormality is the incapacity to love.
author: Anais Nin

quote: I was born with an enormous need for affection, and a terrible need to give it.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Those who have never known the deep intimacy and the intense companionship of mutual love have missed the best thing that life has to give.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: The spring of love becomes hidden and soon filled up.
author: Max Muller

quote: Love is a hole in the heart.
author: Ben Hecht

quote: When we are in love we seem to ourselves quite different from what we were before.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: Love him and let him love you. Do you think anything else under heaven really matters?
author: James Baldwin

quote: Love means to love that which is unlovable; or it is no virtue at all.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Love is only a dirty trick played on us to achieve continuation of the species.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: If equal affection cannot be, let the more loving be me.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: As soon go kindle fire with snow, as seek to quench the fire of love with words.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: The praise that comes from love does not make us vain, but more humble.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: Any time not spent on love is wasted.
author: Torquato Tasso

quote: There is only one kind of love, but there are a thousand imitations.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: In the flush of love's light, we dare be brave. And suddenly we see that love costs all we are, and will ever be. Yet it is only love which sets us free.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Do not seek the because - in love there is no because, no reason, no explanation, no solutions.
author: Anais Nin

quote: Who loves, raves.
author: Lord Byron

quote: I like not only to be loved, but also to be told I am loved.
author: George Eliot

quote: The crime of loving is forgetting.
author: Maurice Chevalier

quote: The fact is that love is of two kinds, one which commands, and one which obeys. The two are quite distinct, and the passion to which the one gives rise is not the passion of the other.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Selfishness is one of the qualities apt to inspire love.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: Love is a great beautifier.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: To enlarge or illustrate this power and effect of love is to set a candle in the sun.
author: Robert Burton

quote: The sweetest noise on earth, a woman's tongue; A string which hath no discord.
author: Bryan Procter

quote: Love is the child of illusion and the parent of disillusion.
author: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: The fate of love is that it always seems too little or too much.
author: Amelia Barr

quote: No one has ever loved anyone the way everyone wants to be loved.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: I long for the raised voice, the howl of rage or love.
author: Leslie Fiedler

quote: If thou must love me, let it be for naught except for love's sake only.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: All love is lost but upon God alone.
author: William Dunbar

quote: At the beginning and at the end of love, the two lovers are embarrassed to find themselves alone.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Love means not ever having to say you're sorry.
author: Erich Segal

quote: Oh, love will make a dog howl in rhyme.
author: Francis Beaumont

quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
author: Pele

quote: I'm just so happy, and I'm grateful for my fans. I just hope I keep doing work that they love.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: Since love grows within you, so beauty grows. For love is the beauty of the soul.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Life is a song - sing it. Life is a game - play it. Life is a challenge - meet it. Life is a dream - realize it. Life is a sacrifice - offer it. Life is love - enjoy it.
author: Sai Baba

quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
author: George Sand

quote: If you do what you love, you'll never work a day in your life.
author: Marc Anthony

quote: Thousands have lived without love, not one without water.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: I want to thank all our fans all around the world for their unconditional love and support. It really means a lot to me.
author: Jennie

quote: Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: I love my fans, so when I get the chance to interact with them, it's beautiful.
author: Flo Rida

quote: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back they're yours; if they don't they never were.
author: Richard Bach

quote: But I say to you, Love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you, so that you may be sons of your Father who is in heaven; for he makes his sun rise on the evil and on the good, and sends rain on the just and on the unjust.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: True love doesn't happen right away; it's an ever-growing process. It develops after you've gone through many ups and downs, when you've suffered together, cried together, laughed together.
author: Ricardo Montalban

quote: My father is Italian, and I never met my paternal grandparents. The family name was 'Caroselli' and it was changed in the mid '50s. I think they wanted to assimilate, which was pretty common, although I love the name 'Caroselli.'
author: Steve Carell

quote: There is no sincerer love than the love of food.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
author: Satchel Paige

quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: Enjoy the journey and try to get better every day. And don't lose the passion and the love for what you do.
author: Nadia Comaneci

quote: The beginning of love is to let those we love be perfectly themselves, and not to twist them to fit our own image. Otherwise we love only the reflection of ourselves we find in them.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: From quiet homes and first beginning, out to the undiscovered ends, there's nothing worth the wear of winning, but laughter and the love of friends.
author: Hilaire Belloc

quote: Love myself I do. Not everything, but I love the good as well as the bad. I love my crazy lifestyle, and I love my hard discipline. I love my freedom of speech and the way my eyes get dark when I'm tired. I love that I have learned to trust people with my heart, even if it will get broken. I am proud of everything that I am and will become.
author: Johnny Weir

quote: I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Love is the flower of life, and blossoms unexpectedly and without law, and must be plucked where it is found, and enjoyed for the brief hour of its duration.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Things are beautiful if you love them.
author: Jean Anouilh

quote: When the people you love are gone, you're alone.
author: Keanu Reeves

quote: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.
author: Bradley Whitford

quote: I am overwhelmed by the love showered on me by my fans.
author: The Great Khali

quote: Power is of two kinds. One is obtained by the fear of punishment and the other by acts of love. Power based on love is a thousand times more effective and permanent then the one derived from fear of punishment.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.
author: Brad Henry

quote: Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: There are four questions of value in life, Don Octavio. What is sacred? Of what is the spirit made? What is worth living for and what is worth dying for? The answer to each is the same. Only love.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Work hard, play hard, dream big, love loads, laugh as much as you can, and give back.
author: Deirdre O'Kane

quote: When love and skill work together, expect a masterpiece.
author: John Ruskin

quote: A man can be himself only so long as he is alone, and if he does not love solitude, he will not love freedom, for it is only when he is alone that he is really free.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: I don't have to do things just to please people. It's okay to do what I love because what I love, my fans love. And they're really the only ones that should matter.
author: Nicki Minaj

quote: I am good, but not an angel. I do sin, but I am not the devil. I am just a small girl in a big world trying to find someone to love.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Flatter me, and I may not believe you. Criticize me, and I may not like you. Ignore me, and I may not forgive you. Encourage me, and I will not forget you. Love me and I may be forced to love you.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Communism is not love. Communism is a hammer which we use to crush the enemy.
author: Mao Zedong

quote: There is no lonelier man in death, except the suicide, than that man who has lived many years with a good wife and then outlived her. If two people love each other there can be no happy end to it.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: There is no greater glory than love, nor any greater punishment than jealousy.
author: Lope de Vega

quote: The things that we love tell us what we are.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: Pure love is a willingness to give without a thought of receiving anything in return.
author: Peace Pilgrim

quote: Rare as is true love, true friendship is rarer.
author: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: The beauty of a woman must be seen from in her eyes, because that is the doorway to her heart, the place where love resides.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: My friends, love is better than anger. Hope is better than fear. Optimism is better than despair. So let us be loving, hopeful and optimistic. And we'll change the world.
author: Jack Layton

quote: The only way to take sorrow out of death is to take love out of life.
author: Russell M. Nelson

quote: Jealousy is just love and hate at the same time.
author: Drake

quote: I love the rain. It's my favorite weather.
author: Kristen Wiig

quote: I am blessed to be surrounded by the people I love. I thank them for their patience and grace.
author: Matt Lauer

quote: Music is love in search of a word.
author: Sidney Lanier

quote: There would be no need for love if perfection were possible. Love arises from our imperfection, from our being different and always in need of the forgiveness, encouragement and that missing half of ourselves that we are searching for, as the Greek myth tells us, in order to complete ourselves.
author: Eugene Kennedy

quote: It's always great to engage with people. You never know who you can make an effect on. And I love interacting with the fans, hearing what they have to say and joking around with them. Anytime I can reach out online and give encouragement, motivate people, be a better citizen, that's what it's all about, man.
author: Antonio Brown

quote: I like feet. I definitely have a fetish. I love to see a man's bare foot, but its got to be taken care of. If they're not well manicured, you've got to wonder what the rest of him is like. I don't want to get in bed with somebody and feel his gnarly feet.
author: Brooke Burke

quote: We look forward to the time when the Power of Love will replace the Love of Power. Then will our world know the blessings of peace.
author: William E. Gladstone

quote: Surround yourself with good people who encourage and love you. There are always ups and downs, no matter how successful you are.
author: Liana Liberato

quote: Be happy with being you. Love your flaws. Own your quirks. And know that you are just as perfect as anyone else, exactly as you are.
author: Ariana Grande

quote: I'm learning to accept myself. I'm still in the process of learning to love who I am. And it's been really refreshing and really nice to be able to do that and be okay. I think my fans have brought that out in me.
author: Dua Lipa

quote: Don't let fear or insecurity stop you from trying new things. Believe in yourself. Do what you love. And most importantly, be kind to others, even if you don't like them.
author: Stacy London

quote: To all my fans, I love y'all. I wouldn't have made it without you.
author: Offset

quote: I love the feeling of the fresh air on my face and the wind blowing through my hair.
author: Evel Knievel

quote: It is cruel, you know, that music should be so beautiful. It has the beauty of loneliness of pain: of strength and freedom. The beauty of disappointment and never-satisfied love. The cruel beauty of nature and everlasting beauty of monotony.
author: Benjamin Britten

quote: Life is difficult for everyone; everyone has bad days. Everyone has trouble in their life, because it doesn't matter how rich you are: Sickness and trouble and worry and love, these things will mess with you at every level of life.
author: Domhnall Gleeson

quote: We are not the same persons this year as last; nor are those we love. It is a happy chance if we, changing, continue to love a changed person.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: To know yourself as the Being underneath the thinker, the stillness underneath the mental noise, the love and joy underneath the pain, is freedom, salvation, enlightenment.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Heaven has no rage like love to hatred turned, nor hell a fury like a woman scorned.
author: William Congreve

quote: Tomorrow's not promised. You may love someone; you may have a grudge because of something that they did to you, and it was unfair, but life's not fair. Life is very short, so clean up your grudges. Let's not hold them.
author: Mya

quote: If we love our country, we should also love our countrymen.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: I love playing under pressure. In fact, if there's no pressure, then I'm not in the perfect zone.
author: Virat Kohli

quote: One word frees us of all the weight and pain in life. That word is love.
author: Sophocles

quote: I believe in soulmates, yes, but I believe you also have to work at love. I happen to believe your soulmate doesn't have to be your partner - your soulmate could be your best friend, your sibling, it doesn't have to be the person you marry.
author: Cheryl Cole

quote: Love yourself for who you are, and trust me, if you are happy from within, you are the most beautiful person, and your smile is your best asset.
author: Ileana D'Cruz

quote: There is only one secure foundation: a genuine, deep relationship with Jesus Christ, which will carry you through any and all turmoil. No matter what storms are raging all around, you'll stand firm if you stand on His love.
author: Charles Stanley

quote: Life is a game and true love is a trophy.
author: Rufus Wainwright

quote: Our dilemma is that we hate change and love it at the same time; what we really want is for things to remain the same but get better.
author: Sydney J. Harris

quote: I love the man that can smile in trouble, that can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but he whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves his conduct, will pursue his principles unto death.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: To love someone means to see him as God intended him.
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: I love Mickey Mouse more than any woman I have ever known.
author: Walt Disney

quote: We come to love not by finding a perfect person but by learning to see an imperfect person perfectly.
author: Sam Keen

quote: I think when we truly love something, we get the same true love in return.
author: Diljit Dosanjh

quote: The world is too dangerous for anything but truth and too small for anything but love.
author: William Sloane Coffin

quote: Love is not to be purchased, and affection has no price.
author: St. Jerome

quote: Love without sex is still the most efficient form of hell known to man.
author: Peter Porter

quote: As you get older, the cliches of life ring true. It's the simple things that matter most: your family, the people you love, your health and sanity.
author: Ronan Keating

quote: It is impossible to love and to be wise.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: He whom the gods love dies young, while he is in health, has his senses and his judgments sound.
author: Plautus

quote: In the end, the love you take is equal to the love you make.
author: Paul McCartney

quote: Love isn't always about hanging on. Sometimes it's about letting go.
author: Reham Khan

quote: The secret of a happy marriage is finding the right person. You know they're right if you love to be with them all the time.
author: Julia Child

quote: He who does not love his own language is worse than an animal and smelly fish.
author: Jose Rizal

quote: Life is really not easy, we all have our personal battles, but it is important that you really treasure yourself, love yourself and have a sense of self-worth.
author: Heart Evangelista

quote: I love to think of nature as an unlimited broadcasting station, through which God speaks to us every hour, if we will only tune in.
author: George Washington Carver

quote: Life is pain and the enjoyment of love is an anesthetic.
author: Cesare Pavese

quote: If you want to be successful, it's just this simple. Know what you are doing. Love what you are doing. And believe in what you are doing.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Motherhood: All love begins and ends there.
author: Robert Browning

quote: I believe that every single event in life happens in an opportunity to choose love over fear.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: I love argument, I love debate. I don't expect anyone just to sit there and agree with me, that's not their job.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: We never know the love of a parent till we become parents ourselves.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: I think tolerance and acceptance and love is something that feeds every community.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: Believe in love. Believe in magic. Hell, believe in Santa Clause. Believe in others. Believe in yourself. Believe in your dreams. If you don't, who will?
author: Jon Bon Jovi

quote: I am lucky that my in-laws are incredibly special people and I love them dearly. My father-in-law is an extraordinary man and my mom-in-law a beautiful and brave woman.
author: Riya Sen

quote: I love fantasy; I love imagination - that's the inner child in me.
author: Hannah John-Kamen

quote: I don't love studying. I hate studying. I like learning. Learning is beautiful.
author: Natalie Portman

quote: Do what you love to do and give it your very best. Whether it's business or baseball, or the theater, or any field. If you don't love what you're doing and you can't give it your best, get out of it. Life is too short. You'll be an old man before you know it.
author: Al Lopez

quote: With me, what you see is what you get. Yes, call me naive, but I love life. I am happy, and for that, I make no apologies. I do like to see the best in people, and when someone is nice to my face, I tend to believe them.
author: Joyce Giraud

quote: To love and win is the best thing. To love and lose, the next best.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: The only love affair I have ever had was with music.
author: Maurice Ravel

quote: I am not a vegetarian because I love animals; I am a vegetarian because I hate plants.
author: A. Whitney Brown

quote: A first love always occupies a special place.
author: Lee Konitz

quote: If you want to love others, I think you should love yourself first.
author: RM

quote: Some think love can be measured by the amount of butterflies in their tummy. Others think love can be measured in bunches of flowers, or by using the words 'for ever.' But love can only truly be measured by actions. It can be a small thing, such as peeling an orange for a person you love because you know they don't like doing it.
author: Marian Keyes

quote: To fall in love is easy, even to remain in it is not difficult; our human loneliness is cause enough. But it is a hard quest worth making to find a comrade through whose steady presence one becomes steadily the person one desires to be.
author: Anna Louise Strong

quote: I love women to death.
author: Playboi Carti

quote: True generosity is an offering; given freely and out of pure love. No strings attached. No expectations. Time and love are the most valuable possession you can share.
author: Suze Orman

quote: The secret ingredient to every meal is love. And also garlic.
author: Michael Sorrentino

quote: The most important thing in the world is family and love.
author: John Wooden

quote: Your ordinary acts of love and hope point to the extraordinary promise that every human life is of inestimable value.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: The best thing about being a DJ is making people happy. There is nothing like seeing people get up from a table to dance or the expression on their face when they hear a song they love. I also love to educate people on music they have never heard.
author: Chelsea Leyland

quote: Love is whatever you can still betray. Betrayal can only happen if you love.
author: John le Carre

quote: I believe in true love, and I believe in happy endings. And I believe.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: You know, all that really matters is that the people you love are happy and healthy. Everything else is just sprinkles on the sundae.
author: Paul Walker

quote: Anger begets more anger, and forgiveness and love lead to more forgiveness and love.
author: Mahavira

quote: I love everything that's old, - old friends, old times, old manners, old books, old wine.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: Mama was my greatest teacher, a teacher of compassion, love and fearlessness. If love is sweet as a flower, then my mother is that sweet flower of love.
author: Stevie Wonder

quote: I love editing. It's one of my favorite parts about filmmaking.
author: Steven Spielberg

quote: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
author: Paul Sweeney

quote: Work, apart from devotion or love of God, is helpless and cannot stand alone.
author: Ramakrishna

quote: The only creatures that are evolved enough to convey pure love are dogs and infants.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: If having a soul means being able to feel love and loyalty and gratitude, then animals are better off than a lot of humans.
author: James Herriot

quote: To love what you do and feel that it matters how could anything be more fun?
author: Katharine Graham

quote: I have a personal ambition to live my life honestly and honor the true love that I've had and also the people I've had around me. I want to stay hopeful, even though I get scared about why we're even alive at all.
author: Lana Del Rey

quote: There are too many mediocre things in life to deal with. Love shouldn't be one of them. Anything less than extraordinary is a waste of my time.
author: Jill Robinson

quote: I have three lovely children. They are beautiful, talented, and kind-hearted. I'm most proud of them. I love them so much that I will never want to burden them with a large amount of inherited wealth.
author: Li Lu

quote: I'll always love the time I spent making 'Black and White.'
author: Peter Molyneux

quote: If you love being a chef then give it all you've got!
author: Monica Galetti

quote: Love is not enough. It must be the foundation, the cornerstone - but not the complete structure. It is much too pliable, too yielding.
author: Quentin Crisp

quote: If music be the food of love, play on.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: If you love something let it go free. If it doesn't come back, you never had it. If it comes back, love it forever.
author: Douglas Horton

quote: The moment that changed me for ever was the moment my first child was born. I was happy, filled with hope, and thought, 'Now I understand the whole point of work, of life, of love.'
author: Paul Theroux

quote: Football is unconditional love.
author: Tom Brady

quote: For anything worth having one must pay the price; and the price is always work, patience, love, self-sacrifice - no paper currency, no promises to pay, but the gold of real service.
author: John Burroughs

quote: Food brings people together on many different levels. It's nourishment of the soul and body; it's truly love.
author: Giada De Laurentiis

quote: Love is not blind - it sees more, not less. But because it sees more, it is willing to see less.
author: Julius Gordon

quote: I love when people underestimate me and then become pleasantly surprised.
author: Kim Kardashian

quote: You can never control who you fall in love with, even when you're in the most sad, confused time of your life. You don't fall in love with people because they're fun. It just happens.
author: Kirsten Dunst

quote: I just want to love and be loved.
author: Jennie Garth

quote: Each time you love, love as deeply as if it were forever.
author: Audre Lorde

quote: I do not want a husband who honours me as a queen, if he does not love me as a woman.
author: Elizabeth I

quote: I think the perfection of love is that it's not perfect.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: I believe in Liberty for all men: the space to stretch their arms and their souls, the right to breathe and the right to vote, the freedom to choose their friends, enjoy the sunshine, and ride on the railroads, uncursed by color; thinking, dreaming, working as they will in a kingdom of beauty and love.
author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quote: They say that love is blind, but it's trauma that's blind. Love sees what is.
author: Neil Strauss

quote: If you love god, burn a church.
author: Jello Biafra

quote: Love is never defeated, and I could add, the history of Ireland proves it.
author: Pope John Paul II

quote: No woman ever hates a man for being in love with her, but many a woman hate a man for being a friend to her.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: I've learned it's important not to limit yourself. You can do whatever you really love to do, no matter what it is.
author: Ryan Gosling

quote: To hate, to love, to think, to feel, to see; all this is nothing but to perceive.
author: David Hume

quote: When you love someone and care about them, you want what's best for them, and it's always the hardest thing to realize maybe you aren't what's best for them, how hard you try.
author: Mitski

quote: Love is friendship set on fire.
author: Jeremy Taylor

quote: I'm very happy being me, although sometimes I'd love to be a bird so that I could fly.
author: Joy Fielding

quote: I want to say a little something that's long overdue, the disrespect to women has got to be through. To all the mothers and the sisters and the wives and friends, I wanna offer my love and respect till the end.
author: Adam Yauch

quote: When you love and accept yourself, when you know who really cares about you, and when you learn from your mistakes, then you stop caring about what people who don't know you think.
author: Beyonce Knowles

quote: Money is not a motivating factor. Money doesn't thrill me or make me play better because there are benefits to being wealthy. I'm just happy with a ball at my feet. My motivation comes from playing the game I love. If I wasn't paid to be a professional footballer I would willingly play for nothing.
author: Lionel Messi

quote: As I'm getting older, I'm really learning unconditional love and loyalty are extremely important.
author: Bindi Irwin

quote: In Italy, for 30 years under the Borgias, they had warfare, terror, murder and bloodshed, but they produced Michelangelo, Leonardo da Vinci and the Renaissance. In Switzerland they had brotherly love, they had 500 years of democracy and peace - and what did that produce? The cuckoo clock.
author: Graham Greene

quote: I love having an unlimited supply of cocoa butter.
author: DJ Khaled

quote: Food, to me, is always about cooking and eating with those you love and care for.
author: David Chang

quote: A weed is no more than a flower in disguise, Which is seen through at once, if love give a man eyes.
author: James Russell Lowell

quote: I found the experience of falling in love or being in love was a death: a death of everything. You kind of watch yourself die in a wonderful way, and you experience for the briefest moment - if you see yourself for a moment through their eyes - everything you believed about yourself gone. In a death-and-rebirth sense.
author: Hozier

quote: Love is the answer, and you know that for sure; Love is a flower, you've got to let it grow.
author: John Lennon

quote: What important is man should live in righteousness, in natural love for mankind.
author: Bob Marley

quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along.
author: Rumi

quote: The planter, the farmer, the mechanic, and the laborer... form the great body of the people of the United States, they are the bone and sinew of the country men who love liberty and desire nothing but equal rights and equal laws.
author: Andrew Jackson

quote: You just have to be true to yourself and do what you love to do.
author: Mickie James

quote: Why love if losing hurts so much? I have no answers anymore; only the life I have lived. The pain now is part of the happiness then.
author: Anthony Hopkins

quote: Love is a serious mental disease.
author: Plato

quote: The Vietnamese people deeply love independence, freedom and peace. But in the face of United States aggression they have risen up, united as one man.
author: Ho Chi Minh

quote: I have learned not to worry about love; but to honor its coming with all my heart.
author: Alice Walker

quote: Neither a lofty degree of intelligence nor imagination nor both together go to the making of genius. Love, love, love, that is the soul of genius.
author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

quote: I think I am smart unless I am really, really in love, and then I am ridiculously stupid.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: And love is love in beggars and in kings.
author: Edward Dyer

quote: Love's tongue is in his eyes.
author: John Fletcher

quote: Behold, my friends, the spring is come; the earth has gladly received the embraces of the sun, and we shall soon see the results of their love!
author: Sitting Bull

quote: Pursue some path, however narrow and crooked, in which you can walk with love and reverence.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The wounds of love can only be healed by the one who made them.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: I love people who make me laugh. I honestly think it's the thing I like most, to laugh. It cures a multitude of ills. It's probably the most important thing in a person.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Never go on trips with anyone you do not love.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.
author: Rumi

quote: People love chopping wood. In this activity one immediately sees results.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Death is a challenge. It tells us not to waste time... It tells us to tell each other right now that we love each other.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Man's love is of man's life a part; it is a woman's whole existence. In her first passion, a woman loves her lover, in all the others all she loves is love.
author: Lord Byron

quote: I love making new friends and I respect people for a lot of different reasons.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: We've got this gift of love, but love is like a precious plant. You can't just accept it and leave it in the cupboard or just think it's going to get on by itself. You've got to keep watering it. You've got to really look after it and nurture it.
author: John Lennon

quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Love is never lost. If not reciprocated, it will flow back and soften and purify the heart.
author: Washington Irving

quote: The love that lasts longest is the love that is never returned.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: For true love is inexhaustible; the more you give, the more you have. And if you go to draw at the true fountainhead, the more water you draw, the more abundant is its flow.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: Love makes the time pass. Time makes love pass.
author: Euripides

quote: In the stillness of your presence, you can feel your own formless and timeless reality as the unmanifested life that animates your physical form. You can then feel the same life deep within every other human and every other creature. You look beyond the veil of form and separation. This is the realization of oneness. This is love.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Only in the agony of parting do we look into the depths of love.
author: George Eliot

quote: The garden of love is green without limit and yields many fruits other than sorrow or joy. Love is beyond either condition: without spring, without autumn, it is always fresh.
author: Rumi

quote: Men always want to be a woman's first love - women like to be a man's last romance.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Most people who end up being successful have good grades, but it's orthogonal - there's no extra information than if they put together a website and have bunch of fans who love coming and seeing what they're doing.
author: Gabe Newell

quote: If we lose love and self respect for each other, this is how we finally die.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: A man does not die of love or his liver or even of old age; he dies of being a man.
author: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: To love beauty is to see light.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Love is a trap. When it appears, we see only its light, not its shadows.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness, of hatred, of jealousy, and, most easily of all, the gate of fear.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: The love of a mother is the veil of a softer light between the heart and the heavenly Father.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: Through Love all that is bitter will be sweet, Through Love all that is copper will be gold, Through Love all dregs will become wine, through Love all pain will turn to medicine.
author: Rumi

quote: Falling in love and having a relationship are two different things.
author: Keanu Reeves

quote: Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Love is an endless mystery, for it has nothing else to explain it.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: There have to be reasons that you get up in the morning and you want to live. Why do you want to live? What's the point? What inspires you? What do you love about the future? If the future does not include being out there among the stars and being a multi-planet species, I find that incredibly depressing.
author: Elon Musk

quote: The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: I always love going home anyway; it's where my roots are. I always like to go back. It's a good reminder of where I started and the journey that I still have to go on to get where I want to be.
author: Millie Bright

quote: A coward is incapable of exhibiting love; it is the prerogative of the brave.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Love is a really scary thing, and you never know what's going to happen. It's one of the most beautiful things in life, but it's one of the most terrifying. It's worth the fear because you have more knowledge, experience, you learn from people, and you have memories.
author: Ariana Grande

quote: You gotta love livin', baby, 'cause dyin' is a pain in the ass.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: Love, hope, fear, faith - these make humanity; These are its sign and note and character.
author: Robert Browning

quote: Love is a reciprocal torture.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: Once in his life, every man is entitled to fall madly in love with a gorgeous redhead.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: Because of the dog's joyfulness, our own is increased. It is no small gift. It is not the least reason why we should honor as love the dog of our own life, and the dog down the street, and all the dogs not yet born.
author: Mary Oliver

quote: Mother's love is peace. It need not be acquired, it need not be deserved.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: The male, for all his bravado and exploration, is the loyal one, the one who generally feels love. The female is skilled at betrayal and torture and damnation.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: Dreams are the guiding words of the soul. Why should I henceforth not love my dreams and not make their riddling images into objects of my daily consideration?
author: Carl Jung

quote: Love has its own instinct, finding the way to the heart, as the feeblest insect finds the way to its flower, with a will which nothing can dismay nor turn aside.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: I love power. But it is as an artist that I love it. I love it as a musician loves his violin, to draw out its sounds and chords and harmonies.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: You have to know that as long as you love who you are - your morals, your values, that type of stuff - you're OK.
author: Nicki Minaj

quote: Our hours in love have wings; in absence, crutches.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: Doubt thou the stars are fire, Doubt that the sun doth move. Doubt truth to be a liar, But never doubt I love.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: It is not the creation of wealth that is wrong, but the love of money for its own sake.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: I love life because what more is there?
author: Anthony Hopkins

quote: All the commandments: You shall not commit adultery, you shall not kill, you shall not steal, you shall not covet, and so on, are summed up in this single command: You must love your neighbor as yourself.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: He that is jealous is not in love.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Before we went on any protest, whether it was sit-ins or the freedom rides or any march, we prepared ourselves, and we were disciplined. We were committed to the way of peace - the way of non-violence - the way of love - the way of life as the way of living.
author: John Lewis

quote: Love begins by taking care of the closest ones - the ones at home.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: It is best to love wisely, no doubt; but to love foolishly is better than not to be able to love at all.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: If you have only one smile in you give it to the people you love.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Love and dignity cannot share the same abode.
author: Ovid

quote: Knowledge is love and light and vision.
author: Helen Keller

quote: For those who love, nothing is too difficult, especially when it is done for the love of our Lord Jesus Christ.
author: Saint Ignatius

quote: I think the biggest disease the world suffers from in this day and age is the disease of people feeling unloved. I know that I can give love for a minute, for half an hour, for a day, for a month, but I can give. I am very happy to do that, I want to do that.
author: Princess Diana

quote: Love and work are the cornerstones of our humanness.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: This is the miracle that happens every time to those who really love: the more they give, the more they possess.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: As we grow in our consciousness, there will be more compassion and more love, and then the barriers between people, between religions, between nations will begin to fall. Yes, we have to beat down the separateness.
author: Ram Dass

quote: I know of only one duty, and that is to love.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Love does not claim possession, but gives freedom.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: No better way is there to learn to love Nature than to understand Art. It dignifies every flower of the field. And, the boy who sees the thing of beauty which a bird on the wing becomes when transferred to wood or canvas will probably not throw the customary stone.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Love sought is good, but given unsought, is better.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: The love of the family, the love of one person can heal. It heals the scars left by a larger society. A massive, powerful society.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I refuse to accept the view that mankind is so tragically bound to the starless midnight of racism and war that the bright daybreak of peace and brotherhood can never become a reality... I believe that unarmed truth and unconditional love will have the final word.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: The love of economy is the root of all virtue.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: I love not man the less, but Nature more.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Intense love does not measure, it just gives.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: No one is a friend to his friend who does not love in return.
author: Plato

quote: Man's nature is not essentially evil. Brute nature has been known to yield to the influence of love. You must never despair of human nature.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: A man can be happy with any woman, as long as he does not love her.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: If any person wish to be idle, let them fall in love.
author: Ovid

quote: Let us not be satisfied with just giving money. Money is not enough, money can be got, but they need your hearts to love them. So, spread your love everywhere you go.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: The metaphor for Palestine is stronger than the Palestine of reality.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: Without hope we are lost.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: I don't decide to represent anything except myself. But that self is full of collective memory.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: A person can only be born in one place. However, he may die several times elsewhere: in the exiles and prisons, and in a homeland transformed by the occupation and oppression into a nightmare.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: Sarcasm helps me overcome the harshness of the reality we live, eases the pain of scars and makes people smile.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: History laughs at both the victim and the aggressor.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: The Palestinians are the only nation in the world that feels with certainty that today is better than what the days ahead will hold. Tomorrow always heralds a worse situation.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: Poetry and beauty are always making peace. When you read something beautiful you find coexistence; it breaks walls down.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: Palestinian people are in love with life.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: Exile is more than a geographical concept. You can be an exile in your homeland, in your own house, in a room.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: Against barbarity, poetry can resist only by confirming its attachment to human fragility like a blade of grass growing on a wall while armies march by.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: Nothing, nothing justifies terrorism.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: I am not a lover of Israel, of course. I have no reason to be. But I don't hate Jews.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: I've built my homeland, I've even founded my state - in my language.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: Sometimes I feel as if I am read before I write. When I write a poem about my mother, Palestinians think my mother is a symbol for Palestine. But I write as a poet, and my mother is my mother. She's not a symbol.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: I see poetry as spiritual medicine.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: The importance of poetry is not measured, finally, by what the poet says but by how he says it.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: When I passed the age of 50, I learned how to control my emotions.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: I believe in the power of poetry, which gives me reasons to look ahead and identify a glint of light.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: When a writer declares that his first book is his best, that is bad. I progress successively from book to book.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: I never wanted children; maybe I'm afraid of responsibility.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: The Arabs are ready to accept a strong Israel with nuclear arms - all it has to do is open the gates of its fortress and make peace.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: To be under occupation, to be under siege, is not a good inspiration for poetry.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: Some people ask, 'How do you attract the young and so many different people when your poetry is complicated and different?' I say, 'My accomplishment is that my readers trust me and accept my suggestions for change.'
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: For the Arabs in Israel there is always a tension between nationality and identity.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: It's not the size of the dog in the fight, it's the size of the fight in the dog.
author: Mark Twain

quote: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
author: Mark Twain

quote: If it's your job to eat a frog, it's best to do it first thing in the morning. And If it's your job to eat two frogs, it's best to eat the biggest one first.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Get your facts first, then you can distort them as you please.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Suppose you were an idiot, and suppose you were a member of Congress; but I repeat myself.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Patriotism is supporting your country all the time, and your government when it deserves it.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Do the right thing. It will gratify some people and astonish the rest.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Buy land, they're not making it anymore.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The lack of money is the root of all evil.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Never put off till tomorrow what you can do the day after tomorrow.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Denial ain't just a river in Egypt.
author: Mark Twain

quote: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
author: Mark Twain

quote: It ain't those parts of the Bible that I can't understand that bother me, it is the parts that I do understand.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I can live for two months on a good compliment.
author: Mark Twain

quote: When you fish for love, bait with your heart, not your brain.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The reports of my death have been greatly exaggerated.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Don't let schooling interfere with your education.
author: Mark Twain

quote: It usually takes me more than three weeks to prepare a good impromptu speech.
author: Mark Twain

quote: There are lies, damned lies and statistics.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Giving up smoking is the easiest thing in the world. I know because I've done it thousands of times.
author: Mark Twain

quote: My mother had a great deal of trouble with me, but I think she enjoyed it.
author: Mark Twain

quote: There are people who can do all fine and heroic things but one - keep from telling their happiness to the unhappy.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Wrinkles should merely indicate where smiles have been.
author: Mark Twain

quote: It is curious that physical courage should be so common in the world and moral courage so rare.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Cauliflower is nothing but cabbage with a college education.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Let us endeavor so to live so that when we come to die even the undertaker will be sorry.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Clothes make the man. Naked people have little or no influence on society.
author: Mark Twain

quote: It's no wonder that truth is stranger than fiction. Fiction has to make sense.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I didn't attend the funeral, but I sent a nice letter saying I approved of it.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The main difference between a cat and a lie is that a cat only has nine lives.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Everything has its limit - iron ore cannot be educated into gold.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Only one thing is impossible for God: To find any sense in any copyright law on the planet.
author: Mark Twain

quote: But who prays for Satan? Who, in eighteen centuries, has had the common humanity to pray for the one sinner that needed it most?
author: Mark Twain

quote: Under certain circumstances, urgent circumstances, desperate circumstances, profanity provides a relief denied even to prayer.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I never smoke to excess - that is, I smoke in moderation, only one cigar at a time.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Only kings, presidents, editors, and people with tapeworms have the right to use the editorial 'we.'
author: Mark Twain

quote: Facts are stubborn, but statistics are more pliable.
author: Mark Twain

quote: It is easier to stay out than get out.
author: Mark Twain

quote: No sinner is ever saved after the first twenty minutes of a sermon.
author: Mark Twain

quote: It were not best that we should all think alike; it is difference of opinion that makes horse races.
author: Mark Twain

quote: In the Spring, I have counted 136 different kinds of weather inside of 24 hours.
author: Mark Twain

quote: If you hold a cat by the tail you learn things you cannot learn any other way.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The man who does not read good books has no advantage over the man who cannot read them.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Honesty is the best policy - when there is money in it.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Loyalty to the Nation all the time, loyalty to the Government when it deserves it.
author: Mark Twain

quote: When we remember we are all mad, the mysteries disappear and life stands explained.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Apparently there is nothing that cannot happen today.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Often it does seem such a pity that Noah and his party did not miss the boat.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Man will do many things to get himself loved, he will do all things to get himself envied.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The finest clothing made is a person's own skin, but, of course, society demands something more than this.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The human race is a race of cowards; and I am not only marching in that procession but carrying a banner.
author: Mark Twain

quote: If man could be crossed with the cat it would improve man, but deteriorate the cat.
author: Mark Twain

quote: To be good is noble; but to show others how to be good is nobler and no trouble.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Familiarity breeds contempt - and children.
author: Mark Twain

quote: It is better to take what does not belong to you than to let it lie around neglected.
author: Mark Twain
