quote: It's sad that you don't see drivers being real people.
author: Jacques Villeneuve

quote: Fear of carbs, of gluten, of everything - we've distanced ourselves from the beauty of food, the art of it. It makes me sad when people say, 'Oh, I don't eat gluten. I don't eat cheese. I don't eat this. So I eat cardboard.'
author: Olivia Wilde

quote: I think that the Information Age is great, but there's a downside to it obviously as well, and it's that false information can be perpetuated so quickly. And it's sad that so many people will believe it.
author: Josh Hopkins

quote: I was sad that Corpse Bride was so short. I would've liked to have had her around for way longer. She doesn't actually have that many scenes.
author: Helena Bonham Carter

quote: It is very sad for a man to make himself servant to a single thing; his manhood all taken out of him by the hydraulic pressure of excessive business.
author: Theodore Parker

quote: I find America falling in love with a TV show flattering and interesting, but at the same time a little sad.
author: David Schwimmer

quote: Acting gave me the opportunity to do outrageous things. It allowed me to be sad, happy, angry and lustful, even if it was just vicariously.
author: Joan Allen

quote: It's sad and upsetting when you see somebody crying hysterically, but at the same time it's real funny.
author: Seth Green

quote: Our hope, and it's a sad hope, is that... well, I mean we need a tip. That's why we have such a big reward. We just hope that someone is holding her for her child and that we can, you know, get her back with a tip.
author: Scott Peterson

quote: Sad old blokes, I'm told, now dream of me with a whip in hand.
author: Anne Robinson

quote: It's sad that the most glorious of sexual experiences can make us feel guilty, ashamed, embarrassed, and abnormal.
author: Sue Johanson

quote: This was an important part of my life. But it was also sad that we didn't play there, cause we had such alot of fans that were waiting for us and Brazilians are great people. It's now my second home.
author: Jim Capaldi

quote: It's a sad day when the leaders of the free world engage in such deception and trickery. I voted against this unnecessary war and will continue to argue that the best way to support our troops is to bring them home.
author: Major Owens

quote: The books are funny and sad, and that's what people respond to.
author: Paula Danziger

quote: In a sad twist of fate, the bill to reauthorize the Patriot Act was debated on the floor of the House of Representatives the same day that terrorists struck again.
author: Jim Sensenbrenner

quote: It's sad - it's sad for us old enough to remember when directors ruled, and films were substantially better than they are today. But it's hard to argue with those kinds of grosses.
author: Mark Rydell

quote: Wrap parties can be really sad, actually, disorienting.
author: Josh Lucas

quote: When I was in Philadelphia during the Depression in 1930 or '31, I got a very sad job as a night watchman in a garage. The cars in the garage had been abandoned by their owners, since they had lost their jobs and couldn't keep up the payments.
author: Tom Glazer

quote: I am not a sad clown. I am not a sad clown.
author: Nathan Lane

quote: Even modern English people are imperious, superior, ridden by class. All of the hypocrisy and the difficulties that are endemic in being British also make it an incredibly fertile place culturally. A brilliant place to live. Sad but true.
author: Pete Townshend

quote: Someone once accused me of being like Eliot Ness. I sad no sir, I'm not E.N., but I can promise you that I'm not Al Capone!
author: Robert Stack

quote: What I am sad about is that there is now, in America, no equivalent to the art circuit.
author: Richard Attenborough

quote: People say you should read your criticism because it will make you a better person but it doesn't. It just makes you a sad bitter old showbiz nightmare.
author: Jo Brand

quote: Just because I'm talking about something that might have been a sad or painful situation doesn't mean that I'm sad or tortured 24 hours a day any more than anybody else is.
author: Lucinda Williams

quote: All he cares about is going out there with his Jack Daniels bottle. Nothing has changed. That's kind of sad. If David was doing better than he used to be, then that would be different. But it was a joke and he made it that way.
author: Sammy Hagar

quote: Elaine is just in pain. I think Elaine has become very, very sad woman. She is someone who is in deep need of many hours of analysis and I like to think that I'm not that type of person.
author: Julia Louis-Dreyfus

quote: However, we might oppose it, abortion is a sad feature of modern life.
author: Robert Casey

quote: I recently turned down a film that I didn't want my kids to see. Priorities shift. Sometimes I'm sad about that, but not enough to do anything about it.
author: Dianne Wiest

quote: Well, I did Marlene 15 years ago and that's in the style. It's somehow similar and not similar because Marlene was much more aggressive, funny and sad.
author: Maximilian Schell

quote: Our family has gone through a very difficult time. My husband and I have taken the brunt of it. I've never known what it truly felt like to be so sad and desperate inside.
author: Tracey Gold

quote: I love New York. I was sad, depressed and incredibly moved by our fellow countrymen and what they've done. I wanted to give people a chance to see something funny, have a distraction.
author: Ben Stiller

quote: I was sad to see anybody leave, we had a very nice family on that show. I was very sad to see momma go, Victoria and especially Linda. My god that was my wife on the show, in fact my wife calls her wife.
author: Larry Hagman

quote: I don't know how the poor farmers deal with such situations in real life. It's really sad.
author: Sanjay Dutt

quote: And it's sad because it's like a surprise to people - almost an anomaly - when artists are actually refined and trained on an instrument. That's the last thing people think about.
author: Vanessa Carlton

quote: But now Americans, they felt a sense of peace and protection because they've been separated by so many thousands of miles of ocean. And you know, the fact that it's come to the U.S. like this is so sad, and yet you know, what can you do? It's here.
author: Patty Hearst

quote: There is the glamour side of it, which allows you to meet great variety of people with whom you simply can have a good time, but there's also the sad side of it that drags you into a superficial and artificial world.
author: Karolina Kurkova

quote: I love playing football, being out on the pitch with a ball, and I will be a little sad when that ends.
author: Dennis Bergkamp

quote: There's all this stuff that is happening in Edinburgh now, it's a sad attempt to create an Edinburgh society, similar to a London society, a highbrow literature celebrity society.
author: Irvine Welsh

quote: I think that's very sad, that I haven't allowed my heart to be broken. I have broken a few.
author: Sally Field

quote: The sad events that occur in my life are the sad events that happen to everybody, with losing friends and family, but that is a natural occurrence, as natural as being born.
author: Sergio Aragones

quote: Dwight is a sad clown. You've seen those paintings of sad clown.
author: Rainn Wilson

quote: You had to be into sport and, sad to say, I'm a traitor to my country because I don't have a sporting bone in my body.
author: Geoffrey Rush

quote: It's sad that women characters have lost so much ground in popular movies. Didn't 'Thelma and Louise' prove that women want to see women doing things on film? Thelma and Louise were in a classic car; they were being chased by cops; they shot up a truck - and women loved it.
author: Robin Quivers

quote: Nolan has the strangest affect on people. You know, I think there's something very sad and little boy about him, but at the same time the way he goes about everything is so awkward and obnoxious. He can never say the right thing, you know? And I think if he just didn't try so hard and calmed down, people might actually like him a bit more!
author: Gabriel Mann

quote: I think as an American society, when we're paying too many taxes or dealing with war, we don't want to see sad things at the movies.
author: Zoe Saldana

quote: I once made the mistake of going for a whole row of false eyelashes, which was just wrong as it gave me a sad, puppy-eyed look.
author: Sienna Miller

quote: In Mississippi, you don't admit that you're gay. It's just an awkward thing down South, which is sad.
author: Lance Bass

quote: The attacks on the World Trade Center and the Pentagon shook our nation to the core. Americans were deeply frightened, sad, and angry, and they rallied around a President who, at the time, showed impressive certitude and calm.
author: Eliot Spitzer

quote: 'Vegas' was something very close to me. I had such a blast doing that. I'm still a little upset that we never really got to shoot that final episode. So many people were invested in it. I'll always be sad about that.
author: Josh Duhamel

quote: I was a very good girl for a long time, that's what really drew me to acting. The stage was the perfect place to be outrageous, to be sad, to be angry, to be all these different things.
author: Joan Allen

quote: War is very sad and small life is pathetically fragile at times.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: I am co-writing a screenplay now and I'm working on the rights to another story I want to do. So I plan to produce and direct. So, for me, I don't really feel that I am vulnerable to that sad baggage that comes with the business of filmmaking.
author: Kerry Washington

quote: I've traveled around the country and I read local newspapers and all of that, and it's a sad, sad thing to go from city to city and see the small newspapers and they're tiny. They're tiny not only in size but also in scope.
author: Jim Lehrer

quote: I think it's sad that movies and television have caused the theatre to fade as a popular art form. I hope to get young people into the theatre and expose them to Shakespeare.
author: Kelly McGillis

quote: I find it amusing on one level, poignant on another, when people try to get recognition from an outside source. It's sad.
author: Grace Slick

quote: The sad truth is that the civil rights movement cannot be reborn until we identify the causes of black suffering, some of them self-inflicted. Why can't black leaders organize rallies around responsible sexuality, birth within marriage, parents reading to their children and students staying in school and doing homework?
author: Henry Louis Gates

quote: Of course it's true: the public want to see young people - young people are the people who go to the cinema. It's a sad fact of life, but you've got to accept it and not whine about it.
author: Joan Collins

quote: The funny thing is I'm not bothered or sad about being on my own - after all I've never had a husband.
author: Francesca Annis

quote: I'm convinced I got signed because of who I am. And it makes me sad.
author: Jeff Buckley

quote: You can't have an up without a down, a right without a left, a back without a front - or a happy without a sad.
author: Harlan Coben

quote: I'm not sad about any of my life. It's so unconventional. It doesn't look anything like I thought it would.
author: Edie Falco

quote: Nowadays you really have to pump out that blockbuster in order to have the luxury of getting a body of work, and that's sad because the work suffers. Today everything is based on money. The older actors, they inspire me.
author: Dylan McDermott

quote: You know, why at the end of your life should you assemble thousands of pages of 'Why am I so sad, why am I so depressed?' Instead, assemble thousands of pages of why you're so content.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: With my schedule being so crazy, I can't call every day or hang out with my friends like I used to and that's definitely sad.
author: Jordin Sparks

quote: A sad fact of life lately at the Museum of Modern Art is that when it comes to group shows of contemporary painting from the collection, the bar has been set pretty low.
author: Jerry Saltz

quote: I probably have the worst wardrobe. It's the most ill-fitting with the worst patterns and colors and the most nipple rubbage. There's bad chafing, and it's always tight in all the wrong places. What's sad is that I'm kinda getting used to it.
author: Josh Hopkins

quote: I try to make an album that reflects what I love about country music. It's not just all about happy parties all the time. There are some sad songs.
author: Dierks Bentley

quote: My experience, with both my parents, is that grief has a lot of down, sad things, but I was also really emotionally raw, in the first year after each of them passed. Flowers smelled more intensely, my relationships were hotter, and I was more willing to risk. I was going for it a lot more. I was 'unsober' and I wasn't playing by my rules.
author: Mike Mills

quote: 'I Know You Care' is about my dad. And I haven't seen him for a long, long time. And my parents divorced when I was really young. And I guess I just wanted a - it was my way of saying that I wasn't bitter or angry anymore. I was just sad and just felt like something was missing.
author: Ellie Goulding

quote: You know, the sad thing of post-9/11, which was of course horrific, was that the city in which I felt completely at home for two decades, suddenly people like us - brown people - were looked at as the 'Others.'
author: Mira Nair

quote: The delta blues is a low-down, dirty shame blues. It's a sad, big wide sound, something to make you think about people who are dead or the women who left you.
author: David Edwards

quote: I'm a sucker for sad disco pop.
author: Sophie Ellis-Bextor

quote: New diseases like SARS and bird flu cause anxiety in the community. People get worried, some to the extent that it even affects their health. You feel very sad, and yet you must carry on and maintain your cool in very trying and difficult moments. You have to tough it out.
author: Margaret Chan

quote: Even today, England is a very repressed, repressive country, and there's pressure to be kind of a certain way, so people do things that ultimately make them sad.
author: Ben Whishaw

quote: It makes me sad that corporations and media and Hollywood conspire to make people feel terrible about their bodies from the second they wake up, so I sort of try to subversively undercut that.
author: Rob Delaney

quote: I grew up in Chillum Heights in the Washington, D.C. area., and it was never a garden spot. When guys go, 'Hey, when I grew up, my neighborhood was tough, and it was this and that'... the reality is that it was just a terribly sad place. And thank God, I was able to escape it.
author: Jonathan Banks

quote: I am essentially optimistic. Being alive is incredible. Life is extraordinary and beautiful. It can be hard and sad and terrifying, but it's all we've got.
author: James Frey

quote: With Facebook, you're not really allowed to be unhappy. Think about it: There's only a like button. Yes, you can be angry, but it's only lighthearted rage. On Reddit, perhaps because you can be anonymous, people are willing to be openly sad or angry. They are more honest.
author: Yishan Wong

quote: Poetry, I think, intensifies the reader's experience. If it's a humorous facet of the story, poetry makes it more exuberant. If it's a sad facet, poetry can make it more poignant.
author: Vikram Seth

quote: Being single is only sad if you have a problem with your own company. I'm content with mine.
author: Olga Kurylenko

quote: I think, honestly, that a lot of people think I'm sad and dark all the time, because of the music I have made. But there's a huge part of my personality that's really energetic, outgoing and goofy.
author: Skylar Grey

quote: When I was growing up, albums were my closest friends, as sad as that may sound - Joy Division's 'Closer,' or Echo and the Bunnymen's 'Heaven Up Here'... I had a more intimate relationship with those records than I did with most of the people in my life.
author: Moby

quote: I wish I could wear 10 dresses to my wedding. It's so sad that you put it in storage and then never see it again. I am going to sleep in mine after I wear it.
author: Eva Longoria

quote: I get kind of sad when I look at all of my magazines and think about how at one time I was much more impressed with a certain fashion editorial, or how I feel like I can't really relate to being that excited about fashion anymore. Maybe it's being jaded, but I honestly like that now, when something's really good, I feel more affected by it.
author: Tavi Gevinson

quote: There's a rule of writing: if everything is funny, nothing is funny; if everything is sad, nothing is sad. You want that contrast.
author: J. Michael Straczynski

quote: When you think about such fine actors as Maggie Smith or Michael Gambon, they do all mediums. I think it would be quite sad and a bit dull just to have to stick to one. I like all of them.
author: Keeley Hawes

quote: I took a couple of classes in clowning, but that was more like Lucille Ball kind of slapstick, not Ringling Brothers. But we had to do things silently, and the teacher would do this running commentary. 'Does this make Clown sad? Oh, Clown doesn't like that, does Clown?' Always 'Clown.' Never a name.
author: June Diane Raphael

quote: I've always been fascinated by Elizabeth Taylor, and I had read that her first kiss happened on a film set, which actually made me a little sad. You need to have normal experiences of your own.
author: Emma Watson

quote: I honestly think I was an Indian living in the time of the Trail of Tears. Something like that. Every time I read books about back then, I get so devastatingly sad, so, so... I feel such a deep connection to it.
author: Q'orianka Kilcher

quote: I'm not tired of who I am. That would be sad!
author: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: I've found that people feel very free to say insulting things, not about me personally, but about the things I believe. It's sad, because I really could care less where people are coming from, politically, religiously.
author: Patricia Heaton

quote: I just want fans to walk away knowing that no matter what's going on, no matter how happy you are, no matter how sad you are, we did it. We're strong in this. We've come a long way, and life is not just one thing.
author: Mary J. Blige

quote: It doesn't matter if you're sad or hung-over or lazy or tired - a workout will get your endorphins pumping, and you'll feel like a new person almost instantly.
author: Rachel Nichols

quote: When I was a young girl, I lost a lot of weight over one summer - involuntarily - and was just really depressed and sad. There was nothing I could do to gain weight. I would look in the mirror and call myself disgusting every day.
author: Tyra Banks

quote: Humor comes in all forms, and everyone has their cup of tea about what makes them laugh. But the day we censor humor is a sad one for sure.
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: I'm not going to do a song that's really sad and thoughtful. Although I've done ballads like 'Dear Darlin',' I want to make them dance and be happy.
author: Olly Murs

quote: It sounds so nerdy and pathetic, but what I always do on Sunday afternoon is bring my inbox down to zero, which is so sad. But e-mail has become like homework for adults. I'll have 141 messages from people who will be offended if I don't write back.
author: Mike Birbiglia

quote: You get people who come to London, sever links with where they come from, and then when they need people, there's nobody there. To feel like you can't go back home would be a horribly sad place to be, as is mistaking fame for genuine love and affection.
author: Johnny Vegas

quote: The sad fact is that spending rises every year, no matter what people want or say they want.
author: Ben Stein

quote: People tend to put entertainers on pedestals. We're human beings, just like you. You may see us smiling, and whether we have money or not, we still have bills to pay, we still have our stresses. I think a lot of people want to focus on others' shortcomings to make themselves feel better. And it's a very sad thing.
author: Janet Jackson

quote: There is the melancholy of Europe. There is the romantic malaise. Feeling sad is almost a form of deepness.
author: Mathieu Amalric

quote: 'm really proud of 'Sad, Sad World' because it manages to state a very complex paradox of an emotion that I experienced when I had children, which is this great happiness and this great intensity, but with that intensity comes a deeper understanding of the world.
author: Jamie Cullum

quote: I am very sad that some designers are still using real fur when the fake alternatives are so effective and so easily obtainable.
author: Twiggy

quote: The history of apartheid-era South Africa is incredibly sad and at times infuriatingly incomprehensible.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: Life is sad. People, you know, are going to pass, and you know that you will one day.
author: James Mercer

quote: In the 1970s, British food was beginning to get good, whereas in France it was just starting its long, sad decline. My most memorable meals, however, have been in Italy.
author: Sebastian Faulks

quote: If some people try to make a prenup into a pre-negotiation of a divorce... Well, that's really sad. But I do think that it's important to understand what each person has coming into the relationship, and what each person expects from the relationship. They aren't always fun discussions to have, and they can be very eye-opening.
author: Laura Wasser

quote: I write entirely in English; Tagalog chauvinists chide me for this. I feel no guilt in doing so. But I am sad that I cannot write in my native Ilokano. History demanded this; if it isn't English I am using now, I would most probably be writing in Spanish like Rizal, or even German or Japanese.
author: F. Sionil Jose

quote: Over a 10-year period, 99 out of 100 new entrepreneurs will fail. Only one will be left standing as others get pushed out of the market or burn out from working so hard. It's really sad.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: I think people tend to forget that as celebrities we are still human. We have the same emotions - we cry, we have fun, we laugh, we get sad, and we get hurt. When something is written about you, which millions of people are reading, and it is not true, imagine how hurtful it can be.
author: Sania Mirza

quote: Every day, when I am working with my boys, I tell them as long as you put in your best efforts, I am there to back you. But the day I find your energy flagging on the field, the day I find you have not put in your best, that's when I will be really upset and sad.
author: Nita Ambani

quote: It's a sad thing to contemplate, but I'm the last surviving cast member of 'The African Queen.'
author: Theodore Bikel

quote: The baby boomer surge is forcing society to face decisions about costs - and particularly what is valuable. It's senseless for clinicians and governments to bear these choices alone; a sad effect of needless paternalism is that it places a false burden on responsible people.
author: Dave deBronkart

quote: You start to fall in love with characters as you work with them, and anytime that you care about your characters and you realize that you're gonna have to kill them, that fear creeps in. It's sad. It's scary, and it's also sad. Because you like these people.
author: Drew Goddard

quote: It's so sad to see how few people in the Obama administration have any private sector experience.
author: Foster Friess

quote: Nothing in life is so exhilarating as to be shot at without result.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: If you want to shine like a sun, first burn like a sun.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: If you have a garden and a library, you have everything you need.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: I began revolution with 82 men. If I had to do it again, I do it with 10 or 15 and absolute faith. It does not matter how small you are if you have faith and plan of action.
author: Fidel Castro

quote: Cooperation and respect for each other will advance the cause of human rights worldwide. Confrontation, vilification, and double standards will not.
author: Robert Mugabe

quote: There cannot be a crisis next week. My schedule is already full.
author: Henry Kissinger

quote: To the nameless and unsung heroes of our freedom struggle, we offer our humble tribute. Their life-blood nourishes the body of independent India.
author: Rajiv Gandhi

quote: Anyone who doesn't believe in miracles is not a realist.
author: David Ben-Gurion

quote: Throughout history, it has been the inaction of those who could have acted; the indifference of those who should have known better; the silence of the voice of justice when it mattered most; that has made it possible for evil to triumph.
author: Haile Selassie

quote: You cannot shake hands with a clenched fist.
author: Indira Gandhi

quote: Remember that you are an Englishman, and have consequently won first prize in the lottery of life.
author: Cecil Rhodes

quote: Knowledge is power. Information is liberating. Education is the premise of progress, in every society, in every family.
author: Kofi Annan

quote: Through hard work and education, we can deliver a strong economy and opportunity for all.
author: Julia Gillard

quote: The world will always need revolution. That doesn't mean shooting and violence. A revolution is when you change your thinking. Confucianism and Christianity were both revolutionary.
author: Jose Mujica

quote: The Constitution of the United States was made not merely for the generation that then existed, but for posterity- unlimited, undefined, endless, perpetual posterity.
author: Henry Clay

quote: The problem is to keep the monkey mind from running off into all kinds of thoughts.
author: Lee Kuan Yew

quote: Know the true value of time; snatch, seize, and enjoy every moment of it. No idleness, no laziness, no procrastination: never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.
author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quote: Small opportunities are often the beginning of great enterprises.
author: Demosthenes

quote: We must all build national unity, build all revolutionary forces, into one powerful wave to sweep away our main enemy, political imperialism and economic imperialism.
author: Sukarno

quote: Many of our own people here in this country do not ask about computers, telephones and television sets. They ask - when will we get a road to our village.
author: Thabo Mbeki

quote: The things which are most important don't always scream the loudest.
author: Bob Hawke

quote: A man must live like a great brilliant flame and burn as brightly as he can. In the end he burns out. But this is far better than a mean little flame.
author: Boris Yeltsin

quote: In looking back, I see nothing to regret and little to correct.
author: John C. Calhoun

quote: The secret of our success is that we never, never give up.
author: Wilma Mankiller

quote: The power of one, if fearless and focused, is formidable, but the power of many working together is better.
author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo

quote: When virtue and modesty enlighten her charms, the lustre of a beautiful woman is brighter than the stars of heaven, and the influence of her power it is in vain to resist.
author: Akhenaton

quote: Unity and secularism will be the motto of the government. We can't afford divisive polity in India.
author: Manmohan Singh

quote: Some friends of Israel believe that the Palestinians will never, in their hearts, accept a Jewish state in Palestine. Yet Germans and French, Chinese and Japanese, Mexicans and Americans have overcome their once insurmountable differences. Palestinians and Jews also have much to gain from peaceful coexistence.
author: Antony Blinken

quote: I devoted myself to the task of welfare of my countrymen - not as a ruler but as a servant.
author: Sheikh Hasina

quote: They made us many promises, more than I can remember, but they never kept but one; they promised to take our land, and they took it.
author: Red Cloud

quote: There can be hope only for a society which acts as one big family, not as many separate ones.
author: Anwar Sadat

quote: There cannot be enduring peace, prosperity, equality and brotherhood in this world if our aims are so separate and divergent, if we do not accept that in the end we are people, all alike, sharing the Earth among ourselves and also with other sentient beings, all of whom have an equal role and stake in the state of this planet and its players.
author: Jigme Khesar Namgyel Wangchuck

quote: Whatever else may divide us, Europe is our common home; a common fate has linked us through the centuries, and it continues to link us today.
author: Leonid I. Brezhnev

quote: Don't be afraid to take a big step if one is indicated. You can't cross a chasm in two small jumps.
author: David Lloyd George

quote: If one commits the act of sodomy with a cow, an ewe, or a camel, their urine and their excrements become impure, and even their milk may no longer be consumed. The animal must then be killed and as quickly as possible and burned.
author: Ruhollah Khomeini

quote: A man loses contact with reality if he is not surrounded by his books.
author: Francois Mitterrand

quote: Nature is something outside our body, but the mind is within us.
author: Bhumibol Adulyadej

quote: The biggest room in the world is the room for improvement.
author: Helmut Schmidt

quote: Instead of a man of peace and love, I have become a man of violence and revenge.
author: Hiawatha

quote: The issue of human rights is one of the most fundamental human issues and also one of the most sensitive and controversial.
author: Ali Khamenei

quote: If slavery, limited as it yet is, now threatens to subvert the Constitution, how can we as wise and prudent statesmen, enlarge its boundaries and increase its influence, and thus increase already impending dangers?
author: William H. Seward

quote: But I must think that an address to his majesty to remove one of his servants, without so much as alleging any particular crime against him, is one of the greatest encroachments that was ever made upon the prerogatives of the crown.
author: Robert Walpole

quote: We are not final because we are infallible, but we are infallible only because we are final.
author: Robert Jackson

quote: You won't hear from me again.
author: Nicolas Sarkozy

quote: There are three roads to ruin; women, gambling and technicians. The most pleasant is with women, the quickest is with gambling, but the surest is with technicians.
author: Georges Pompidou

quote: We have forgotten that we have not come to an empty land to inherit it, but we have come to conquer a country from people inhabiting it, that governs it by the virtue of its language and savage culture.
author: Moshe Sharett

quote: If Egypt is unstable, then the entire region is unstable.
author: Abdel Fattah al-Sisi

quote: I belong to everybody, and I belong to nobody.
author: Muhammadu Buhari

quote: I think money laundering is giving oxygen to organized crime.
author: Enrique Pena Nieto

quote: Canada is the homeland of equality, justice and tolerance.
author: Kim Campbell

quote: Fraternity without absorption, union without fusion.
author: Wilfrid Laurier

quote: Responsible statesmen have only one choice - to do everything possible to prevent a nuclear catastrophe. Any other position is short-sighted; more so, it is suicidal.
author: Yuri Andropov

quote: The game is not lost - or won - until the last bell goes.
author: John Curtin

quote: As people grow up and they want more freedom, it's on an individual basis, children want to have more freedom, you've got to allow that, so how do you balance it. I would say let it evolve, move as quickly or slowly as people would like to move.
author: Goh Chok Tong

quote: Men may be popular without being ambitious, but there is hardly an ambitious man who does not try to be popular.
author: Lord North

quote: Terrorism is contempt for human dignity.
author: Kjell Magne Bondevik

quote: When I became prime minister last September, I promised the Japanese people that I would not tolerate the politics of indecision. A propensity to delay difficult and weighty decisions has been hurting our country. It is detrimental to our economy, society and future, and it cannot be allowed to continue.
author: Yoshihiko Noda

quote: We shall all respect the principles of each other and do nothing that would be regarded as an act of oppression to any portion of the people.
author: Alexander Mackenzie

quote: The lessons of the past should steer us towards ensuring lasting legacies for generations yet to be born.
author: Hun Sen

quote: If geography is prose, maps are iconography.
author: Lennart Meri

quote: A library is thought in cold storage.
author: Herbert Samuel

quote: Religion is the solid basis of good morals; therefore education should teach the precepts of religion, and the duties of man toward God.
author: Gouverneur Morris

quote: Lotteries, a tax upon imbeciles.
author: Camillo di Cavour

quote: My time is now.
author: John Turner

quote: And I said, yes, if you think that I avoid bloodshed by standing aside, then I will stand aside.
author: Kamisese Mara

quote: I was not chosen to be president to restore capitalism to Cuba. I was elected to defend, maintain and continue to perfect socialism, not destroy it.
author: Raul Castro

quote: Indecision and delays are the parents of failure.
author: George Canning

quote: Give me a woman who loves beer and I will conquer the world.
author: Kaiser Wilhelm

quote: We regard America and Europe as old friends. We keep old friends, but we make new friends in Japan, India, and China.
author: Olusegun Obasanjo

quote: I understand the protests, but not the shooting and the attempts to bring down the state. We cannot allow hatred to control our lives. We must remain unified to defeat this evil.
author: Boris Trajkovski

quote: There is an idea of democracy produced by one-sided thinking.
author: Omar Bongo

quote: Poverty doesn't imply necessarily violence.
author: Alberto Fujimori

quote: We want to lead a country where people will be less greedy. Where people will know that the commonwealth of Nigeria belongs to all Nigerians, where people's wealth depends on the people around you. If you become a rich person and everyone around you is poor you are very poor.
author: Goodluck Jonathan

quote: Peace is a fragile thing. It takes courage to secure it. It takes wisdom to maintain it.
author: Jenny Shipley

quote: When people talk to me about tyranny, it makes me laugh and gives me the impression that people suffer from amnesia.
author: Jean-Claude Duvalier

quote: All too many Muslims fail to grasp Islam, which teaches one to be lenient towards others and to understand their value systems, knowing that these are tolerated by Islam as a religion.
author: Abdurrahman Wahid

quote: What is the Geneva Convention on wars! I have never read it.
author: Yoweri Museveni

quote: If one suffers we all suffer. Togetherness is strength. Courage.
author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

quote: Education, particularly higher education, will take Africa into the mainstream of globalization.
author: John Agyekum Kufuor

quote: I never call it an insurgency. I call it terrorism.
author: Hamid Karzai

quote: Education is a better safeguard of liberty than a standing army.
author: Edward Everett

quote: We must create a kind of globalization that works for everyone... and not just for a few.
author: Nestor Kirchner

quote: Democracy must be built through open societies that share information. When there is information, there is enlightenment. When there is debate, there are solutions. When there is no sharing of power, no rule of law, no accountability, there is abuse, corruption, subjugation and indignation.
author: Atifete Jahjaga

quote: I hope the fathers and mothers of little girls will look at them and say 'yes, women can.'
author: Dilma Rousseff

quote: I was always confident that I knew. I never expected this.
author: Alfredo Stroessner

quote: I cannot accept a divide between Malagasy people and a civil war.
author: Andry Rajoelina

quote: Appeasement was never a very clever policy, and it should not be our option today.
author: Jose Maria Aznar

quote: For then only will you be strong, when you cherish the laws, and when the revolutionary attempts of lawless men shall have ceased.
author: Aeschines

quote: In the past, Japan through its colonial rule and aggression caused tremendous damage and suffering for the people of many countries, particularly those of Asian nations.
author: Junichiro Koizumi

quote: Let us face it: in the world today, money and economic strength remain more powerful arguments than the number of people you represent.
author: Guy Verhofstadt

quote: I know very well that Berlin attaches great importance to NATO and solidarity, in terms of sharing the burden. For this reason, I feel confident that the German government will take the right decision, one that serves both German and NATO interests.
author: Anders Fogh Rasmussen

quote: The people have already determined Chechnya's status at the referendum - it is a unit of the Russian Federation. Its political status is not to be discussed any more.
author: Akhmad Kadyrov

quote: Instead of building walls, we should be building bridges.
author: Vicente Fox

quote: I will listen to Mr Bush but my position is very clear and very firm. The occupation is a fiasco. There have been almost more deaths after the war than during the war.
author: Jose Luis Rodriguez Zapatero

quote: The standards of the international community manifest firmness. Iran has no need for long-range missiles or to collaborate with terrorist organizations all over the world.
author: Moshe Katsav

quote: Jamaica is more than just the 'brand' the world recognizes so well; it's a place of pride for the people who live here, its educational institutions, its sports achievements, its science and technology growth.
author: Portia Simpson-Miller

quote: Death is nothing, but to live defeated and inglorious is to die daily.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: A man who suffers before it is necessary, suffers more than is necessary.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Courage is fire, and bullying is smoke.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: If you talk to a man in a language he understands, that goes to his head. If you talk to him in his language, that goes to his heart.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: We don't mind having sanctions banning us from Europe. We are not Europeans.
author: Robert Mugabe

quote: We face neither East nor West: we face forward.
author: Kwame Nkrumah

quote: If we must die, we die defending our rights.
author: Sitting Bull

quote: In Israel, in order to be a realist you must believe in miracles.
author: David Ben-Gurion

quote: We must become bigger than we have been: more courageous, greater in spirit, larger in outlook. We must become members of a new race, overcoming petty prejudice, owing our ultimate allegiance not to nations but to our fellow men within the human community.
author: Haile Selassie

quote: God does not discriminate against people, regardless of color, religion, social class, or gender and sexual preferences.
author: Rodrigo Duterte

quote: What you leave behind is not what is engraved in stone monuments, but what is woven into the lives of others.
author: Pericles

quote: Why should we not form a secret society with but one object, the furtherance of the British Empire and the bringing of the whole world under British rule, for the recovery of the United States, for making the Anglo Saxon race but one Empire? What a dream, but yet it is probable; it is possible.
author: Cecil Rhodes

quote: Gender equality is more than a goal in itself. It is a precondition for meeting the challenge of reducing poverty, promoting sustainable development and building good governance.
author: Kofi Annan

quote: My guiding principle is that prosperity can be shared. We can create wealth together. The global economy is not a zero-sum game.
author: Julia Gillard

quote: My lifestyle is a consequence of my wounds. I'm the son of my history.
author: Jose Mujica

quote: I would rather be right than President.
author: Henry Clay

quote: The original communitarianism of Chinese Confucian society has degenerated into nepotism, a system of family linkages, and corruption, on the mainland. And remnants of the evils of the original system are still found in Taiwan, Hong Kong, and even Singapore.
author: Lee Kuan Yew

quote: Sex: the pleasure is momentary, the position ridiculous, and the expense damnable.
author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quote: The worst cruelty that can be inflicted on a human being is isolation.
author: Sukarno

quote: We must confront the privileged elite who have destroyed a large part of the world.
author: Hugo Chavez

quote: There is no refuge from confession but suicide; and suicide is confession.
author: Daniel Webster

quote: I believed in the goodness of the Australian people; I believed they did not want to be attacking each other, and from those thoughts, I got the idea of Reconciliation in the campaign slogan and of turning this into something practical by calling a summit to bring representatives of all sections of society together, from the wealthiest to the poor.
author: Bob Hawke

quote: South Africa belongs to all who live in it, black and white.
author: Thabo Mbeki

quote: A day of worry is more exhausting than a week of work.
author: John Lubbock

quote: Empowering the individual means empowering the nation. And empowerment is best served through rapid economic growth with rapid social change.
author: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

quote: I don't think anybody anywhere can talk about the future of their people or of an organization without talking about education. Whoever controls the education of our children controls our future.
author: Wilma Mankiller

quote: To have command is to have all the power you will ever need. To have all the power you will ever need, is to have the world in the palm of you hand.
author: Tiberius

quote: Agrarian reform should not merely subdivide misery, it must raise living standards. Ownership raises the farmer from his, but productivity will keep him on his feet.
author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo

quote: One man's wage increase is another man's price increase.
author: Harold Wilson

quote: I have always regarded nonalignment as a statement that India's policies - foreign policy - will be guided by what I describe as 'enlightened national interest.' That means we will make judgments on an independent basis with the sole concern being what is enlightened India's national interest.
author: Manmohan Singh

quote: When we're actually modeling good behavior, and when we get results, other countries are more likely to follow our lead.
author: Antony Blinken

quote: Put more trust in nobility of character than in an oath.
author: Solon

quote: My objective is to fulfil the dream of Bangabandhu through building a hunger- and poverty-free Golden Bangladesh being imbued with the spirit of the War of Liberation.
author: Sheikh Hasina

quote: I am my own woman.
author: Evita Peron

quote: The rise of man from the animal to the human level was prolonged by the necessity of rising from a state of barbarism and violence to one of order and peace.
author: Leon Bourgeois

quote: God will not forgive us if we fail.
author: Leonid I. Brezhnev

quote: We will continue to hit those who threaten us.
author: Francois Hollande

quote: Americans are the great Satan, the wounded snake.
author: Ruhollah Khomeini

quote: France is delighted at this new opportunity to show the world that when one has the will one can succeed in joining peoples who have been brought close by history.
author: Francois Mitterrand

quote: I played an integral part in helpings formulating that new vision... that we must abandon apartheid and accept one united South Africa with equal rights for all, with all forms of discrimination to be scrapped from the statute book.
author: F. W. de Klerk

quote: Without productivity gains, any growth in GDP is exactly offset by population growth, and the average income stays the same.
author: Said Musa

quote: Peace will be when you accept it in your heart.
author: Hiawatha

quote: What is at a peak is certain to decline. He who shows his hand will surely be defeated. He who can prevail in battle by taking advantage of his enemy's doubts is invincible.
author: Cao Cao

quote: The winner of the elections which saw the participation of almsot 30 million people was the Iranian nation and the losers were those who tried to keep people away from the polls.
author: Ali Khamenei

quote: You can't be chasing 15 rabbits. Otherwise, the public mind cannot follow you.
author: Brian Mulroney

quote: France now has a new president and he must be respected. I assume full responsibility for this defeat.
author: Nicolas Sarkozy

quote: It is not the function of the government to keep the citizen from falling into error; it is the function of the citizen to keep the government from falling into error.
author: Robert Jackson

quote: When I first arrived at the Matignon, my desire was to reconcile Parliament and De Gaulle. I had forgotten only two things. Parliament and De Gaulle.
author: Georges Pompidou

quote: We had news this morning of another successful atomic bomb being dropped on Nagasaki. These two heavy blows have fallen in quick succession upon the Japanese and there will be quite a little space before we intend to drop another.
author: Henry L. Stimson

quote: I believe that Mexico, geographically, is located in a privileged position. We serve as the meeting point with North America and the rest of Latin America.
author: Enrique Pena Nieto

quote: People say you favor assassination, what do you think war is? Except that it's assassination on a much larger scale, a much more horrific scale.
author: John Bolton

quote: If I were a Palestinian of the right age, I'd eventually join one of the terrorist organizations.
author: Ehud Barak

quote: You have not converted a man because you have silenced him.
author: John Morley

quote: If I liken the Pacific War to a football match, I can say to you that the first half is over, we have kicked off after the interval, and we are going to carry the ball into enemy territory for a smashing victory.
author: John Curtin

quote: I've been saying it all along: please do not demonise Robert Mugabe. I'm not saying the methods he's using are correct, but he was put under great pressure.
author: Kenneth Kaunda

quote: It has been well over half a century and I'm glad to say we have taken the right path from authoritarianism to democracy and this is a road of no return.
author: Chen Shui-bian

quote: Unfortunately, religion, like patriotism, is easy to misuse for political purposes.
author: Kjell Magne Bondevik

quote: Japan's alliance with the U.S. will only grow in importance amid the increasingly difficult security situation surrounding our country, thus I think it is necessary to keep the marines in Okinawa, a geographically strategic location from the standpoint of maintaining deterrence.
author: Yoshihiko Noda

quote: When you have an emergency, there is the urge to do whatever it takes to see people get assistance.
author: Meles Zenawi

quote: It is a simple but sometimes forgotten truth that the greatest enemy to present joy and high hopes is the cultivation of retrospective bitterness.
author: Robert Menzies

quote: Let me reassure that the Kingdom of Cambodia a country with independence, neutrality, peace, freedom, democracy and human rights as you all have seen, shall be existing with no end.
author: Hun Sen

quote: A country grows in history not only because of the heroism of its troops on the field of battle, it grows also when it turns to justice and to right for the conservation of its interests.
author: Aristide Briand

quote: It takes two to make a marriage a success and only one to make it a failure.
author: Herbert Samuel

quote: I have more influence now than when I had the power.
author: Gough Whitlam

quote: Only by addressing the root causes of conflict and disputes can we hope to find lasting peace in a just and equitable world.
author: Mwai Kibaki

quote: Without the United States, there simply would not have been an armed uprising in our country.
author: Daniel Ortega

quote: The intelligent are to the intelligentsia what a gentleman is to a gent.
author: Stanley Baldwin

quote: Only reform and opening up can develop China. We must not be afraid of any risks, and not be confused by any distractions.
author: Hu Jintao

quote: But the United States did not keep its word. Is an American's word reliable these days?
author: Nguyen Van Thieu

quote: Argentines have billions of pesos overseas because they didn't trust in the state.
author: Mauricio Macri

quote: In my early days in school, I had no shoes, no school bags. There were days I had only one meal... I walked miles and crossed rivers to school every day. Didn't have power, didn't have generators, studied with lanterns, but I never despaired.
author: Goodluck Jonathan

quote: Those who are of the opinion that money will do everything may reasonably be expected to do everything for money.
author: Edward Wood, 1st Earl of Halifax

quote: The African Union has to act in order to put an end to armed conflicts that undermine the continent, to fight against the devastation caused by AIDS and other contagious diseases, to promote sustainable development of its member states.
author: Omar Bongo

quote: Diversity is not a politically correct idea. Diversity in a boardroom or in a Parliament means that you just have different minds, different life experience, different ways of thinking about patients or customers or voters so that when you bring that intellect, you look at opportunity and risk, and then you have it in much better balance.
author: Jenny Shipley

quote: The battle against terrorism is not only a military fight but primarily a battle of information.
author: Ahmed Chalabi

quote: I do not see any reason why they should not be given the means to give their teachers just as high an education as is secured by attendance at the Protestant schools.
author: Charles Tupper

quote: People in Afghanistan want peace, including the Taliban. They're also people like we all are. They have families, they have relatives, they have children, they are suffering a tough time.
author: Hamid Karzai

quote: Not a moment had been lost by General Hooker in the pursuit of Lee.
author: Edward Everett

quote: We will learn together how to solve the problems of the country.
author: Nestor Kirchner

quote: I had great admiration for the election of President Obama. I believe that the U.S. at that moment showed tremendous capacity to show that it is a great nation, and it surprised the world. It may be very difficult to be able to elect a black president in the U.S. - as it was very difficult to elect a woman president in Brazil.
author: Dilma Rousseff

quote: We can't make any statements here. We can't talk about the internal politics of Paraguay.
author: Alfredo Stroessner

quote: The Malagasy people must have the liberty to choose their own future.
author: Andry Rajoelina

quote: Today the fate of humankind is even more crucially linked than ever before. The boundaries between the problems of 'others' and 'our' problems are being increasingly erased.
author: Janez Drnovsek

quote: Good God, do you mean to say this place is a club?
author: F. E. Smith

quote: In politics it is necessary to take nothing tragically and everything seriously.
author: Louis Adolphe Thiers

quote: I will not nullify, I will not secede, but I will under sovereign State authority fight in the Union another revolutionary conflict for civil liberty, and a Union which will defend it.
author: Henry A. Wise

quote: Schools that are to cater for the whole population must offer courses that are as rich and varied as are the needs and abilities of the children who enter them.
author: Peter Fraser

quote: I take great pride in having been able to overcome the Asian financial crisis and seeking the opportunities available to bring about an unprecedented growth in the economy.
author: Zhu Rongji

quote: Prohibition didn't work in the Garden of Eden. Adam ate the apple.
author: Vicente Fox

quote: My commitment is my commitment.
author: Jose Luis Rodriguez Zapatero

quote: Lehi was not a part of the Zionist movement, not a part of the Revisionist Party. It was sometimes something apart, and Lord Moyne was the highest British official in the Middle East... and because we fought against the British in this area, we took him for a target.
author: Yitzhak Shamir

quote: Criminals were coming to Chechnya from all over the world - they did not have a place in their own countries. But they could live perfectly well in Chechnya.
author: Akhmad Kadyrov

quote: The Security Council decided to deal with Iran's nuclear intentions. The international community will not be willing to tolerate an Iran with a nuclear capability and an Iran that collaborates with terrorist organizations.
author: Moshe Katsav

quote: Now this is not the end. It is not even the beginning of the end. But it is, perhaps, the end of the beginning.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: I find capitalism repugnant. It is filthy, it is gross, it is alienating... because it causes war, hypocrisy and competition.
author: Fidel Castro

quote: The greater the power, the more dangerous the abuse.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: The best way of learning to be an independent sovereign state is to be an independent sovereign state.
author: Kwame Nkrumah

quote: You think I am a fool, but you are a greater fool than I am.
author: Sitting Bull

quote: The secretariat will play a pivotal role in decision-making above a certain level, where basic policies are involved, but below that, we will have to leave the implementation to whoever is in charge.
author: Rajiv Gandhi

quote: Whether you like it or not, history is on our side. We will bury you!
author: Nikita Khrushchev

quote: The question is not whether we are able to change but whether we are changing fast enough.
author: Angela Merkel

quote: Hillary Clinton will always be there for you. And just remember - there's a special place in hell for women who don't help each other.
author: Madeleine Albright

quote: Freedom is the sure possession of those alone who have the courage to defend it.
author: Pericles

quote: Forgiveness is a virtue of the brave.
author: Indira Gandhi

quote: I love the Americans. They are my best friends.
author: Idi Amin

quote: Anywhere, anytime ordinary people are given the chance to choose, the choice is the same: freedom, not tyranny; democracy, not dictatorship; the rule of law, not the rule of the secret police.
author: Tony Blair

quote: Education is a human right with immense power to transform. On its foundation rest the cornerstones of freedom, democracy and sustainable human development.
author: Kofi Annan

quote: Those of you who have spent time with Australians know that we are not given to overstatement. By nature we are laconic speakers and by conviction we are realistic thinkers.
author: Julia Gillard

quote: I give myself the luxury of saying what I want.
author: Jose Mujica

quote: I've got one grandson gone to MIT. Another grandson had been in the American school here. Because he was dyslexic, and we then didn't have the teachers to teach him how to overcome or cope with his dyslexia, so he was given exemption to go to the American school. He speaks like an American. He's going to Wharton.
author: Lee Kuan Yew

quote: Good humor is the health of the soul, sadness is its poison.
author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quote: We must reduce all the emissions that are destroying the planet. However, that requires a change in lifestyle, a change in the economic model: We must go from capitalism to socialism.
author: Hugo Chavez

quote: There is no doubt that this government and this country are benefiting from the reforms that we brought in the 1980s, and that couldn't have been done without the co-operation of the trade union movement.
author: Bob Hawke

quote: Poverty and ignorance, which beget terror, are not eradicated by firing artillery shells. Borders do not stop rockets, and barbed wire does not prevent terror.
author: Shimon Peres

quote: Victory and defeat are a part of life, which are to be viewed with equanimity.
author: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

quote: Israel is no longer a people that dwells alone, and has to join the global journey toward peace, reconciliation and international cooperation.
author: Yitzhak Rabin

quote: All girls know that they can be anything now. That transformation is to me one of the most satisfying things.
author: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf

quote: An infallible method of conciliating a tiger is to allow oneself to be devoured.
author: Konrad Adenauer

quote: We have to be bold in our national ambitions. First, we must win the fight against poverty within the next decade. Second, we must improve moral standards in government and society to provide a strong foundation for good governance. Third, we must change the character of our politics to promote fertile ground for reforms.
author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo

quote: To be satisfied with a little, is the greatest wisdom; and he that increaseth his riches, increaseth his cares; but a contented mind is a hidden treasure, and trouble findeth it not.
author: Akhenaton

quote: I'm not in charge of judgments in Iran. The judicial system in Iran is an independent body of its own, and it follows the laws, and it must operate according to the law.
author: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad

quote: I was no chief and never had been, but because I had been more deeply wronged than others, this honor was conferred upon me, and I resolved to prove worthy of the trust.
author: Geronimo

quote: The economic and social problems would tend to become, like the military situation, more and more difficult as time went on and we became more and more isolated.
author: Eamon de Valera

quote: Peace is much more precious than a piece of land... let there be no more wars.
author: Anwar Sadat

quote: People might think that my queen should be highly educated, beautiful and the best of the best. Jetsun Pema is a kind-hearted girl who is very supportive and whom I can trust. I cannot say how she might appear to the people, but to me, she is the one.
author: Jigme Khesar Namgyel Wangchuck

quote: Worry does not mean fear, but readiness for the confrontation.
author: Bashar al-Assad

quote: I don't want euro bonds that serve to mutualize the entire debt of the countries in the euro zone. That can only work in the longer-term. I want euro bonds to be used to finance targeted investments in future-oriented growth projects. It isn't the same thing. Let's call them 'project bonds' instead of euro bonds.
author: Francois Hollande

quote: One thing I congratulate everyone on is the great explosion which has occurred in Washington's Black House and the very important scandal which has gripped leaders of America.
author: Ruhollah Khomeini

quote: Truth is absolute, truth is supreme, truth is never disposable in national political life.
author: John Howard

quote: I believe that first impressions are very important.
author: F. W. de Klerk

quote: We have much work ahead, to stand still.
author: Said Musa

quote: The critical thing about Western democracy is the fact that you usually have a transition of power without bloodshed. That is an enormous advantage. But still, democracy as we know it was only invented recently in the West, historical speaking. It did not really work in ancient Rome. It functioned for less than 200 years in ancient Athens.
author: Helmut Schmidt

quote: It is the maintenance of slavery by law in a state, not parallels of latitude, that makes its a southern state; and the absence of this, that makes it a northern state.
author: William H. Seward

quote: Capitalism is the worst friend of humanity.
author: Evo Morales

quote: If your only objective is to be popular, you're going to be popular but you will be known as the Prime Minister who achieved nothing.
author: Brian Mulroney

quote: I love life too much to be bitter.
author: Nicolas Sarkozy

quote: It is better we disintegrate in peace and not in pieces.
author: Nnamdi Azikiwe

quote: We need international support so that our people live a life of normality, of dignity, of liberty and freedom. I hope that our cry for freedom may be heard.
author: Mahmoud Abbas

quote: The Muslim Brotherhood is the parent organization of extreme ideology. They are the godfather of all terrorist organizations. They spread it all over the world.
author: Abdel Fattah al-Sisi

quote: The chief lesson I have learned in a long life is that the only way you can make a man trustworthy is to trust him; and the surest way to make him untrustworthy is to distrust him.
author: Henry L. Stimson

quote: Boosting education will be a direct counterbalance to Boko Haram's appeal. In particular we must educate more young girls, ensuring they will grow up to be empowered through learning to play their full part as citizens of Nigeria and pull themselves up and out of poverty.
author: Muhammadu Buhari

quote: Marine protected areas, and particularly no-take zones, are very effective in allowing regeneration of fish stocks.
author: Helen Clark

quote: There is no greater honour than to serve Canadians.
author: Kim Campbell

quote: Let them look to the past, but let them also look to the future; let them look to the land of their ancestors, but let them look also to the land of their children.
author: Wilfrid Laurier

quote: One must say bluntly that it is an unattractive sight when, with a view to smearing the Soviet people, leaders of such a country as the United States resort to what almost amounts to obscenities alternating with hypocritical preaching about morals and humanism.
author: Yuri Andropov

quote: I wanted to become a writer. I enjoyed reading as a child.
author: Goh Chok Tong

quote: They that govern the most make the least noise.
author: John Selden

quote: When you borrow money, you should always think how you're going to pay it back.
author: Dmitry Medvedev

quote: Over the years, I've come to recognize that democratization in Ethiopia is not just a matter of choice. It's a matter of national survival. I am deeply convinced that we either democratize and have a good chance of surviving, or if we fail to do so, we disintegrate.
author: Meles Zenawi

quote: Never forget posterity when devising a policy. Never think of posterity when making a speech.
author: Robert Menzies

quote: Cambodia possesses now the rights to look far into the future and everything for making a future construction is waiting for the Cambodian own efforts.
author: Hun Sen

quote: History is more interesting than politics.
author: Lennart Meri

quote: An autobiography is the story of how a man thinks he lived.
author: Herbert Samuel

quote: If the people should elect, they will never fail to prefer some man of distinguished character, or services; some man, if he might so speak of continental reputation.
author: Gouverneur Morris

quote: The man who trusts men will make fewer mistakes than he who distrusts them.
author: Camillo di Cavour

quote: Substantive and procedural law benefits and protects landlords over tenants, creditors over debtors, lenders over borrowers, and the poor are seldom among the favored parties.
author: John Turner

quote: Diversity in the world is a basic characteristic of human society, and also the key condition for a lively and dynamic world as we see today.
author: Hu Jintao

quote: I am not struck so much by the diversity of testimony as by the many-sidedness of truth.
author: Stanley Baldwin

quote: Here's to the pilot that weathered the storm.
author: George Canning

quote: The United States did not keep its promise to help us fight for freedom and it was in the same fight that the United States lost 50,000 of its young men.
author: Nguyen Van Thieu

quote: I don't need power at the cost of spilled blood.
author: Viktor Yanukovych

quote: A memorandum is written not to inform the reader but to protect the writer.
author: Dean Acheson

quote: True merit, like a river, the deeper it is, the less noise it makes.
author: Edward Wood, 1st Earl of Halifax

quote: The free market economy is supposed to be the only path leading to the happiness of humanity by promoting wealth and prosperity, power and influence of nations.
author: Omar Bongo

quote: Argentina is ready to take its place. Its a big country with a lot of talent.
author: Mauricio Macri

quote: We expect that in the next years, the economy will improve. And we expect that extreme poverty will drop from 22 percent to 11 percent by the year 2000.
author: Alberto Fujimori

quote: Brunei Darussalam is one of the oldest kingdoms in South East Asia.
author: Hassanal Bolkiah

quote: You know the most important thing the Americans did for Iraq apart from liberating the country from Saddam was helping Iraq reduce its debt. The United States worked very hard to reduce 80 percent of Iraqi debt.
author: Ahmed Chalabi

quote: I've never heard an agency say, 'Unless you industrialize I will not support you'.
author: Yoweri Museveni

quote: There is no humiliation more abusive than hunger.
author: Pranab Mukherjee

quote: Change is the only constant, and to turn one's back and pretend that it is not coming is an exercise in futility.
author: Anthony Carmona

quote: The position the Government finds itself in is not one of constructing a law, but of carrying out a decision given by the Judicial Committee of the Privy Council.
author: Charles Tupper

quote: A left-wing idiot is as dangerous as a right-wing idiot.
author: Milos Zeman

quote: Economic and financial crisis are getting much more usual, and they are not confined to a given country but they immediately spread all over the world, and you have to be prepared for that.
author: Sebastian Pinera

quote: We saw there was no consensus in the U.N. Security Council. It was impossible, due to the threatened veto by some.
author: Jose Maria Aznar

quote: Brothers in suffering, brothers in resistance, brothers in ideals and conviction. It is now our duty to further strengthen this bond in order to secure this hard-won freedom for future generations.
author: Guy Verhofstadt

quote: There was no reason for a revolution in Paraguay.
author: Alfredo Stroessner

quote: There is no Polish culture without Jewish culture.
author: Donald Tusk

quote: Democracy is constructed like an edifice, freedom by freedom, right by right, until it reaches its snapping point.
author: Abdoulaye Wade

quote: Our goal is not to crush the enemy at any price, but to make it realize that it is illegal to take up arms to overthrow a democratically elected government.
author: Jose Eduardo dos Santos

quote: An agreement cannot be the result of an imposition.
author: Nestor Kirchner

quote: In their war against Israel's existence, the Arab governments took advantage of the Cold War. They enlisted the military, economic, and political support of the communist world against Israel, and they turned a local, regional conflict into an international powder keg.
author: Yitzhak Shamir

quote: Change will not come from above, it will come from below, from the small and medium size businesspeople. They do dare to show their faces. They applaud us and help us financially.
author: Vicente Fox

quote: If Yugoslavia is to exist, it can exist only as an alliance, a confederation of independent states.
author: Franjo Tudjman

quote: Even if a minefield or the abyss should lie before me, I will march straight ahead without looking back.
author: Zhu Rongji

quote: Persian social manners are well known, and there is no other society that can compete with them.
author: Moshe Katsav

quote: Never stop fighting until you arrive at your destined place - that is, the unique you. Have an aim in life, continuously acquire knowledge, work hard, and have perseverance to realise the great life.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Religion is regarded by the common people as true, by the wise as false, and by the rulers as useful.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: The revolution is a dictatorship of the exploited against the exploiters.

quote: Revolutions are brought about by men, by men who think as men of action and act as men of thought.
author: Kwame Nkrumah

quote: What white man can say I never stole his land or a penny of his money? Yet they say that I am a thief.
author: Sitting Bull

quote: The conventional army loses if it does not win. The guerrilla wins if he does not lose.
author: Henry Kissinger

quote: The white man is not indigenous to Africa. Africa is for Africans. Zimbabwe is for Zimbabweans.
author: Robert Mugabe

quote: In every democracy, it is the people's will that is supreme. We should translate the intense yearning of the people of India and Pakistan for friendship into meaningful measures of cooperation in every walk of life.
author: Rajiv Gandhi

quote: Economics is a subject that does not greatly respect one's wishes.
author: Nikita Khrushchev

quote: Above all, we must avoid the pitfalls of tribalism. If we are divided among ourselves on tribal lines, we open our doors to foreign intervention and its potentially harmful consequences.
author: Haile Selassie

quote: For every profanity, there's a story behind it. People should go beyond my cussing.
author: Rodrigo Duterte

quote: The power to question is the basis of all human progress.
author: Indira Gandhi

quote: The real fact is that I could no longer stand their eternal cold mutton.
author: Cecil Rhodes

quote: More than ever before in human history, we share a common destiny. We can master it only if we face it together. And that, my friends, is why we have the United Nations.
author: Kofi Annan

quote: Education equals economic growth.
author: Julia Gillard

quote: I'll take my destiny, whatever that may be, but I'm going to fight for my dignity and my honor.
author: Ferdinand Marcos

quote: Government is a trust, and the officers of the government are trustees. And both the trust and the trustees are created for the benefit of the people.
author: Henry Clay

quote: We are pragmatists. We don't stick to any ideology. Does it work? Let's try it, and if it does work, fine, let's continue it. If it doesn't work, toss it out, try another one. We are not enamored with any ideology.
author: Lee Kuan Yew

quote: Whatever is worth doing at all is worth doing well.
author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quote: I am convinced that the path to a new, better and possible world is not capitalism, the path is socialism.
author: Hugo Chavez

quote: I was born an American; I will live an American; I shall die an American.
author: Daniel Webster

quote: The greatest stain upon this great Australian nation's character, without any question, is the great gaps that exist between our Aboriginal brothers and sisters in terms of their health, their education, their living conditions, their incarceration rates and life expectancy. It's a great stain.

quote: When will the day come that our dignity will be fully restored, when the purpose of our lives will no longer be merely to survive until the sun rises tomorrow!
author: Thabo Mbeki

quote: Earth and sky, woods and fields, lakes and rivers, the mountain and the sea, are excellent schoolmasters, and teach some of us more than we can ever learn from books.
author: John Lubbock

quote: No guns but only brotherhood can resolve the problems.
author: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

quote: We do not celebrate the death of our enemies.
author: Yitzhak Rabin

quote: Let them hate me, provided they respect my conduct.
author: Tiberius

quote: I stand by it. I take the criticism for it. I think it's unfair, but yes, there is a thing about nepotism, and we all try to respect it.
author: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf

quote: I'm an optimist, but an optimist who carries a raincoat.
author: Harold Wilson

quote: Crime against the individual is the equivalent of crime against humanity.
author: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad

quote: The lessons Noam Chomsky sets out to teach us in 'Toward a New Cold War' are invaluable. The United States, like any other nations, can and does err, and often in a big way. But Chomsky cannot support at all his implicit diagnosis that America is 'bad.'
author: Antony Blinken

quote: After the liberation of Bangladesh in 1971, primary education was made free. We are now thinking to make education in the public sector free up to graduation level. We are also thinking of providing a light meal at primary and secondary schools in order to increase the student retention level.
author: Sheikh Hasina

quote: Fear is, I believe, a most effective tool in destroying the soul of an individual - and the soul of a people.
author: Anwar Sadat

quote: It doesn't matter when you get married as long as it is the right person.
author: Jigme Khesar Namgyel Wangchuck

quote: When we analyze this war in a materialistic way and ask when is it going to end and who will be the winner and the loser, it means that we do not see the endgame.

quote: Everyone must understand that you can't demand solidarity when there's a problem and shirk your duties when there are solutions.

quote: It's too much to expect in an academic setting that we should all agree, but it is not too much to expect discipline and unvarying civility.

quote: President Mandela was not a hands-on president at any time.

quote: We in the small developing countries are beginning to understand that our own citizens share a common fate requiring the active role of government to ensure that every citizen has a chance and means to participate productively within the society and to curb society's dangerous encroachment on the physical environment.

quote: I remember the youth movement in 1968. It started on American university campuses as a protest against the Vietnam war, then came to Paris, Frankfurt and Berlin. Within a year, you had an uprising of youth against their elders.

quote: All the other chiefs and tribes have accepted the Great Law of Peace. They now live in peace with one another.

quote: The augmentation of slaves weakens the states; and such a trade is diabolical in itself, and disgraceful to mankind.
author: George Mason

quote: Whether the process proves to be Kyoto or something else, let's acknowledge the urgency of global warming.

quote: For me, being leftist means fighting against injustice and inequality but, most of all, we want to live well.

quote: I want to wage war against illiteracy, poverty, unemployment, unfair competition, communitarianism, delinquency.

quote: My fate is to be President of the Republic - or leader of the opposition.

quote: When the Jewish state is established - it is very possible that the result will be transfer of Arabs.

quote: There is no doubt that counterterrorism takes time because it is not action against a regular army.

quote: The thing that the Nigerian government will do is to secure the environment. If the environment is not secured, then unfortunately, the investments wouldn't be coming in.

quote: Whenever there are some who have more opportunities than others, this feeds corruption.

quote: For people on social assistance, the loss of free dental care, prescription drugs and subsidized housing can greatly outweigh additional income from working. We've all heard the stories.
author: Kim Campbell

quote: Two races share today the soil of Canada. These people had not always been friends. But I hasten to say it. There is no longer any family here but the human family. It matters not the language people speak, or the altars at which they kneel.

quote: Industry is extremely slow in readjusting itself to the manufacture of modern consumer goods.

quote: I fight AIDS because it's a killer disease, destroys the human race in all fields.

quote: Villa Grande has in many ways symbolized an important, but less than pleasant, part of our history.

quote: I am not a hereditary politician and do not have any substantial asset.

quote: An oversupply of national sentiment is not the problem in Somalia. The problem is a lack of it. The problem is an oversupply of sub-sub-clannish attitude.

quote: A man may be a tough, concentrated, successful money-maker and never contribute to his country anything more than a horrible example.

quote: We have lost the art of sharing and caring.

quote: Among peoples who are geographically grouped together like the peoples of Europe there must exist a sort of federal link. It is this link which I wish to endeavour to establish.

quote: The Caucus I joined in 1953 had as many Boer War veterans as men who had seen active service in World War II, three from each. The Ministry appointed on 5 December 1972 was composed entirely of ex-servicemen: Lance Barnard and me.

quote: It is only with burning anger that we can speak of this attack by counter-revolutionary reactionary elements against the capital of our country, against our people's democratic order and the power of the working class.

quote: The family teaches us about the importance of knowledge, education, hard work and effort. It teaches us about enjoying ourselves, having fun, keeping fit and healthy.
author: Kamisese Mara

quote: I would rather trust a woman's instinct than a man's reason.

quote: China has been committed to the independent foreign policy of peace and has developed friendship and cooperation with all countries on the basis of the Five Principles of Peaceful Coexistence.
author: Hu Jintao

quote: In matters of commerce the fault of the Dutch Is offering too little and asking too much. The French are with equal advantage content, So we clap on Dutch bottoms just twenty per cent.
author: George Canning

quote: In New Zealand, men and women would not take a party seriously if it did not have a good gender - and increasingly racial - mix. It's not about being politically correct; it's just who we are.

quote: My brothers and sisters, we are all winners. In this context there is no victor and no vanquished. We have demonstrated, even in our diversity, the progress of Nigeria remains paramount for all.

quote: All transitions are hard. We took over a country beaten down by lies and corruption.

quote: It is worse than immoral, it's a mistake.

quote: I never had the financial means that the media said I had. I laugh when I hear the amounts, $400 million, $800 million. Where do they get this imagination?

quote: It will be a war of national liberation. We believe the people reject totalitarianism.

quote: With God's help and guidance, we shall soon see the end of this most unpleasant chapter in our history.

quote: I do not like violence.

quote: Empowerment is not about doing the same thing the same way in the same environment. It's about building the man and the woman and doing so with a view to creating better citizens and, by extension, better patriots in this society of ours.

quote: Let a nation's fervent thanks make some amends for the toils and sufferings of those who survive.
